GSP30abhiprvu:36: hṛdayagocaram, na tu atra svātmīyaḥ puruṣakāraḥ ko 'pi nirvahati, sarvasya tasya māyāmayatvenāndhatamasaprakhyasyāmāyīyaṃ śuddhaprakāśaṃ svapratidvandvinaṃ prati upāyat|anupapatteḥ, vajigamiṣayā
GSP30abhiprvu:38: jayapadodīraṇe 'pi tādṛśasamutkarṣātiśayaśālini svātmānamaprahvīkurvāṇasya taṭasthasya paramanātmopakāritvam iti samutkarṣaviśeṣākṣipta eva namaskāro 'vaśyamabhyantarīkāryaḥ, ityanayā yuktyā jaya-namaskāraikataraprakrame anyatarasya arthākṣiptatā avaśyamaṅgīkartavyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:41: atrāyaṃ punargranthakṛtā tādṛk prakrama āśritaḥ, yatra dvayamapi idaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:44: svaśabdaparāmarśaśca sarvajanahitatvādyuktiyuktaḥ, sa hi sarvasyaiva jhaṭiti hṛdayaṃgamaḥ, arthākṣiptastu katicideva prati
GSP30abhiprvu:48: prasiddhajaya-namaḥ prabhṛtiśabdaśaṭyānāśleṣeṇa imāṃ saraṇim anusarasi sma granthakāraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:50: tattadvakṣyamāṇeśvararūpasvātmaprathāmātram, tatra tu upāyopeyabhāvaprabhṛtiḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi yathāprakāśaṃ paramārthabhūta eva, prakāśasya anapahnavanīyatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:56: tatra tu kāryakāraṇabhāve 'pi kvacit paripūrṇasvātantryalakṣaṇamāheśvaryanāntarīyakatākroḍīkṛtānantaśakticakracumbitabhāvabhāvitaprathāntaravyacadhānaṃ cakāsti ; sa tu māyīyatvena sthāpayiṣyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:59: / yatra tu śuddhasvātmarūpaprathātmakānuttaraśaktiśālinirargalasvātmaprakāśa eva māyīyaprathāntaravyavadhānavandhyo nibandhanam, tatra tasyaiva bhagavataḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:61: eṣa ca anugrahalakṣaṇo 'ntyaḥ pañcamaḥ pārameśvaraḥ kṛtyaviśeṣaḥ parapuruṣārthaprāpakaḥ,
GSP30abhiprvu:64: kutaścinmuktiḥ, na sarvata iti niḥśreyasābhāsa iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:65: sa cāyaṃ dvitīyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo laukikānvayavyatirekasiddhaprasiddhakāryakāraṇabhāvavilakṣaṇatvāt sphuṭena rūpeṇāsaṃcetyamānaḥ kādācitkavastusadbhāvonneyaparamārthaḥ atidurghaṭakāritvalakṣaṇaiśvaryavijṛmbhābhāvitādbhutabhāvaḥ prathamakoṭisaṃbhāvanāśūnyakālikākārasvaprakāśāvaraṇanirākaraṇamanorathaśataduṣprāpa ityevaṃprakāraḥ kathamā dyotakanipātasahitena nirūpitaḥ 'kathaṃcit'; iti,
GSP30abhiprvu:71: svātmopabhogayogyatāṃ nirargalāṃ gamayitvā ; iyatā viditavedyatvena parārthe śāstrakaraṇe adhikāro darśitaḥ ; anyathā pratārakatāmātrameva syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:73: anyathā tu āsādanatāratamyaprāptau māyīyamalakalāpasaṃskāraprakṣaye kathaṃ paropadeśaḥ śakyakriyaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:74: saṃbhavanti hi māyāgarbhādhikāriṇo viṣṇuviriṃcādyāḥ , taduttīrṇā api mahāmāyādhikṛtāḥ śuddhāśuddhā
GSP30abhiprvu:76: te tu yadīyaiśvaryavipruḍbhirīśvarībhūtāḥ sa bhagavān anavacchinnaprakāśānandarūpasvātantryaparamārtho maheśvaraḥ , tasya
GSP30abhiprvu:78: dīyate asmai svāminā sarvaṃ yathābhilaṣitam iti dāsaḥ , tasya bhāva ityanena parameśvararūpasvātantryapātratā uktā /
GSP30abhiprvu:79: ‘janasya'; iti , yaḥ kaścit jāyamānaḥ tasya , ityanena adhikāriviṣayo nātra kaścinniyama iti darśayati , yasya yasya hi idaṃ svarūpaprathanaṃ tasya tasya mahāphalam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:80: prathanasyaiva paramārthaphalatvāt , tasya ca pratibandhakasaṃmatairapratibandhanīyatvāt , na hi prathitamaprathitamiti
GSP30abhiprvu:89: karaṇena nāsti kṛtyaṃ kvāpi bhāvanayāpi vā /
GSP30abhiprvu:94: apiśabdaḥ svātmanaḥ tadabhinnatām āviṣkurvan pūrṇatvena svātmani parārthasaṃpattyatiriktaprayojanāntarāvakāśaṃ parākaroti /
GSP30abhiprvu:95: parārthaśca prayojanaṃ bhavatyeva tallakṣaṇatvāt , na hi ayaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:96: daivaśāpaḥ svārtha eva prayojanaṃ na parārtha iti ; tasyāpi atallakṣaṇatve sati aprayojanatvāt ; saṃpādyatvena abhisaṃhitaṃ yat mukhyatayā tata eva
GSP30abhiprvu:98: ata eva bhedāde 'pi īśvarasya sṛṣṭyādikaraṇe parārtha eva prayojanam iti darśayituṃ nyāyanirmāṇavedhasā nirūpitam
GSP30abhiprvu:101: icchan iti icchāviṣayīkṛtasya phalasya pravṛtto hetutvaṃ śatrā darśayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:102: icchāśaktiśca uttarottaram ucchūnasvabhāvatayā kriyāśaktiparyantībhavati ---- iti darśayiṣyāmaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:106: parameśvaratālābhe hi samastāḥ saṃpadaḥ tanniḥṣyandamayyaḥ saṃpannā eva , rohaṇalābhe ratnasaṃpada iva /
GSP30abhiprvu:107: pramuṣitasvātmaparamārthasya hi kim anyena labdhena , labdhatatparamārthasyāpi tadanyat nāsti yad vāñchanīyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:111: ityevaṃ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsena prayojanamuktam , bahubrīhiṇā tu upāyaḥ sūcyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:112: samastasya bhāvābhāvarūpasya bāhyābhyantarasya nīlasukhādeḥ yā saṃpat saṃpattiḥ siddhiḥ tathātvaprakāśaḥ , tasyāḥ samyak avāptiḥ vimarśarūḍhiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:113: saiva hetuḥ yasyāṃ tatpratyabhijñāyām , tathā hi ----
GSP30abhiprvu:128: tamya maheśvarasya pratyabhijñā pratīpamātmābhimukhyena jñānaṃ prakāśaḥ pratyabhijñā /
GSP30abhiprvu:130: ananubhūtapūrvo'vicchinnaprakāśatvāt tasya , sa tu tacchaktyaiva vicchinna iva vikalpita iva lakṣyate ---- iti vakṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:132: bhātabhāsamānarūpānusaṃdhānātmikā , sa evāyaṃ caitra ---- iti pratisaṃdhānena abhimukhībhūte vastuni jñānam ; loke'pi etatputra evaṃguṇa evaṃrūpaka ityevaṃ vā , antato'pi sāmānyātmanā vā jñātasya
GSP30abhiprvu:134: iti vyavahriyate ; nṛpaṃ prati pratyabhijñāpito'yam ---- ityādau /
GSP30abhiprvu:135: ihāpi prasiddhapurāṇasiddhāntāgamānumānādividitapūrṇaśaktisvabhāve īśvare sati svātmanyabhimukhībhūte tatpratisaṃdhānena jñānam udeti , nūnaṃ sa eva
GSP30abhiprvu:138: upapattiḥ saṃbhavaḥ , tāṃ saṃbhavantīṃ tatsamarthācaraṇena prayojakavyāpāreṇa saṃpādayāmi
GSP30abhiprvu:139: tathā hi ---- saṃbhavati tāvad asau , avicchinnaprakāśatvāt ;
GSP30abhiprvu:141: pratyabhijñopapattau svaparavibhāgābhāve tadapekṣaṃ kartrabhiprāyādi asaṃbhāvyam iti parasmaipadaprayogaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:143: maheśvarasya dāsyaṃ samastasaṃpallābhahetuṃ kathaṃcit āsādya , janasyāpi kathaṃcit tatpratyabhijñām āsādya prāpayya , upakāraṃ samastasaṃpallābhahetubhūtaṃ maheśvaradāsyātmakam icchan , tāmeva samastasaṃpatsamavāptihetukāṃ tatpratyabhijñām upapādayāmi /
GSP30abhiprvu:145: iyati ca vyākhyāne vṛttikṛtā bharo na kṛtaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:150: ṭīkākāreṇāpi vṛttimātraṃ vyākhyātumudyatena nedaṃ spṛṣṭam , asmākaṃ tu sūtravyākhyāna eva udyama -- iti vibhajya vyākhyātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:152: evamanena ślokena abhidheyam , prayojanam , tatprayojanam , tatprayojanam
GSP30abhiprvu:154: tathā hi ---- samastasaṃpallakṣaṇo vyākhyāto yo'rthaḥ pūrvaṃ puṇyapāpādau saṃsāramūlakāraṇe hetuḥ , sa eva pratyabhijñāyate anayā ---- iti karaṇavyutpattyā upāyaḥ iha lokottaramārgaṃ prati nirṇītaḥ , iti atidurghaṭakāritvalakṣaṇamaiśvaryam
GSP30abhiprvu:156: iti śākhānte nirūpayiṣyamāṇaṃ sūcayatā upāyaḥ darśitaḥ abhidheyatvena /
GSP30abhiprvu:160: prayojanaṃ ca pratyabhijñopāyajñānam , tasya prayojanam pratyabhijñānam , tasyāpi prayojanaṃ samastasaṃpallakṣaṇapāramaiśvaryaikarūparathanam , tataḥ paraṃ nāstyeva , tasya sarvaparyantaphalatvādaṃśāṃśikayāpi yaduktaṃ mayaiva stotre
GSP30abhiprvu:162: pahlepsavo ye punaratra teṣāṃ mūḍhā sthitiḥ syādanavasthayaiva
GSP30abhiprvu:174: evaṃ pratyabhijñātavyasamastavastusaṃgrahaṇena idaṃ vākyamuddeśarūpaṃ pratijñāpiṇḍātmakaṃ ca , madhyagranthastu hetvādinirūpakaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:176: iti ca antyaśloko nigamanagranthaḥ -- ityevaṃ pañcāvayavātmakamidaṃ śāstraṃ paravyutpattiphalam
GSP30abhiprvu:178: ityādiṣu uddeśeṣu prakaṭībhaviṣyati -- iti tāvad granthasya tātparyam sujanaśca laukikeśvaraparicita īśvaraviṣaye janam anujīviguṇasaṃpannaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:180: janaviṣaye ca abhigāmikādiguṇasaṃpannam īśvaraṃ prakāśayati - iti iyānarthaḥ sāmānyena ṣaṣṭhosamāsena darśitaḥ tasya pratyabhijñā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:181: etacchlokākarṇanasamaye ca śiṣyāṇām etadarthasaṃkramaṇakrameṇa parameśvaratādātmyameva upajāyate tāvat /
GSP30abhiprvu:182: tathā hi ---- janasya ityākarṇanāt vayaṃ te jananamaraṇapīḍitā aparyupastavṛttayaśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:183: asmākamayam upakāram icchan , maheśvarasya dāsyam āsādya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:184: samastasaṃpatsamavāptihetuṃ tatpratyabhijñām upapādayati ; tataśca tatpratyabhijñāmevaṃbhūtāṃ vayaṃ prāptā eva , itītthameva hi adhikāriṇi
GSP30abhiprvu:185: śāstrārthasya bimbapratibimbavat saṃkrāntiḥ loḍliṅādīnāṃ viṣayībhavati prathamapuruṣārtha uttamapuruṣārthe paryasyati , na tu tāṭasthyena ;
GSP30abhiprvu:187: ārogyakāmāḥ śivāṃ sevantāṃ sevadhvam ---- iti vā vākyārthasya sevāmahai -- ityevaṃrūpeṇa adhikāriṇi dvitīyā kakṣyā saṃkrāntau , tṛṭīyakakṣyāmeva bhāvikoṭipatitāmapi puruṣārthasaṃpattim akālakalitasvarūpānupraveśena svātmīkṛtām abhimanyamāne , tata eva vitatasaṃvitsundaraparāmarśo
GSP30abhiprvu:188: pūrṇatābhimānapratilambhāt , anyasya tu anevaṃrūpatvenaiva anadhikāritā tāṭasthyaprāṇā ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:189: tadāstām avāntarametat atigahanaṃ ca ---- iti sthitametat /
GSP30abhiprvu:190: etena ślokena īśvarasāṃmukhyaṃ vineyānāṃ prayojanādipratipādanaṃ ca kriyate ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:192: upoddhātāyate yasya taṃ stumaḥ sarvadā śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:194: keyaṃ siddhiḥ ? na tāvat utpattiḥ , nityatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:197: nanu anavacchinnastadīyaḥ prakāśa -- iti kathametat ; nīlasukhādiprakāśe hi tatprakāśaḥ kutaḥ ? tadaprakāśe'pi suptamūrchādau nitarām , svaprakāśe'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:198: vā īśvare pramātḥṇāṃ kiṃ vṛttaṃ yena teṣāṃ pramāṇavyāpārānupayoga ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:200: ajaḍātmā niṣedhaṃ vā siddhiṃ vā vidadhīta kaḥ // Ipk_1,1.2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:201: iha ka īśvare kīdṛśe kīdṛśena pramāṇena asti iti jñānalakṣaṇāṃ siddhim , nāstīti jñānalakṣaṇaṃ vā niṣedhaṃ kuryāt ? pramātā iti cet , sa eva kaḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:202: dehādirjaḍaḥ uta tadanyo vā kaścit ātmādiśabdavācyaḥ ? so'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:203: svaprakāśasvabhāvo vā na vā ? dehādirjaḍaḥ iti cet , sa eva svātmani
GSP30abhiprvu:204: asiddhaḥ paratra kāṃ siddhiṃ kuryāt ? ātmāpi asvaprakāśo jaḍa eva tattulyayogakṣemaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:205: svaprakāśasvabhāvaḥ iti cet , kīdṛśena svena rūpeṇa
GSP30abhiprvu:206: bhāti ? yadi pariniṣṭhitasaṃvinmātrarūpeṇa , tadā saṃvidāṃ bhedanam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:207: bheditānāṃ ca antaranusaṃdhānena abhedanaṃ na syāt ; tena svatantrasvaprakāśātmatayā tāvat sa bhāsate , bheditānāṃ ca antaranusaṃdhānena abhedanaṃ na syāt ; tena svatantrasvaprakāśātmatayā tāvat sa bhāsate , tathābhāsamānaśca kīdṛśamīśvaraṃ sādhayet niṣedhet vā ?
GSP30abhiprvu:208: kartṛjñātṛsvabhāvam iti cet nanu sa pramātaiva tathābhūtaḥ iti ko'nyaḥ saḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:209: ? nanu sarvakartṛtvasarvajñatve pramāturna staḥ ; na khalu sarvaśabdārtho
GSP30abhiprvu:214: prakāśamānasvabhāvatve viṣayo'pi sarvātmanā prakāśa eva nimagna iti prakāśaḥ prakāśate ---- ityetāvanmātraparamārthatve kaḥ sarvajñāsarvajñavibhāgaḥ ? , pramāṇamapi evaṃ siddhatvāsiddhatvābhyāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:216: tasmāt viṣayābhimataṃ vastu śarīratayā gṛhītvā tāvat nirbhāsamāna ātmaiva prakāśate vicchedaśūnyaḥ , suṣuptamapi prati prakāśata eva , anyathā smṛtyayogāt ; prakāśasya ca nityatvāt
GSP30abhiprvu:220: svātantryaṃ ca asya abhede bhedanam , bhedite ca antaranusaṃdhānena abhedanam ---- iti bahuprakāraṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:221: etadeva asya pārameśvaryaṃ mukhyamānandamayaṃ rūpam ---- iti pūrvamupāttaṃ kartari
GSP30abhiprvu:223: tadeva tu svātantryaṃ vibhajya vaktuṃ jñātari iti pañcānnirdiṣṭam /
GSP30abhiprvu:225: tena sarvakriyāsvatantre sarvaśaktike ---- iti yāvad uktaṃ bhavet tāvadeva kartari jñātari iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:227: saṃviditi tu ucyamānā vikalpyatvena prameyatāṃ spṛśanto sṛṣṭatvāt na paramārthasaṃvit ---- iti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:228: kartā jñātā ca maheśvara ---- ityabhidhāne'pi sa eva prakāra
GSP30abhiprvu:229: āpatet , iti yathā yathā prameyabhūmikāpādananyakkārakalaṅkaparihāraḥ śakyaḥ tathā tathā yāvadgati yatitavyam , iti bhūtavibhaktyā nirdeśaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:231: upadeśāvasare hi sarvātmanā tāvat sā prameyatā asya parihartum aśakyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:232: svātmani iti , svasmin anapāyirūpe svabhāve ityanena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:237: ajaḍātmā iti , yasya tu vaiśeṣikāderjaḍa ātmā sa siddhiṃ karotu īśvaraviṣayām ; anyastu sāṃkhyādiniṣedham ; sāṃkhyo'pi viṣayāvabhāsanarūpaṃ jñānaṃ buddhidharmamicchan ātmānaṃ vastuto jaḍameva upaiti ; na ca jaḍātmā
GSP30abhiprvu:238: svātmanyapi durlabhaprakāśasvātantryaleśaḥ kiṃcit sādhayituṃ niṣeddhuṃ vā prabhaviṣṇuḥ pāṣāṇa iva ; na ca ajaḍātmano'pi etad ucitam , tathā hi ----
GSP30abhiprvu:239: sa svātmani siddhimitthaṃ kuryāt ---- yadi asya so'bhinavatvena bhāsamānaḥ pūrvaṃ na bhāsate , na bhāsanaṃ cet jaḍataiva /
GSP30abhiprvu:240: niṣedhaṃ ca itthaṃ vidadhyāt ---- yadi sa na prakāśate tathā ca jaḍaḥ , na ca jaḍasya etat yuktam ityuktam , nāpi ajaḍasya ; tasmāt saṃvitprakāśa eva ghaṭādiprakāśaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:241: , na tvasau svatantraḥ kaścit vāstavaḥ ; prakāśa eva ca ātmāḥ ; tat na tatra kārakavyāpāravat pramāṇavyāpāro'pi nityatvavat svaprakāśatvasyāpi tatra bhāvāt //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:242: nanu kārakavyāpāraḥ pramāṇavyāpāraśca yadi īśvare na saṃbhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:243: tarhi pratyabhijñāpayāmi ---- iti yo vyāpāra uktaḥ sa katamo vyāpāraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:247: sa īśvarasvabhāva ātmā prakāśate tāvat , tatra ca asya svātantryam iti na kenacidvapuṣā na prakāśate , tatra aprakāśātmanāpi prakāśate
GSP30abhiprvu:249: tatrāpi prakāśātmani sarvathā prakāśātmanā prakāśo bhāgaśo vā ; bhāgaśaḥ prakāśane sarvasya vyatirekeṇa avyatirekeṇa vā , katipayasya vyatirekeṇa avyatirekeṇa vā , uktaprakārapūrṇatayā vā ; tadamī sapta prakārāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:250: tatra prathamaḥ prakāro jaḍollāsaḥ , antyaḥ paramaśivātmā , madhyamā jīvā bhāsāḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:251: , saiva bhagavato māyā vimohinī nāma śaktiḥ , tadvaśāt prakāśātmatayā satatam avabhāsamāne'pi ātmani bhāgena aprakāśanavaśād anupalakṣite sarvathā hṛdayaṃgamībhāvamaprāpte ata eva pūrṇatāvabhāsanasādhyām
GSP30abhiprvu:252: arthakriyām akurvati , tatpūrṇatāvabhāsanātmakābhimānaviśeṣasiddhaye pratyabhijñā vyākhyātapūrvā pradarśyate , katham ? śakteḥ īśvaraniṣṭhatvena prasiddhāyā dṛkkriyātmikāyāḥ , āviṣkaraṇena pradarśanena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:253: abhimānasādhyārthakriyāṇāṃ tadabhimānasiddhyā vinā asiddheḥ ; tathā ca dṛṣṭāntaṃ darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:256: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- na kārakavyāpāro bhagavati , nāpi
GSP30abhiprvu:257: jñāpakavyāpāro'yam , api tu mohāpasāraṇamātrametat , vyavahārasādhanānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ tāvatyeva viśrānteḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:259: ityanena hi ghaṭo na jñāpyate pratyakṣeṇaiva prakāśamānatvāt , anyathā pakṣe hetvasiddheḥ , kevalaṃ mohamātramapasāryate /
GSP30abhiprvu:260: yaścāyaṃ mohastadapasāraṇaṃ ca yat , tadubhayamapi bhagavata eva vijṛmbhāmātram ,
GSP30abhiprvu:261: na tu adhikaṃ kiṃcit ---- ityuktaṃ vakṣyate ca //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:262: nanu paridṛśyamāne bhāvarāśau kimīyā śaktirāviṣkriyate kaṃ ca prati iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:263: jaḍānāṃ tāvat na jñānātmikā śaktirasti , kriyātmikāpi svātantryaprāṃā svātantryavyapagamād asaṃbhāvanābhūmireva ; tathā ca ratho
GSP30abhiprvu:264: gacchati ---- ityādau upacāraṃ kecana pratipannāḥ , na ca jaḍānprati
GSP30abhiprvu:266: tarhi sarvasya svātmā maheśvara ---- iti dūrataraṃ viprakarṣitā pratyāśā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:269: jñānaṃ kriyā ca bhūtānāṃ jīvatāṃ jīvanaṃ matam // Ipk_1,1.4 //
GSP30abhiprvu:270: tathā hi iti yuktyupakramaṃ dyotayati , dṛśyatāṃ kila ityarthaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:271: / tathā ityanena sādhyaṃ sūcyate , hinā heturityanye , prakṛtaṃ sādhyaṃ hetusiddhyāyattamupakramyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:272: tena iti buddhivartinā , tata eva smaryamāṇena granthena varṇayiṣyamāṇena prakāreṇa yasmāt sarvametad yuktam iti tathā hi iti śabdasya vārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:273: iha tāvat bhāvarāśiryathā vimṛśyate tathā asti , astitvasya prakāśaṃ śaraṇīkurvataḥ prakāśaprāṇitadeśīyaṃ āśritya samunmevāt , avimṛṣṭaṃ hi yadi vastu tanna nīlaṃ na pītaṃ na sat na asaditi kuta iti paryanuyoge kimuttaraṃ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:274: tena yad yathā yāvat avādhitaṃ vimṛśyate tat tathā tāvat asti , tat eva deśakālākāravitatātmāno
GSP30abhiprvu:276: ityādinā , tataśca vitatamapi idaṃ viśvaṃ saṃkṣepavimarśadaśādhirohe jaḍaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:278: tatra jaḍā vimṛśyamānā na svatantrā bhavanti , vimṛśyamānatā hi teṣāṃ na svaśarīraviśrāntaḥ ko 'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:279: dharmaḥ jaḍatvābhāvaprasaṃgāt , mama nīlaṃ bhāti mayā nīlaṃ jñāyate iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:280: teṣām jaḍabhūtānāṃ cinmayatve 'pi māyākhyayā īśvaraśaktyā jāḍyaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:281: prāpitānām , jīvantaṃ pramātāramāśritya pratiṣṭhā tatpramātrābhimukhyena avasthānam , tato jaḍā nāma na pṛthak santi /
GSP30abhiprvu:286: sa eva hi svātmanā san vaktavyo yasya anyānupahitaṃ rūpaṃ cakāsti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:287: na ca bhārūpānupahitaṃ jaḍaṃ nāma kiñcit , tena jaḍānāṃ hi
GSP30abhiprvu:289: ye tu anye jaḍebhyo jīvanta ---- iti nāma prasiddhāḥ teṣāmapi śarīraprāṇapuryaṣṭakaśūnyākārāḥ tāvat jaḍā eva iti teṣāmapi kimucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:290: ata eva ghaṭaśarīraprāṇasukhatadbh|avarūpaṃ yallagnaṃ bhāti tadeva
GSP30abhiprvu:291: jīvarūpabhūtaṃ satyam ; tasya ca āpāte yadyapi bahutvaṃ bhāti tathāpi tat jaḍātmakavedyaśarīrādyupādheḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:293: jīvā hi jaḍabhedāt bhedabhāginaḥ jaḍāśca jīvabhedāt , etaddeho 'yam
GSP30abhiprvu:294: etadvedyo 'yam ---- iti bhedam upeyuḥ , nīlapītādibhāvabhedāstu pramātṛsaṃlagnatayā bhedabhūmimeva paramadhirūḍhā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:296: tadayaṃ jīvānāmabheda eva saṃpanna iti jīvan pramātā ---- iti jātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:297: jīvanaṃ ca jīvanakartṛtvaṃ tacca jñānakriyātmakam , yo hi jānāti ca karoti ca sa jīvati ---- ityucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:300: tanmātrānubandhitvādeva siddham ; tadapi ca kalpiteśvare rājādau tathā vyāptigrahaṇāt , yo yāvati jñātā kartā ca sa tāvati īśvarp rājeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:301: anīśvarasya jñātṛtvakartṛtve svabhāvaviruddhe yataḥ ; ātmā ca viśvatra
GSP30abhiprvu:302: jñātā kartā ca ---- iti siddhā pratyabhijñā /
GSP30abhiprvu:303: jñānakriyāśakto eva svābhāvikyau aprarūḍhabhedonmeṣe sadāśiveśvarau , bhedasya sāmānyataḥ prarohe vidyākale , viśoṣataḥ prarohe buddhikarmendriyagaṇa iva bhaviṣyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:304: jaḍā iti ajīvantaḥ , anye ca jīvanta ---- ityāpāte tāvad bhāti na tu saṃvidāpāte bhātīti jīvatāmiti jaṅgamā eva amī itthaṃ nirdiṣṭāḥ //4//
GSP30abhiprvu:305: nanu jñānakriye eva kathaṃ siddhe yata aiśvaryavyavahāraḥ prasādhyate ---- iti śaṅkāṃ śamayitumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:306: tatra jñānaṃ svataḥ siddhaṃ kriyā kāyāśritā satī /
GSP30abhiprvu:308: ahaṃ jānāmi , mayā jñātaṃ jñāsyate ca ---- ityevaṃ svaprakāśāhaṃparāmarśapariniṣṭhitameva idaṃ jñānaṃ nāma , kiṃ tatra anyat
GSP30abhiprvu:309: vicāryate , tadaprakāśe hi viśvam andhatamasaṃ syāt , tadapi vā na syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:314: tannihnave hi kaḥ praśnaḥ , kim uttaraṃ ca syāt ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:315: tatra ca jānāmi ---- ityantaḥsaṃrambhayogo 'pi bhāti , yena śuklāderguṇāt atyantajaḍāt jānāmi ---- iti ---- vapuḥ citsvabhāvatām abhyetiḥ ; sa ca saṃrambho vimarśaḥ kriyāśaktirbhavati yaduktam asmatparameṣṭhiśrosromānandapādaiḥ ----
GSP30abhiprvu:318: tena āntarī kriyāśaktiḥ jñānavadeva svataḥ siddhā svaprakāśā , saiva tu svaśaktyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:319: prāṇapuryaṣṭakakrameṇa śarīramapi saṃcaramāṇā spandanarūpā satī vyāpārātmikā māthāpade 'pi pramāṇasya pratyakṣāderviṣayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:320: sā ca paraśarīrādisāhityena avagatā svaṃ svabhāvaṃ jñātmakamavagamayati , na ca jñānam idantathā bhāti , idantā hi ajñānatvam , na ca anyadvastu anyena vapuṣā bhātaṃ bhātaṃ bhavet , tat jñānaṃ bhātyeva param , bhāti ca yat
GSP30abhiprvu:321: tadeva ahamityasya vapuḥ iti parajñānamapi svātmaivaḥ ; paratvaṃ kevalam upādherdehādeḥ , sa cāpi vicārito yāvat na anya iti viśvaḥ pramātṛvargaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:322: paramārthata ekaḥ pramātā sa eva ca asti /
GSP30abhiprvu:326: tataśca bhagavān sadāśivo jānāti ityataḥ prabhṛti krimirapi jānāti ---- ityantam eka eva pramātā iti phalataḥ sarvajñatvaṃ pramātuḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:330: sadāśivātmanā vedmi sa vā vetti madātmanā //
GSP30abhiprvu:333: ūhyate ityanena jñānena jñānasya prameyatvaṃ na nirvahati ----
GSP30abhiprvu:334: iti darśayati , anyathā hi anumīyate ---- iti brūyāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:336: saṃvedanapathe , te iyataiva ātmānamīśvaraṃ vidvāṃso ghaṭaśarīraprāṇasukhatadabhāvān tatraiva nimajjayanta īśvarasamāviṣṭā eva
GSP30abhiprvu:339: upa iti ātmanaḥ samīpe ṭaṅkavat īśvarapratyabhijñānalakṣaṇa utkarṣo hanyate viśrāmyate yena ; etāvadeva ca asya granthasya tātparyam ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:341: upāṃśu avitataṃ kṛtvā uditi śāstrasya ūrdhva eva hanyate apasāryate prameyaviṣayo vyāmoho yena ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:342: gatyarthatvādvā hanterjñānamarthaḥ , jñāyate prameyaṃ yena iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:343: kecittu gatiṃ striyaṃ gacchati ---- ityetadviṣayameva hantyarthamāhuḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:352: iha yat paramārtharūpaṃ āśaṅkyamānapratipakṣapratikṣepeṇa nirūpayiṣyamāṇaṃ suṣṭhutamāṃ spaṣṭokṛtaṃ bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:355: jñānānandaṃ ca nirdvandvaṃ deva vṛtvā vivṛṇvate //}
GSP30abhiprvu:356: tatreha anātmānīśvaravādināṃ bhrāntibhedanapūrvakaṃ paramārthaṃ vivarīṣyan tadudbhāvanaṃ tāvat ekādaśabhiḥ ślokaiḥ karoti
GSP30abhiprvu:361: tatra ślokadvayena ātmano dhruvasya dṛśyānupalabdhyā abhāva uktaḥ pratyakṣātmavādinaḥ prati
GSP30abhiprvu:362: tatra ślokatrayeṇa smṛtyanusaṃdhānaṃ saṃskārāt siddham iti anyabāsiddhatvāt ātmānumānāya na paryāptam ---- iti proktam anumeyātmavādinaḥ prati /
GSP30abhiprvu:363: tatra ślokena jñānādi guṇairguṇini pratipattiḥ ---- iti anumānaṃ nirastam /
GSP30abhiprvu:364: evam ātmānaṃ nirākṛtya , tato jñānakriyāśaktisaṃbandharūpamaiśvarya nirākartuṃ jñānasya svarūpameva vyatiriktaṃ vādyantaramate , sāṃkhyamate ca ayujyamānam ---- iti nirūpitaṃ ślokadvayena tata ekena kriyā nāma na kācit kvacidapi asti ---- iti kathitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:365: tatra sādhakaṃ pratikṣipya bādhakaṃ ca upanyasyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:366: tataḥ saṃbandhasya ślokena nāstitvaṃ pratipāditaṃ pramāṇābhāvaṃ vadatā /
GSP30abhiprvu:367: ślokenaiva tatra bādhakaṃ pramāṇamuktvā , na ātmā sthiro nāpi jñātṛtvakartṛtvalakṣaṇam asya aiśvaryam ---- iti svapakṣa upasaṃhṛtaḥ ----
GSP30abhiprvu:371: sābhilāpaṃ vikalpākhyaṃ bahudhā nāpi tad dvayam // Ipk_1,2.1 //
GSP30abhiprvu:374: nanu iti ākṣepe ; iha ātmā saṃvitsvabhāvaḥ sthiraḥ iti tāvadayuktam , sthirasyāpi svaprakāśasya aprakāśanāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:377: ityādirūpeṇa jñānānyeva prakāśante bhinnakāntāni bhinnaviṣayāṇi bhinnakārāṇi ca /
GSP30abhiprvu:378: tatra nīlasya prakāśaḥ svalakṣaṇābhāsaṃ jñānam svam anyānanuyāyi svarūpasaṃkocabhāji , lakṣaṇam deśakālākārarūpaṃ yasya
GSP30abhiprvu:379: ābhāsaḥ prakāśanam antarmukhaṃ yasmin bahirmukhīnasvarūpadhāriṇi jñāne tat avikalpakam viṣayabhede 'pi ekajātīyam , svarūpavaicitrye 'pi kāraṇābhāvāt
GSP30abhiprvu:380: / vikalpe hi vaicitryakāraṇam abhilāpaḥ , sa ca ata nāsti ; na hi abhilāpo
GSP30abhiprvu:381: nīlasya dharmaḥ , na ca cakṣurgrāhyaḥ , tato 'sau prācyaḥ smartavyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:382: aprabuddhe ca saṃskāre na smṛtiḥ , tatprabodhaśca vastudarśanotthitaḥ iti
GSP30abhiprvu:384: tataḥ paraṃ vikalpakaṃ jñānam , sarvasya vikalpasya sākṣāt
GSP30abhiprvu:386: param iti ca anyarūpaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tasya viṣayaḥ , svalakṣaṇe 'tisaṃkocini
GSP30abhiprvu:388: kartum aśakyatvāt , kṛtasyāpi vaiyarthyāt , tena hi ananuyāyinā na punarvyavahāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:391: śabdanaṃ ca idam ---- iti , tat ---- iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:392: tadidam ---- iti , bhavedidam ---- iti , idaṃ vā idam ---- ityādi bahudhā bhidyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:393: tacca na viṣayapakṣo vartate , api tu tasya vikalpasya svarūpameva vicitrokurvat pratibhāti iti vikalpo bahubhedaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:395: syādetat , yallagnāsau paramparā so'pi ābhāti ---- iti ; tatra ,
GSP30abhiprvu:396: yato dvayamapi etad avikalpetararūpaṃ na anyasya kasyacit etadatiriktasya draṣṭuḥ anubhavituḥ saṃbandhi , dṛśyasya tu bhavatu bāhyārthavāde /
GSP30abhiprvu:397: atra hetuḥ ---- yataḥ tasya draṣṭuḥ , ata eva saṃvitsvabhāvatopagamāt
GSP30abhiprvu:398: svaprakāśatāyogyatvāt āpannopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpteḥ , atra etadbodhadvayamadhye nāsti avabhāsaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:399: nanu astyeva avabhāsaḥ ---- iti asiddhā dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:400: tathā hi ---- ahaṃ vedmi , niścinomi , smarāmi idam ---- iti vidādiprakṛtyartharūpāt jñānasmṛtyādeḥ idam ---- iti ca karmarūpāt viṣayāt atiriktameva aham ---- iti anuyāyini prakāśe
GSP30abhiprvu:402: ka evamāha bhāti ---- iti ? bhānaṃ hi avikalpakam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:404: nanu tathāpi kim anena vikalpyate , śarīrasantāno vā kṛśo'ham ---- ityādipratyayāt , jñānasantāno vā sukhyaham ---- iti pratīteḥ ? matvarthīyaśca santānameva spṛśati
GSP30abhiprvu:406: tadetaduktam ---- ahaṃpratītirapi śarīram , ādigrahaṇāt jñānam , avasyati , saṃtānarūpatayā vikalpayati avaśyam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:408: eṣā iti na asmābhirnihnutā , sābhilāpaṃ vikalpākhyam ityanena saṃgṛhītatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:409: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- ahaṃpratītireva tāvat na ātmā , tasyā api vikalparūpatvāt asthairyācca
GSP30abhiprvu:410: etatpratītipratyayo 'pi nāsti anyaḥ śarīrādeḥ , bhavannapi vā vedyapakṣapatitaḥ syāt ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:411: tathāpi saṃvitsaṃvedyavyatiriktasya ātmano na siddhiḥ ---- ityetat apiśabdena dyotitam
GSP30abhiprvu:412: evaṃ nāsti ātmā saṃvitsaṃvedyatryatirikto dṛśyasya tasyānupalabdheḥ ---- iti //1// //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:415: kathaṃ bhavenna nityaḥ syādātmā yadyanubhāvakaḥ // Ipk_1,2.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:416: iha smṛtikāle susmūrṣito 'rtho bhavatu , dhvaṃsatāṃ vā ---- iti
GSP30abhiprvu:417: kintena(KSS: kimanena) , anubhavastāvat dhvastaḥ ---- ityatra sarvasya avivādaḥ , tameva ca anurundhānā smṛtirjāyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:418: tathā hi ---- smṛtau na arthasya prakāśaḥ , na adhyavasāyaḥ , nāpi anubhavasya arthasya ca aṅgulidvayavat , nāpi anubhavaviśiṣṭasya arthasya daṇḍivat , sarvatra ayam ---- iti pratyayaprasaṅgāt ; kiṃtu anubhavaprakāśa eva smṛtau pradhānam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:421: sarvathā yadi anubhavo dhvastaḥ , tadā tatprakāśarūpā kathaṃ smṛtistaddvāreṇa arthaviṣayā syāt , tayā ca sarvo vyavahāraḥ kriyamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ ityasau svarūpeṇa anapahnavanīyā satī anubhavasya nāśe
GSP30abhiprvu:426: tattu na adhikam ihaiva unmīlitam ācāryeṇa , vaktavyaśeṣavivakṣayā pūrvapakṣo mā
GSP30abhiprvu:429: arhtastāvat tasyām akiṃcitkaraḥ , anubhavaśca dhvastaḥ iti na kenacitprakāreṇa smṛtiḥ syāt
GSP30abhiprvu:430: tadabhāve ca saṃketaśabdasmṛtyāyattā api astaṅgatāḥ sarve vikalpāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:431: nirvikalpaṃ ca andhabadhiramūkaprāyam iti hanta nirākrandam avasīdet viśvam ---- iti //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:432: iha kāryātirekeṇa tādṛk kalpanīyaṃ yat kāryasiddhaye paryāpnoti
GSP30abhiprvu:433: , na caivam ātmā , artho hi tāvat smaryate , sa ca anubhavaprakāśamukhena
GSP30abhiprvu:434: , anubhavaśca dhvastaḥ ---- ityuktam ; yadi ātmā kaścidasti , kiṃ tena /
GSP30abhiprvu:435: etadapi hi vaktavyam ---- ākāśamapi asti ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:436: atha ucyate ---- na kevalena ātmanā etat siddhyati , api tu anubhavasaṃskāro 'pi atra upayogī ---- iti , tarhi sa evāstu , kim anena ? ---- tadetat darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:439: dṛṣṭeṣu anubhūteṣu vastuṣu yā smṛtiḥ tasyām anubhavo dṛgātmā dvāram arthāśasparśe , sa ca satyapy ātmani naṣṭo'nubhavaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:440: tasya hi anāśe idam ---- ityeṣa eva atruṭitaḥ prakāśaḥ iti kā smṛtiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:442: yatraiva viṣaye anubhavo vṛttaḥ tadeva tasyāḥ smṛteḥ padaṃ smaryamāṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:443: tatpadā ---- iti bahuvrīhiḥ , sā iti smṛtiḥ //4//
GSP30abhiprvu:444: nanu jñānāntarasya viṣayeṇa kathaṃ tasyāḥ viṣayitvābhimānaḥ ----
GSP30abhiprvu:448: anubhavena hi saṃskāro janyate svocitaḥ , saṃskāraśca prātanarūpāṃ sthitiṃ sthāpayati , ākṛṣṭaśākhādeścirasaṃvartitasya vivartyamānasya bhūrjādeḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:449: tena atrāpi saṃskāraḥ tāṃ smṛtiṃ pūrvānubhavānukāriṇīṃ karoti ---- iti tadviṣaya eva smṛterviṣayaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:450: evaṃ tarhi antargaḍuḥ yathā āyāsāya param , tadvat ātmā sthiraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:451: kalpanāyāsamātraphalaḥ iti kiṃ tena , sarvaṃ hi saṃskāreṇa
GSP30abhiprvu:453: nanu tasmaiva saṃskārasya āśrayo vaktavyaḥ , sa hi guṇatvād
GSP30abhiprvu:454: āśrayamapekṣate , ya āśrayaḥ sa ātmā syāt ---- ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:457: iha saṃskāre jāyamāne , yadi ātmano viśeṣaḥ , sa tarhi avyatiriktaḥ iti na nityaḥ syāt ; atha na kaścit asya viśeṣaḥ , tena tarhi kim /
GSP30abhiprvu:458: atha saṃskāra eva asya viśeṣaḥ , tarhi na vyatirikto 'sau iti punarapi anitye jñāne saṃskāraḥ ---- ityāyātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:459: anubhavādviśiṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasmrṭyākhyakāryakāri jñānaṃ paramparayā jāyate ---- iti iyāneva saṃskārārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:460: atha saṃskārātmā vyatirikto viśeṣaḥ , tasya tarhi kimasau
GSP30abhiprvu:464: ---- tataḥ iti ātmano bhinneṣu dharmeṣu aṅgīkriyamāṇeṣu teṣu satsvapi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:465: ātmanaḥ svarūpe viśeṣābhāvāt sa tāvat ātmā smrṭau na vyāpriyeta ,
GSP30abhiprvu:468: ahaṃ smarāmi ---- iti yaḥ smartā so'pi śarīrasaṃtāno jñānasaṃtānaśca adhyāvasīyate , yathā draṣṭā /
GSP30abhiprvu:472: evam ātmani sādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca parākṛtam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:473: bādhakaṃ ca sūcitaṃ ---- dharmayoge nityatāhāni , anyathā kiṃ tena /
GSP30abhiprvu:478: ittham ātmānaṃ nirākṛtya , tasya aiśvaryamapi nirākartuṃ jñānaśaktimeva parīkṣitumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:479: jñānaṃ ca citsvarūpaṃ cet tad anityaṃ kimātmavat /
GSP30abhiprvu:483: tatra ātmavādī nityatvam ātmana itthaṃ brūte ---- iha kālo nāma idaṃbhāvaviśiṣṭasya viśeṣaṇatām avalambamānaḥ taṃ viśiṣṭīkurvan tatsaṃkocāt anityaṃ saṃpādayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:484: ātmanaśca citsvabhāvatvāt idam ---- iti prathanābhāvena viśeṣyatvaṃ nāsti
GSP30abhiprvu:485: , viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo hi yojakāyattaḥ , na ca svaprakāśe yojakāntaram asti /
GSP30abhiprvu:486: sa itthaṃ bruvāṇaḥ paryanuyujyate ---- jñānamapi tarhi svaprakāśam
GSP30abhiprvu:487: iti tatrāpi eṣaiva vārtā iti tadapi kasmāt na nityam ? na ca dvayornityayoḥ kaścit saṃbandhaḥ , kāryakāraṇabhāvo hi asau nānyaḥ , tata ātmano jñānaṃ śaktiḥ iti avasannam adaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:488: atha na svaprakāśaṃ jñānaṃ tarhi parasyāpi ado na prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:489: svaprakāśarūpāveśanaṃ hi asau parasya vidadhat bodhaḥ prakāśo bhavati parasyāpi , tataḥ svaprakāśatāśūnyo na asau arthasya prakāśaḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:491: jaḍo'pyasau ittham arthasya prakāśo bhaviṣyati ---- iti sāṃkhyamatam āśaṅkate
GSP30abhiprvu:497: sarvaṃ prati tathātvaprasaṅgāt , na kaṃcitprati vā iti sarvajñam ajñaṃ vā jagat syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:498: nāpi arthe anyata etadrūpam upanipatitam , eṣa eva hi doṣaḥ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:499: tat nūnam anyatraiva ayaṃ dharmaḥ tattvāntare , tatrāpi katham arthasya prakāśaḥ syāt iti nūnaṃ tatra tattvāntare so'rthaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:501: tat tattvāntaraṃ sattvaprādhānyāt pratibimbagrahayogyaṃ tamasā''cchāditatvāt sakalapratibimbanato vyāvartitam , bhāge rajasā tamaso'pasāraṇāt kiṃcideva pratibimbakaṃ gṛhyāti , tadeva buddhitattvam ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:503: evam arthasya tāvat rūpaṃ buddhiḥ dhārayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:504: iyaśca sattvādīnāṃ sukhaduḥkhamoharūpatayāṃ bhogyatvāt jaḍam iti darpakṣavat aprakāśam /
GSP30abhiprvu:505: na ca bhogyasya aprakāśasya tadviruddhabhoktṛtārūpaprakāśātmakasvabhāvasaṃbhavo yuktyanupātī iti tadvilakṣaṇena bhoktrā bhavitavyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:507: ityetāvatsvabhāvaḥ , svabhāvāntaraṃ hi aprakāśarūpaṃ bhogyaṃ kathaṃ bhoktuḥ svabhāvatayā saṃbhāvyeta /
GSP30abhiprvu:508: sa ca prakāśamātrasvabhāvatvenaiva yadi viśvasya prakāśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:509: tarhi yugapadeva prakāśeta , ghaṭaprakāśo'pi paṭaprakāśaḥ syāt iti viśvaṃ saṃkīryeta /
GSP30abhiprvu:510: sa ca arthāt arthapratibimbāt tadādhārācca buddhitattvāt anyaḥ katham arthasya prakāśaḥ syāt , asaṃbandhāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:512: tataḥ prakāśapratibimbaparigrahamahimopanataprakāśāveśabuddhitattvāveśitapratibimbakanīlādyarthaparyantasaṃkrānteḥ prakāśāveśasya arthaḥ prakāśate iti siddho vyavahāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:513: tadevaṃ jñānaṃ jaḍabuddhitattvāvyatirekāt jaḍamapi citpratibimbayogāt viṣayasya prakāśaḥ ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:514: etadeva tāvat anucitam ---- yat prakāśātmā pumān buddhau pratibimbam arpayati , samānaguṇe bimbakāpekṣayā ca vimale pratibimbasaṃkrāntidarśanāt , rūpavati ādarśe ghaṭarūpapratibimbavat ātmabuddhyośca ativailakṣaṇyam , ātmāpekṣayā ca na buddhirvimalā tat bahvatu tāvat etat ---- iti atha śabdena sūcayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:515: kiṃtu pratibimbavādenāpi na kiṃcit pratisamāhitaṃ bhavet ----
GSP30abhiprvu:518: caitanyapratibimbayoge yadi tāvat tatpratibimbakamapi mukhyaṃ prakāśarūpameva na bhavati , tenāpi na kiṃcit kṛtaṃ syāt , na hi pratibimbatavahnipuñja ādarśo dāhyaṃ dahet /
GSP30abhiprvu:519: atha mukhyaprakāśarūpameva tatpratibimbakam , tat tarhi buddheravyatiriktam iti mukhyaprakāśarūpaiva buddhirjātā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:521: sa eva punaḥ jājvalyamānaṃ nijam ojo jṛmbhayati , tataśca sā buddhireva
GSP30abhiprvu:528: prāgvat nityatāprasaṅgaḥ ; na ceta cidrūpasyāpi nityatā , tarhi ātmā na
GSP30abhiprvu:529: nityaḥ kaścidasti , yasya jñānaṃ nāma śaktiḥ syāt iti jñānamātrameva asti /
GSP30abhiprvu:530: yo 'rthaprakāśarūpo bodho yaśca vikalpasmṛtyādirūpaḥ tāvatā arthavyavahārasiddheḥ ---- iti prasaṅgaviparyayalābhaḥ jñānaṃ ca citsvarūpaṃ cet ityādeḥ ślokadvayasya tātparyam //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:534: iha parispandarūpaṃ tāvat gavcchati , calati, patati ---- ityādi yat pratibhāsagocaram , tatra gṛhaseśagatadevadattasvarūpāt anantaraṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:535: bāhyadeśavartidevadattasvarūpam ---- ityetāvat upalabhyate , na tu tatsvarūpātiriktāṃ kāṃcit anyāṃ kriyāṃ pratīmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:536: devadatto dinaṃ tiṣṭhati ityatra tu prabhātakālāviṣṭadevadattasvarūpaṃ tataḥ praharakālāliṅgitatatsvarūpam ---- ityādi bhāti , dugdhaṃ pariṇamate ityatra madhuravasturūpam amlavasturūpam dravarūpaṃ kaṭhinarūpam ----
GSP30abhiprvu:538: evaṃ sādṛśyācca tatra pratyabhijñā bhinne'pi kāyakeśanasvādāviva
GSP30abhiprvu:540: svarūpasyaiva deśatvāt , kālabhede ca svarūpabhedāt , deśakālākārā ākāra eva yadyapi paryavasmanti , tathāpi sthūladṛṣṭyā asti bhedaḥ iti te hi bhedena bauddhairucyante ---- iti tātparyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:541: evaṃ pratyakṣeṇa na dṛśyate kacit kriyā , tadbhāvāt na tatpūrvakeṇa anumānena , kāryaṃ ca prāmaprāptyādyuttarakṣaṇarūpaṃ taddeśavasturūpādi iti
GSP30abhiprvu:543: evaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ tasyā adṛṣṭiḥ ---- iti sādhakapramāṇābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:546: tatra pūrvāpararūpatā kṣaṇānāṃ vikalpabudvyānusaṃdhānāt , na tu svātmani kiṃcit pūrvam aparaṃ vā , vastumātraṃ hi tat /
GSP30abhiprvu:547: ato vikalpaprāṇitaṃ pūrvāparībhūtatvaṃ kramarūpatā kriyāyāḥ kiṃcit kṣaṇaṃ na vastu spṛśati , te hi kṣaṇā na anyonyasvarūpāviṣṭāḥ iti katham ekā kriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:548: kramo hi bhedena vyāptaḥ abhiśne tadabhāvāt , bhedasya viruddham ekyam iti kathaṃ kramikā ekā ca iti syāt ? atha ekatra āśraye'vasthānāt ekā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:549: tatrāpi tatkṣaṇātirikto na kaścit āśrayo'nubhūyate , kṣaṇā eva hi
GSP30abhiprvu:551: kiṃ ca tathābhūtairbhinnadeśakālākāraiḥ kriyākṣaṇairāviṣṭa āśrayaḥ kathamekaḥ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:552: ata eva devadatto'yam, sa eva grāmaṃ prāptaḥ iti sādṛśyāt bhavantī pratyabhijñā na aikyaṃ vāstavaṃ gamayitumalam //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:553: evaṃ jñānaṃ kriyāṃ ca parīkṣya , yasmin sati te saṃbaddhe sarvajñatvasarvakartṛtārūpaiśvaryaprasādhanāya prabhavataḥ , taṃ saṃbandhaṃ dhvaṃsayituṃ tadviṣayaṃ pramāṇābhāvaṃ tāvadāha
GSP30abhiprvu:556: mṛtppiṇḍe sati stūpakaḥ , tatra sati śiviko yāvat ghaṭaḥ ityevaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:557: bhāvakṣaṇā eva upalabhyante , na adhikaṃ kiṃcit pratyakṣeṇa avabhāsate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:559: sarvatra ādhārādheyabhāvādau ayameva panthāḥ ---- pṛthagrūpakuṇḍavadarakṣaṇānantaraṃ nirantarātmakaviśiṣṭakuṇḍavadarodayaḥ ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:560: ayameva ca bhāvo bhāvāntareṇa saha niyatapūrvāparatayā vikalpena vyavahiyamāṇaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ ---- iti abhidhīyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:561: na ca jñānakriyābhyāṃ saha ātmanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ ātmanastatkāryatvābhāvāt , jñānasya ca svasāmagrokāryatvāt , kriyāyāśca abhāvāt iti na jñānakriyāsaṃbandho yato
GSP30abhiprvu:563: evaṃ pramāṇaṃ parākṛtya , saṃbandhe bādhakaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣamukhena nirūpayati
GSP30abhiprvu:566: saṃbandhastāvat parasparaprāptirūpo dvayoḥ prāptibhājorekastiṣṭhati ---- iti sāmānyalakṣaṇam
GSP30abhiprvu:567: tacca katham ? na hi ekatra viśramitāśeṣaśarīrasāro'nyatra viśramitum alam svarūpabhedaprasaṅgāt
GSP30abhiprvu:570: yo'pi cetaneṣu tatkalpanayā ca acetaneṣu pāratantryātmā saṃbandho vyavahiyate , tatra siddhasya na pāratantryam asti siddhatvādeva , asiddhasya natarāṃ niḥsvarūpasya tāddharmyāyogāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:572: dve ca rūpe kathaṃ śliṣyataḥ ? dvayorekatvānupapatteḥ ; ekatve vā kaḥ śleṣaḥ ? tasmāt jñānasaṃbandhāt jñātā iti yathā vikalpakalpito 'rtho na vastu tathā
GSP30abhiprvu:573: kriyāsaṃbandhāt kartā ityapi kalpanāmātram ---- iti pūrvapakṣasya saṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:575: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃ pratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ jñānādhikāre pūrvapakṣavivṛtirnāma dvitīyamāhnikam // 2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:579: etasmin pūrvapakṣe yaduktaṃ smṛteḥ saṃskāramātrādeva siddhiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:585: kriyāyāṃ saṃbandhe ca dūṣaṇoddharaṇaṃ dvitīye kriyādhikāre bhaviṣyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:586: yattu pareṇa vyatiriktaṃ jñānaṃ kāśādasāṃkhyādidṛṣṭau nirākṛtaṃ tadabhimatameva granthakṛta iti tat dūṣaṇāntarameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:587: tatra ślokadvayena jñānasya svasaṃvedanarūpatayā anubhavasya smṛtau aprakāśatvaṃ darśitaṃ saṃskārajatve 'pi /
GSP30abhiprvu:588: tataḥ ślokadvayena smṛteḥ bhrāntitvam āśaṅkāpūrvakaṃ parākṛtya tṛtīyena prasaṅgāt sarvādhyavasāyānāmapi bhrāntitvāśaṅkā śamitā /
GSP30abhiprvu:589: tataḥ satyapi saṃskāre smṛtyanupapattau vyavahārocchedaḥ ---- iti ślokenoktvā svapakṣe
GSP30abhiprvu:594: pūrvapakṣamadhyāt mayā tāvat bahu aṅgīkartavyam ---- iti satyam ityanena darśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:595: yattu na aṅgīkartavyaṃ tat dūṣyate ---- ityetaduktaṃ kiṃtu ityanena viśeṣābhidhāyinā /
GSP30abhiprvu:596: iha smṛtau viṣayamātrasya prakāśo na samarthanīyo vartate yaḥ saṃskārādeva siddhyet , kiṃtu anubhavaprakāśena vinā tat ityevaṃrūpā kathaṃ smṛtiḥ syāt , kathaṃ ca tayā vinā abhilāṣeṇa vyavahāraḥ syāt ? anubhavena hi asya sukhasādhanatā niścitā , tata upādānam ; tatra pūrvānubhavajanitāt saṃskārāt etāvat jātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:597: yadyapi tajjñānaṃ viṣayeṇa na janitam , tathāpi tadviṣayam ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:598: na ca etāvatā kiṃcit , ātmaniṣṭhe svaprakāśajñāne viṣayasyeva anubhavasya prācyasya aprakāśāt
GSP30abhiprvu:602: rase saṃskārajatvaṃ tu tattulyatvaṃ na tadgatiḥ // Ipk_1,3.2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:603: dṛk jñānam , tacca jaḍāt vibhidyate svaprakāśaikarūpatayā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:604: jaḍo hi prakāśāt pṛthagbhūto vaktavyaḥ , tena dṛk svābhāsā , ābhāsaḥ prakāśamānatā sā svaṃ rūpamavyavhicāri yasyāḥ , svasya ca ābhāsanaṃ rūpaṃ yasyāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:605: satyapi bāhye taccharīrasaṃkrāntaṃ na prakāśanaṃ jñānasya rūpaṃ bhavitumarhati , paraprakāśanātmakanijarūpaprakāśanameva hi svaprakāśatvaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:607: nanu svābhāsameva sat tat anubhavajñānaṃ smaraṇe bhāsiṣyate , na ---- ityāha nānyena vedyā
GSP30abhiprvu:608: paratra yadi dṛk bhāseta tarhi na sā svābhāsā , idameva hi svaprakāśasya lakṣaṇam ---- svayaṃ hi yadi
GSP30abhiprvu:609: prakāśeta tadā pareṇa saha asaṃbandhāt saṃbandhaprāṇā kathaṃ paratra iti saptamī saṃgacchatām ; tathā ca rūpajñānena rase dṛk rasaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ na vedyate , evaṃ hi cakṣuṣaiva rasaḥ phalato gṛhīta eva syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:610: nanu yadi na ābhāti smaraṇe 'nubhavaḥ kiṃ tarhi saṃskāreṇa kṛtaṃ syāt , rūpajñānaṃ na rasajñānajāt saṃskārāt jātam , tat katham ayaṃ prasaṅgaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:612: naitat , yato hi asau tatsaṃskārasaṃskṛtāt samanantarapratyayāt utthitaḥ smṛtibodhaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:613: tena tatsadṛśo bhavatu śāsvāsaṃniveśa iva pūrvasaṃniveśatulyaḥ , na tu yo
GSP30abhiprvu:614: yatsaṃskārāt jātaḥ sa tasya vedanasvabhāvo bhavati ---- iti yuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:615: sadṛśatvasyāpi gatiravagamaḥ katham ? na hi anubhavajñānaṃ sādṛśyaṃ gamayati , nāpi smṛtijñānam , parasparam asaṃvedane dvayaniṣṭhasādṛśyādhyavasāyāyogāt , abhyasya ca tadubhayavedanarūpasya
GSP30abhiprvu:616: abhāvāt iti saṃskārāt paraṃ saviṣayatāmātraṃ smṛteḥ siddham , na tu anubhavaviṣayatvam , nāpi asya viṣayasya pūrvānubhavaviṣayīkṛtatvam ----
GSP30abhiprvu:618: nanu yadi smṛtijñāne anubhavasya satyataḥ prakāśaḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:619: tanmukhena ca tadviṣayasya , tadā bhavet bhavadukteravakāśaḥ , yāvatā smṛtirvikalparūpatvāt kevalamaparakāśamānameva anubhavaṃ tadviṣayaṃ ca
GSP30abhiprvu:620: adhyavasyati , tat iyaṃ bhrāntisvabhāvā , tatra ko'yaṃ nirbandhaḥ ?
GSP30abhiprvu:624: na taddarśanaṃ nāpi tadviṣayaḥ smṛterviṣayaḥ , tathāpi tu ubhayam adhyavasīyate , bhramarūpatayā smṛteḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:631: tathaiva prakāśanaṃ yat etat smṛteḥ ātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ tat tathāprakāśanābhāve vighaṭetamām /
GSP30abhiprvu:632: kiṃ ca bhrāntau asadvā ātmākāro vā prakhyāti , na tu tayā
GSP30abhiprvu:633: arthaḥ svīkriyate tasya aprakāśanāt iti tayā artho na vyavasthāpita eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:634: prakāśanātmā hi vyavasthāpanā , tataśca smaraṇādabhilāṣeṇa katham
GSP30abhiprvu:635: arthaviṣayo vyavahāraḥ ? na ca tadaprakāśane saṃskārajatvena kiṃcit kṛtyam
GSP30abhiprvu:636: , taddhi sādṛśyaṃ labdhum avalambyate ; na ca anubhavena
GSP30abhiprvu:637: viṣayaprakāśanātmanā smṛtyabhidhānāyā bhrānteḥ kicidapi sādṛśyam asti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:639: nanu yo'nubhavo yaśca tadviṣayaḥ sa yataḥ tayā adhyavasīyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:640: tataḥ aṃśāt sādṛśyam anubhavena smṛteḥ , tatsiddhaye ca saṃskāraparigrahaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:641: / adhyavasīyate iti kim ucyate ? prakāśyate iti cet na bhrāntitvam ; na prakāśyate iti cet punarapi viṣayo na spṛṣṭa eva anayā iti sādṛśyamiti
GSP30abhiprvu:645: iha smṛteḥ anyasya vā bhrāntibodhasya svasaṃvedanāṃśe prakāśamāne na bhrāntitā , tatra vaiparītyābhāvāt ; yastu tatra adhyavasīyate svākāraḥ sa viparītatayā asvākāratvena arthatayā iti tatrāṃśe bhrāntitā /
GSP30abhiprvu:646: sa cāṃśo'rthalakṣaṇo na smṛtyā anyayā vā bhrāntyā spṛśyate iti tatra asau tūṣṇīkā iti balādeva tatrāṃśe jaḍatvam asyā āyātaṃ ghaṭajñānasyeva paṭe /
GSP30abhiprvu:647: na ca jaḍena viṣayasya kiṃcit kṛtyam , tataśca arthaviṣayo vyavahāro vilupyeta /
GSP30abhiprvu:648: atha tu tam avasāyarūpaṃ svasaṃvedanāṃśaṃ svākāraṃ vā avalambya ajaḍatvam asyāḥ , evamapi ajāḍye nijaṃ svasaṃvedanam ullekhaśca svākāraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:649: ---- itīyati eṣā pariniṣṭhitā smṛtiḥ iti viṣayasya nāmāpi prahītum aśaknuvataḥ tataḥ smṛtyadhyavasāyāt kathaṃ viṣayasya vyavasthāpanaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:651: saṃskāre satyapi smṛtiḥ na kathaṃcana ghaṭate , tataśca parasparasaṅgatihīnāni sakalāni jñānāni ---- iti yaduktaṃ ślokapañcakena
GSP30abhiprvu:655: janasya lokasya yā kācana sthitiḥ vyavahāraḥ sā sarvajñānānāṃ yat anusaṃdhānam ekaviṣayabhāvopapannasmṛtitāprāptirūpam , tatra āyattā /
GSP30abhiprvu:657: prathamamapi hi pratyakṣajñānam ahamitipūrvāpararūpānusaṃdhānena smaraṇānuprāṇitena vinā na ghaṭate , pramātari viśrāntyabhāvāt apratyakṣatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:660: evaṃ jñānānām yat anusaṃdhānam tato jāyamānā janasthitiḥ evam iti parābhyupagame sati , naśyet naśyati ---- iti saṃbhāvyate , kuta iti cet , viśeṣaṇadvāreṇa hetumāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:662: anyat anubhavajñānam , anyat idānīntanaṃ jñānaṃ vikalpābhimatam , anyat smaraṇasaṃmataṃ jñānam
GSP30abhiprvu:663: tadetāni svaviṣayaprakāśamātrarūpāṇi paraviṣaye jaḍāndhāneḍamūkakalpāni , na ca anyonyasya prakāśarūpāṇi //6//
GSP30abhiprvu:664: evaṃ na svarūpato na vedyayo vā ekībhāvarūpam anusaṃdhānam asti
GSP30abhiprvu:666: na ca turyaṃ jñāteyanibandhanam anusandhānādhāyi saṃbhāvyate iti dhvaṃseran vyavahārāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:667: na ca dhvaṃsantām iti bhavadabhīṣṭaśāpamātrāt te dhvaṃsante , prakāśante yataḥ tata etat āpadyate ---- etadeva samarthayitum udyantavyam ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:668: tacca asmadabhimataprakāreṇa vinā vidherapi aśakyasamarthanam ---- iti darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:671: saṃvit tāvat prakāśate iti tāvat na kecit apahnuvate /
GSP30abhiprvu:672: sā tu saṃvit yadi svātmamātraviśrāntā arthasya sā kathaṃ prakāśaḥ ? sa hi arthadharma eva tathā syāt ; tataśca arthaprakāśaḥ tāvatyeva paryavasita iti galito grāhyagrāhakabhāvaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:673: ato 'rthaprakāśarūpaṃ saṃvidam icchatā balādeva artho'pi tadrūpāntargata eva aṅgīkratavyaḥ ; sa ca arthaprakāśo
GSP30abhiprvu:674: yadi anyaśca anyaśca , tat na smaraṇam upapannamityata eka eva asau ----
GSP30abhiprvu:676: ekatvāt sarvo vedyarāśiḥ tena kroḍīkṛtaḥ ---- ityetadapi anicchatā aṅgīkāryam /
GSP30abhiprvu:677: evamapi satatameva unmagnena nimagnena vā viśvātmanā prakāśeta , tathā svabhāvatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:678: na caivam , ataḥ svarūpāntarbruḍitam artharāśim aparamapi bhinnākāram ātmani parigṛhya , kaṃcideva arthaṃ svarūpāt unmagnam ābhāsayati ---- iti āpatitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:680: unmagnābhāsabhinnaṃ ca citsvarūpaṃ vahirmukhatvāt tacchāyānurāgāt navaṃ navaṃ jñānamuktam
GSP30abhiprvu:681: evamapi navanavābhāsāḥ pratikṣaṇam udayavyayabhāja iti saiva vyavahāranivahahāniḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:682: tena kvacit ābhāse gṛhītapūrve yat saṃvedanaṃ bahirmukham abhūt , tasya yat antarmukhaṃ citsvarūpatvaṃ tat kālāntare 'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:683: avasthāsnu svātmagataṃ tadviṣayaviśeṣe bahirmukhatvaṃ parāmṛśati iti eśā smṛtiśaktiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:684: yacca tat navaṃ bhāsayati smarati vā tat vastutaḥ saṃvidā viśvamayyā tādātmyavṛtti iti viśvamayaṃ pūrṇameva iti navaṃ na kiṃcit ābhāsitaṃ smṛtaṃ vā syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:685: idamapi pravāhapatitam urīkāryam ---- yat kila tat ābhāsyate tat saṃvido vicchiidyate , saṃvicca tataḥ , saṃvicca saṃvidantarāt , saṃvedyaṃ ca saṃvedyāntaraāt ; na ca vicchedanaṃ vastutaḥ saṃbhavati , iti vicchedanasya avabhāsamātram ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:686: na ca tat iyatā pāramārthikam , nirmīyamāṇasya sarvasya ayameva paramārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:687: yataḥ eṣa eva paritaśchedanāt pariccheda ucyate , tadavabhāsanasāmarthyam apohanaśaktiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:691: sa eva hi tena tena vapuṣā jānāti , smarati vikalpayati ca /
GSP30abhiprvu:694: jīve niruddhā tatrāpi paramātmani sā sthitā //}
GSP30abhiprvu:696: etāsāṃ ca jñānādiśaktīnām asaṃkhyaprakāro vaicitryavikalpa iti tatsāmarthyaṃ svātantryam aparādhīnaṃ pūrṇaṃ mahadaiśvaryaṃ tannirmitabrahmaviṣṇurudrādyaiśvaryāpekṣayā ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:697: tadevaṃ cidvapuḥ ityekaṃ kṛtvā iyadāyātam viśvarūpaḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:698: tata eva ca pariniṣṭhitaikarūpajaḍabhāvavailakṣaṇyāt jñānādiśaktiyuktatāmāheśvaryam upasaṃprāptaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:699: etadanupagame na kiṃcit idaṃ bhāseta ---- iti prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:700: bhāsate tu , tasmāt etat avaśyāṅgīkartavyam ---- iti prasaṅgaviparyayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:701: naśyejjanasthitiḥ , yadyevaṃ na syāt ---- iti prāktanena ślokena saha saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:705: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃ īśvarapratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ jñānādhikāre paradarśanānupapattirnāma tṛtīyamāhnikam // 3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:714: tatra saṃskāramātrāt tāvat mā nāma udapādi smṛtiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:716: katham enāṃ kuryāt ---- iti śaṅkāṃ śamayituṃ smṛtitattvanirūpaṇāya
GSP30abhiprvu:721: tatra ślokena svapakṣe smṛtirupapannā ---- iti kathitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:723: tṛtīyena anubhavena tadviṣayeṇa ca ekībhāvaparyanta āveśaḥ smaraṇasya uktaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:724: turyeṇa anubhavasya na viṣayatayā smṛtyā prakāśanam ---- iti nirūpitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:725: pañcamena yogijñānamapi anubhavaṃ pṛthagbhāvena na viṣayīkaroti ---- iti baḍatā turyaślokārtha eva upodvalitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:726: ṣaṣṭhenāśaṅkyamānam anubhavasya smṛtyā pṛthagviṣayīkaraṇaṃ kākpanikam ---- ityavāstavīkṛtam
GSP30abhiprvu:727: saptamena smṛtiprasaṅgāt vikalpe'pi pūrvānubhavena aikyātmāveśo darśitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:728: aṣṭamena smartavyasya smṛteḥ smartuśca ekacittattvaviśrāntiḥ uktā , prasaṅgācca dṛśyasya darśanasya draṣṭuśca ---- iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:732: pūrvamanubhūtasya arthasya ya upalandhā antarmukho bodhaḥ sa tāvat adyāpi parataḥ smṛtikāle'pi astyeva , saṃvinmātrasvarūpasya kālakṛtasaṃkocarūpaviśeṣātmakāvacchedāyogāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:735: iyat tu cintyam ---- akālakalite saṃvedane tadantarvartini ca viśvatra bhāvajāte
GSP30abhiprvu:736: yadi tāvat cinmayatāparāmarśaḥ , tat aham iti etāvataiva pūrṇena vimarśena
GSP30abhiprvu:738: atha idamtayā pṛthagbhāvāvabhāsanena , tathāpi tatra dvayī gatiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:739: aham ityaṃśe yadi viśrānyati idantā , tadā ahamidamitisadāśivādidaśayā bhāvyam
GSP30abhiprvu:740: atha na rohati , tat idam ityeva ābhāsanena bhavitavyam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:741: apūrvatābhāsanācca tat anubhavanameva syāt na smaraṇam ---- ityāśaṅgyāha svairī iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:742: svam ātmīyam upakaraṇam īrayati svakartavyeṣu avaśyaṃ tacchīlaśca ; svaṃ ca ātmānam īrayati na punaḥ svakartavye prerakamapekṣate ---- iti svairī svatantraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:744: sa iti vimarśanasya ca iyadrūpam ---- yat sarvathā akālakalitasvarūpaparāmarśanameva na
GSP30abhiprvu:745: nāpi atyantaṃ bhedena vimarśanameva api tu yo bhāvaḥ pūrvamanubhavakāle taddeśakālapramātrantarasācivyena pṛthakkṛto na ca ahantāyāmeva līnīkṛtaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:746: , sa tādṛgeva tamaseva ācchādya avasthāpitaḥ saṃskāraśabdavācyaḥ , tasya tamācchādakam apahastayati ; tatra apahastite sa pūrvavat pṛthakkṛte evāvabhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:747: nanu ca idantayā avabhāset pūrvavadeva , naivam /
GSP30abhiprvu:748: tadānīntanāvabhāsanapṛthakkṛtaśarīrādisaṃbandhamanavadhūyaiva hi tatprakāśaḥ ; tataśca idānīntanāvabhāsanasmaraṇakālaparāmarśo'pi na nimīlati iti tatparāmarśabhittiprādhānyena pūrvakālaparāmarśaḥ iti
GSP30abhiprvu:749: viruddhapūrvāparaparāmarśasvabhāva eva sa iti parāmarśa ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:750: evaṃ ca sa eva parameśvaraḥ smarati /
GSP30abhiprvu:751: etadeva hi tasya smartṛtvam ---- yat evaṃprakāraparāmarśocitakālakalādisparśasahiṣṇumāyāpramātṛbhāvaparigrahaḥ iti māyāvidyādvayādvayamayam /
GSP30abhiprvu:752: tata eva sakalasiddhivitaraṇacaturacintāmaṇiprakhyam āgamikāḥ smaraṇameva mantrādiprāṇitaṃ manyante /
GSP30abhiprvu:759: kālasparśam arthaviśrāntatāṃ dvayorapi pramātari nirūḍhiṃ bhedābhedābhyāṃ darśayati , vṛtto ekārthībhāvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:762: tatra yadi kaścid brūyāt ---- iha smṛtirvikalpaḥ , na ca anenārthaḥ prakāśyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:763: arthāsaṃsparśino hi vikalpāḥ , anubhavena ca yena so'rthaḥ prakāśatāṃ nītaḥ sa idānīṃ kīrtimātramūrtirjātaḥ , na ca so'pi smṛtyā prakāśyate ----
GSP30abhiprvu:764: jñānasya jñānāntareṇāsaṃvedyatvāt asattvācceti arthasya prakāśanābhāvāt idaṃ smarāmi iti jñānaṃ bhrāntimātrameva ---- iti punarapi āpatitam ----
GSP30abhiprvu:768: iha smṛtivikalpe tāvat artho 'vasīyate , anyathā suptamūrcchitakalpatāpatteḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:769: evaṃ ca yāvat adhyavasāyo'rthasya tāvat arthāt iti sāmarthyāt iyat abhyupagantavyam ---- yat so'rthaḥ prakāśate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:771: prakāśanaṃ ca na tadānīntanakālasya tyāgena , nāpi dvīkāreṇa , idam ityevāvabhāsanaprasaṅgāt
GSP30abhiprvu:778: tasya ābhāsasya karoti , kālaśaktereva bhedakatvāt iti vakṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:780: tāvatyeva vā smṛtiḥ ābhāsāntarairapi vyāmiśrā atisphuṭeti /
GSP30abhiprvu:786: bhāsayet iti vidhirūpeṇa niyogena niyamo lakṣyate , na bhāsayati ityetat
GSP30abhiprvu:790: pūrvābhāsitaṃ svalakṣaṇam iti vedyāṃśasparśī bhūtakālo ghaṭābhāsasyāpi kevalasya svālakṣaṇyāpattiheturdarśitaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:792: arthitātiśayāt tu sphuṭatvam iti atha śabdo dyotayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:795: nanu evaṃ svalakṣaṇasya prakāśane bhedena bahistadavabhāseta /
GSP30abhiprvu:796: etadeva hi bahiravabhāsanam ---- yat svalakṣaṇaprakāśanam iti
GSP30abhiprvu:798: na ca yuktaṃ smṛterbhede smaryamāṇasya bhāsanam /
GSP30abhiprvu:799: tenaikyaṃ bhinnakālānāṃ saṃvidāṃ veditaiṣa saḥ // Ipk_1,4.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:800: smaraṇajñānāt bhinnatvena bahīrūpatayā yadi so 'rtho bhāseta smaryamāṇasya ca yat bhāsanaṃ tadeva na syāt smaryamāṇameva tat na syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:802: nanu caivaṃ kathaṃ svalakṣaṇasya prakāśanam uktam ? etat na idāṇīṃ prakāśanam api tu pūrvakāle eva , tadā cāsau bahiravabhāsata eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:803: nanu cedānīṃ tarhi kim ? vimarśanam iti brūmaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:806: ubhayamapi na kiṃcit syāt , anyonyajīvitatvāt asya /
GSP30abhiprvu:807: maivam , yasya hi saṃvedanānyeva bhinnāni tattvam , tasya idam apratisamādheyameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:808: asmaddarśane tu bhinnakālā api saṃvidaḥ tatkālātyāgenaiva ekatāvabhāsanena svatantraḥ pramātā yāvadantarmukhatayā tāvatyaṃśe vimṛśati tāvat prakāśasya tātkālikabahirbhāvābhāso vimarśasya idānīntanāntarmukhā sthitiriti /
GSP30abhiprvu:809: etadeva vedanādhikaṃ veditṛtvaṃ ---- vedaneṣu saṃyojanaviyojanayoḥ yathāruci karaṇaṃ svātantryam , kartṛtvaṃ ca etadeva
GSP30abhiprvu:811: ghaṭamahamanvabhūvam iti vā sa ghaṭaḥ iti vā aikyam anusaṃdhānam anusaṃdhāturabhinnam iti darśayituṃ yadeva aikyaṃ sa eva veditā iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena darśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:812: eṣa sa iti ācchāditasyeva pramātṛtattvasya sphuṭāvabhāsanaṃ kṛtam , idam iti , vismayagarbhayānayā uktyā pratyabhijñā
GSP30abhiprvu:818: nanu ca prācya eva anubhavo yadi smaryamāṇasya bahiravabhāsanarūpaḥ prakāśaḥ tarhi iyat ucyatām ---- so'nubhava idānīṃ smaraṇena viṣayīkriyate ---- iti , aikyena tu alaukikena ko'rthaḥ iti vyāmohaṃ vihantumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:821: pūrvo ghaṭādiḥ arthaḥ pṛthak iti idantayā bhāti sma naivaṃ smaraṇakāle smṛtijñānāt pṛthaktvena idaṃ pūrvamanubhavanam iti bhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:822: yathā ca smṛtikāle tasmāt smṛtijñānāt so'rthaḥ prāk iti pūrvasvabhāvo na bhedena ābhāti , smṛtikāle bahiravabhāsābhāvāt evaṃ tata eva hetoḥ pūrvo
GSP30abhiprvu:823: 'pi anubhavo na bhedena ābhāti , kathaṃ tarhi ubhayaṃ bhāti ? anvabhūvam ityevam /
GSP30abhiprvu:824: etat kimucyate iti cet , aham ---- ityevaṃsvabhāvo ya ātmā
GSP30abhiprvu:825: pūrvāparasaṃvidantarmukhasvabhāvaḥ tatra yat ārohaṇam viśramaḥ tena hetunā pūrvasaṃvidrūpatāyāḥ svaprakāśāyā bhāsanāt tallonasyāpi ghaṭasya svaprakāśadeśīyatvena bhāsanam /
GSP30abhiprvu:826: ātmani ca ārohaṇam viśramaṇā anubhavasya arthasya ca /
GSP30abhiprvu:827: prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ ---- iti nyāyāt saṃkhyākṣipte tadvati vā kartṛbhūte 'smadarthe 'nubhavo bruḍitaḥ taddvāreṇa artho'pi ca , na tu svātantryeṇaiva asau , tadarthameva karma na nirdiṣṭam /
GSP30abhiprvu:828: ghaṭādiḥ punaḥ anubhavakāle na asmadarthamārohati , hi yasmāt naiva bhāti pūrvo 'nubhavaḥ pṛthak aparārdhoktāt hetoḥ , tasmāt saṃvidāmaikyam iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:829: luṅā bhūtakālasya dyotitatvāt prāk iti bhinnakramaḥ , uttamapuruṣeṇa asmadarthasya aham ityapi
GSP30abhiprvu:831: nanu ka evamāha ---- anubhavaḥ pṛthak na bhāti iti , ghaṭavat na bhāti iti cet kiṃ tataḥ ? ghaṭo'pi hi na anubhavasakhyaḥ bhāti iti kiṃ na bhāti ? svabhāvena bhāti iti tu ubhayatrāpi samānam /
GSP30abhiprvu:833: atītānāgatasūkṣmādi yathā yogijñāne viṣayībhavati iti abhyupagatam , tathā paracittamapi
GSP30abhiprvu:836: tatra jñānavṛttipariṇatameva sattvaṃ cittaśabdenoktam , anyathā pratyayasya saṃyamaviṣayīkāryatvaṃ kathamucyeta , ālambanayogaśca kathaṃ śaṅkayeta na ca sālambanam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:837: tasmāt parakīyamanubhavanamiva nijamapi viṣayīkriyatām ityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭānta evāsiddhaḥ iti bhānti ityantena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:838: abhyupagamena vā siddhatve 'pi prakṛte 'rthe viṣamaḥ iti śeṣeṇa darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:841: yoginām yat etat darśanāntaram bhāvanādyudbhavaḥ paracittaviṣayo jñānaviśeṣaḥ , tatra dṛśaḥ iti upalabdhayo na bhānti /
GSP30abhiprvu:843: saugatānāṃ tāvat svaprakāśaikarūpaṃ jñānam , tat cet jñānāntareṇa vedyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:844: tarhi yad asya nijaṃ vapuḥ ananyavedyatayā prakāśanaṃ nāma , na tatprakāśitaṃ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:845: sāṃkhyānāmapi puruṣacchāyaiva upalabdhiḥ , puruṣaśca asaṃvedya parvā iti kathaṃ vedyā syāt
GSP30abhiprvu:846: vaiśeṣikāṇāmapi ātmani abhedena samavāyi saṃvedanaṃ paragataṃ manasā kathaṃ gṛhyeta antaḥśarīravṛttinā
GSP30abhiprvu:847: taccharīrāntaranupraveśe tu tasyaiva aham iti śarīrīkaraṇāt ahantāvabhāsitatvāt ātmano bhedo vigalet , nityānumeyatvaṃ tu na ātmana upapadyate , jñānasya ca jñānāntaravedyatve 'navasthānādi uktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:850: tatra ghaṭasukhādi idantayā bhāti , tadgatastu prakāśo 'ham ---- ityeva svaprakāśatayā prakāśate /
GSP30abhiprvu:851: pramātrīkṛtaparadehaprāṇādisamavabhāsasaṃskārāt tu tanniṣṭhām idantām eva prakāśabhāge 'pi manyamāna idaṃ parajñānam iti abhimanyate avigalitasvaparavibhāgo yogī /
GSP30abhiprvu:852: prāptaprakarṣastu sarvam ātmatvena paśyan svasṛṣṭameva svaparavibhāgaṃ manyate iti jñānasya na yogijñānena prakāśyatā /
GSP30abhiprvu:853: bhavatu vā tathāpi prakṛtaṃ na etatsamam /
GSP30abhiprvu:855: ayamanubhavati iti paraniṣṭha eva asau anubhave yoginaḥ prakāśaḥ , na tu ahamanubhavāmi iti ātmāroheṇa vartamānaḥ , iha tu anvabhūvam iti ahamaṃśaviśrāntiḥ anālīḍhedaṃbhāvaiva anubhavasya iti yuktamuktam ----
GSP30abhiprvu:856: yasmāt anubhavaḥ pṛthak na bhāti tasmāt aikyaṃ bhinnakālānāṃ saṃvidāṃ veditā iti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:857: yadyahaṃabhāvaviśrāntivaśāt anubhavaḥ smṛtau pṛthak na bhāti iti ucyate , tadā parāmarśāntaraṃ sākṣādeva idantayā anubhavaṃ parāmṛśat yadi vā idaṃbhāvocitaghaṭādiviśrāntatām anubhavasya prathayat upalabdham , iti tadanusāreṇāpi kiṃ na vyavahriyate iti parābhiprāyaṃ pratikṣipati smaryate yaddṛgāsīnme saivamityapi bhedataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:859: lokasya tāvat evaṃ na saṃvedanam , sa hi na pṛthagbhūtāṃ dṛśaṃ kāṃcit manyate ---- sā dṛk me āsīt ityevam /
GSP30abhiprvu:860: evamapi tu yat smaryate evaṃbhūtamapi yat smaraṇaṃ kasyacit vivecakaṃmanyasya , tat smṛtervyākaraṇam , padasyeva prakṛtipratyayārthanirūpaṃaṃ kālpanikaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:862: so 'pi yadi mūlapratīti vedayate pūrvoktakrameṇa , tadā anubhavaṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ na veda , yata eva tat rāhoḥ śiraḥ itivat kalpitaṃ bhedaṃ manyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:863: anyathā sa ghaṭaḥ itivat sā dṛk ityatrāpi prāktanaṃ dṛgantaram apekṣaṇīyaṃ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:864: tat ityanena hi ghaṭasya vā dṛśo vā pūrvānubhavaviṣayāpattiḥ ucyate , anyathā dṛk ityeva
GSP30abhiprvu:866: tataśca dṛk mayā dṛgantareṇa anubhūtā iti āpatet /
GSP30abhiprvu:868: nanu smṛteḥ maulikaṃ kiṃ rūpam ? ucyate ---- mayā dṛṣṭam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:869: nanu atra dayitāvadananalinādiviśrāntaṃ darśanam uktam na tu ātmārūḍham ,
GSP30abhiprvu:872: kartuḥ kriyayā hi āpyaṃ karma iti dṛśikriyāyāḥ kartṛniṣṭhataiva /
GSP30abhiprvu:873: tathā ca kartṛsthāmeva dṛśikriyāmāhuḥ darśayate bhṛtyān rājā ityādau /
GSP30abhiprvu:874: jaiminīyairapi jñānarūpā dṛśiḥ bhāvanātmikā pramātṛviśrāntaiva uktā , kevalaṃ prakaṭatā viṣayadharmo dṛṣṭatākhyā , anyā saṃvit vā'svatantrā iti anyat etat /
GSP30abhiprvu:877: mayānubhūtam iti śabdavaicitryamātramidam , na tu arthabhedaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:878: anye tu bhinnakramatvena yojayanti ---- dṛk āsīt sā me ityevam , mayā dṛṣṭam iti
GSP30abhiprvu:879: ca yat smaraṇaṃ tat vyākaraṇamasyāḥ iti anantaroktānvabhūvamityucitaparāmarśāyāḥ smṛteḥ iti
GSP30abhiprvu:881: nanu dṛṣṭamapi nirvikalpakena yāvat na parāmṛṣṭaṃ vimarśaviśeṣaviśrāntyā tāvat na smaryate mārgadṛṣṭamiva tṛṇaparṇādi viśeṣeṇa rūpeṇa , tadidameva vicāraṇīyam , samanantarabhāvivikalpakāle taddarśanam idantayā avabhātapūrvaṃ vā na vā iti , tadetat āśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:884: iha darśanaṃ yādṛśaṃ nijena vapuṣā tādṛśenaiva tena bhātavyaṃ sarvadā , tacca svakāle'nanyaprakāśam aham ityetāvatā svarūpeṇa
GSP30abhiprvu:885: ucitaprakāśam , tadvikalpāṃśavicāraḥ tāvat na kutracit aṅgam , bhavatu vāṅgam , kiṃ tu avasāyo 'pi evaṃbhūtaḥ iti apiśabdena sūcayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:886: tatra samanantarabhāvinā vikalpena vastu parāmṛśyamānam anubhavaparāmarśamukhena vā parāmṛśyate ahamimaṃ paśyāmi iti vartamānatayā , imam ityanena ca
GSP30abhiprvu:890: / tatra antye vikalpe darśanasya pṛthak parāmarśa eva nāsti iti kā tatra idantāśaṅkā /
GSP30abhiprvu:891: tataśca pāriśeṣyāt ahantayā tasya atrāsti parāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:892: tadabhāve vikalpasya nimīlitākṣe 'pi bhāvāt svayamarthasparśe sati
GSP30abhiprvu:894: ādye tu darśanaṃ parāmṛṣṭamapi asmadarthe 'ntarbhūtam ahaṃbhāvāspadam avasātari viśrāntaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:895: svaprakāśameva parāmṛṣṭam iti vikalpo'pi na bodhāntarabodhyatāṃ bodhayati
GSP30abhiprvu:898: avasātari iti , svatantre'ntarmukhe bodhātmani ahantāspade ityarthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:901: jñānasya jñānāntareṇa parāmarśe hi ayameva nyāyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:903: smarāmyaham , vikalpitaṃ mayā , smṛtaṃ mayā iti ahantārūḍhyaiva vikalpādeḥ avabhāsāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:904: ata eva ātmano'mī vikalpādyāḥ śaktiviśeṣāḥ tadviśrāntaśarīratvāt iti darśitam jñānasmṛtyapohanaśaktimān ityatra //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:908: tat iti tasmādarthe pūrvoktasya prameyasya hetubhāvena upajīvanam iha sūcayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:909: yata evamuktam ---- anubhavasya arthasyeva smaraṇāt na bhedena avabhāsaḥ smrṭiśaktiśca parameśvarasyaiva , tata idamatra pariniṣṭhitaṃ tattvam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:911: anubhavaśca dvidhā , ---- parāmarśabhedāt kadācit svātmaparāmarśapūrvakam anubhāvyam parāmṛśati yatra asya abhisaṃdhipradhānatā mayā dṛśyate iti , kadācit anubhavanīyameva pradhānatayā parāmṛśati yatra anabhisaṃdhereva sahasā vastūpanipātaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:912: arthakriyāṃ prati āgrahaviśeṣo vā ayam iti , tatrāpi ca prakāśaparāmarśo
GSP30abhiprvu:914: evamubhayathānubhave pratyekaṃ smṛtirapi dvayaparāmarśamayī udeti iti catvāraḥ smaraṇabhedāḥ , dvau anubhavabhedau /
GSP30abhiprvu:916: / tacca etadbhedāt aṣṭadhā , pūrvāparaviśrāntikṛtāt pratyekaṃ dvidhābhedācca ṣoḍaśadhā
GSP30abhiprvu:918: teṣu ca grāhyaṃ tāvat prakāśāt abahirbhūtam , anyathā prakāśanāyogāt , bahirbhūtaṃ ca tat , anyathārthatvāsaṃbhavāt , na ca tata eva , tadaiva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:919: tadevāpṛthagbhūtaṃ atra pṛthagbhūtaṃ ca bhavati iti nūnamanyaḥ kalpitaprakāśātmā kaścit atra artho 'sti , yato 'yam artharāśiḥ pṛthagbhavan anyonyamapi pṛthaktām adhigacchet , anyathā prakāśābhinnānāṃ parasparamapi kathaṅkāraṃ pṛthagbhāvo bhavet /
GSP30abhiprvu:921: vicchinna eva , anujjhitavedyabhāva eva , aham iti vicchedaśūmyaprakāśocitena parāmarśena parāmṛśyamāno māyāpramātā iti vakṣyate {dehe buddhau ...................... /}(Ipv_1,6.4) ityatra /
GSP30abhiprvu:923: evaṃ samameva svātmani nirmalamakurasthānīye yat yugalakaṃ svasmāt prakāśarūpāt avyatiriktam avabhāsayati parameśvaraḥ tadeva etat bhagavato jñānakartṛtvaṃ smaraṇakartṛtvaṃ jñānaśaktismṛtiśaktirūpam ucyate iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:924: akṣarārthastu ---- mayā dṛśyate iti , ayam iti ca yat āmṛśati pramātā prakāśarūpo yena anubhavati iti ucyate , tata āmarśanāt etat
GSP30abhiprvu:925: lakṣyate , grāhyarūpeṇa grāhakarūpeṇa yojitau ghaṭādidehādisvabhāvau arthau vedyau pramātari viśuddhaprakāśarūpe bhātaḥ prakāśete /
GSP30abhiprvu:926: evaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ iti sa iti ca yat parāmṛśati prakāśarūpaḥ pramātā , yato 'sau smarati iti vyapadeśyaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:928: anubhavarūpopajīvitvaṃ pūrvoktaṃ draḍhayituṃ prasaṅgāt atra jñānaśakterapi unmīlanaṃ kṛtam
GSP30abhiprvu:932: grāhako māyīyaḥ kalpitaḥ pramātā aśuddhaprakāśasvabhāvaḥ iti śivam /
GSP30abhiprvu:934: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃīśvarapratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ prathame jñānādhikāre smṛtiśaktinirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturthamāhnikam // 4 //
GSP30abhiprvu:937: jñānaśaktipradīpena yaḥ sadā taṃ stumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:938: evaṃ tāvat smṛtiśakteḥ svarūpaṃ pratipāditam , adhunā tadupajīvanīyajñānaśaktiparamārthanirṇayaṃ vitatya , vartamānāvabhāsñām ityādikayā , sakramaṃ pratibhāsate ityantayā ślokaikaviṃśatyā nirūpayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:939: tatrādyeva ślokena vastuni pratijñāṃ karoti evaṃbhūtā jñānaśaktiḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:940: tataḥ ślokadvayena prakāśa evārthānāṃ svarūpa, ityāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:941: tato dvayena prakāśabāhyānāmarthānāṃ sadbhāvaṃ vijñānavādyupagatavāsanādūṣaṇena dṛḍhīkṛtam āśaṅkya , tṛtīyena tadanabhyupagame 'pi tāvat na kiñcit
GSP30abhiprvu:946: anantaraṃ ślokena cidātmani arthānām avaśyaṃ sadbhāvaḥ parāmarśātmanā iti prakaṭayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:948: prakāśasya pramātṛrūpasya pratyavamarśa eva jīvatam iti ślokacatuṣṭayena anubhavāgamanyāyasvarūpanirūpaṇābhiḥ abhidhatte /
GSP30abhiprvu:949: anantaraṃ jñānaparāmarśa eva jñeyaṃ śuddhaṃ pramātṛrūpatānujjhitaṃ ca prakṣayati iti tasyaiva pradhānatve nyāyaṃ ślokatrayeṇāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:950: prakāśaikarūpatve ca jñānajñātrādi bhinnam iti ślokenāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:952: avikalpakasavikalpakarūpe vimarśa eva prāṇitam iti ślokadvayenāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:954: yat bhinnatvaṃ tat upasaṃhāradiśā ślokena samarthayate , iti tātparyam āhnikasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:956: nanu smaraṇavikalpādīnām anubhava eva jīvitam , tatra yadi bhedena ābhāsānte 'rthāḥ tat teṣvapi tathaiva avabhāsa ucitaḥ , no cet anyathā , tadanubhava eva tāvat jñānaśaktirūpo vicāraṇīya ityāśayenāha
GSP30abhiprvu:959: vartamānatvena sphuṭatayā avabhāsanam idamityevamākāraṃ yeṣāṃ teṣām , yadetat bahirātmanā kalpitamāyīyaśūnyādiśarīrāntapramātṛpṛthagbhāvena hetunā , bhinnānām tato māyāpramātuḥ vicchinnānām avabhāsanam tat paramārthapramātari śuddhacinmaye antaḥsthitavatām tena saha aikātmyam anujjhitavatāmeva
GSP30abhiprvu:960: ghaṭate pramāṇena upapadyate , tena anujjhitasaṃvidabhedasya bhāvasya
GSP30abhiprvu:961: kalpitapramātrapekṣayā bhedena prakāśanaṃ bhagavato jñānaśaktirityuktaṃ bhavati //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:964: na ca prakāśo bhinnaḥ syādātmārthasya prakāśatā // Ipk_1,5.2 //
GSP30abhiprvu:965: artho nīlādiḥ , tasya nīlādirūpataiva yadi prakāśamānatā na punaḥ sāparā kācit arthaśarīrottīrṇā prakāśātmatā tarhi yathā sarvān prati
GSP30abhiprvu:966: nīlameva tatsaṃbhāvanayā bhaṇyate , na kaṃcit vā prati , vastuto vā svātmanyeva tat nīlaṃ parasya paraniṣṭhatvānupapatteḥ , svātmani vā na
GSP30abhiprvu:967: nīlaṃ na anīlam prakāśānugraheṇa vinā vyavasthānāyogāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:968: tathā prakāśamānatāpi asya sarvān prati na kaṃcit vā prati api tu svātmanyeva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:969: svātmanyapi vā na syāt iti andhatā jagataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:970: atha indriyālokādikṣaṇavargāt prakāśarūpo 'sau nīlakṣaṇo viśiṣṭa eva jātaḥ , evamapi sa eva prasaṅgaḥ , prakaṭatāvāde 'pi ayameva doṣaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:971: sarvathā arthaśarīraviśrāntaḥ cet prakāśo mama avabhāsate iti pramātṛlagnatayā prakāśasthitiḥ durupapādā /
GSP30abhiprvu:972: pramātā hi tadānīm indriyādimayo 'rtharūpaprakāśasya kāraṇaṃ bhavet bījamivāṅkurasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:973: na ca aṅkuro bījāpekṣo 'ṅkurātmā , tato yadi na prakāśātmā sa syāt prāgiva jñānodayāt pūrvaṃ yathā'sāvaprakāśaḥ tathā jñānodaye 'pi syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:974: nanu jñānam arthaprakāśarūpameva , tat kathaṃ jñānasya udayānudayayoḥ arthasya tulyatā syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:975: syāt etat yadi upapadyet , yāvatā arthāt bhinnaṃ yat jñānaṃ prakāśarūpam , tat arthasya saṃbandhitayā kathaṃ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:976: yadi tāvat arthaḥ prakāśate ityevaṃbhūtaṃ jñānasya svarūpaṃ tat arthajñānayoḥ abheda evāyātaḥ , arthasvabhāvasya jñānatvena uktatvāt , arthasvabhāvatve ca sati
GSP30abhiprvu:978: atha arthaṃ prakāśayati iti jñānasya svarūpam , tarhi prakāśamānamarthaṃ karoti jñānam iti
GSP30abhiprvu:980: kṛtapratānaśca ayaṃ prakṛtyarthaṇyarthaviveko mayaiva bhedavidāraṇe iti tata eva anveṣyaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:983: tacca idam upapattyā āyātam ---- arthasya svarūpaṃ prakāśamānatā prakāśābhinnatvam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:984: prakāśaśca yadi ghaṭe 'nyaḥ paṭe 'nyaḥ tadā anusaṃdhānasya ayogaḥ , dvayoḥ prakāśayoḥ svātmamātraparyavasānād iti vitatya upapāditaṃ naśyet janasthitiḥ ityatra /
GSP30abhiprvu:986: etadeva āvṛttyā darśitaṃ na ca prakāśo bhinnaḥ syāt iti //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:988: bhinne prakāśe cābhinne saṃkaro viṣayasya tat /
GSP30abhiprvu:990: yadi arthāt anya eva jñānātmā prakāśaḥ ata eva bhinno 'rthataḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:991: tarhi svātmani tasya prakāśamātrarūpatvāt abheda eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:992: tathā hi nīlasya prakāśaḥ , pītasya prakāśaḥ iti yo nīlāṃśaḥ pītāṃśaśca , sa na tāvat
GSP30abhiprvu:994: atha viṣayaḥ , tadevedaṃ vicāryate ---- iha prakāśabalāt nīlapītayoḥ bhedo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:995: yenaiva ca prakāśena nīlo nīla eva iti upagamyate , tenaiva ca prakāśena
GSP30abhiprvu:996: pītaḥ pīta iti kathaṃ saṃgacchatām , nīlena janitaḥ , pītena janitaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:997: tena vā saha samānasāmagrīka ityādi yat ucyate tat siddhe nīlapītayorbhede syāt , sa eva vicāryaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1001: , tathā karaṇatādivāde śikharasthajñānaṃ bahutaranīlādijanyam ekatra paṭu
GSP30abhiprvu:1002: anyatra mandam iti kathaṃ bhedaḥ prakāśaśarīrasya abhedāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1003: tathābhūte ca anyataradarśanodbhūte 'pi saṃskāre balādeva aśeṣasmaraṇaprasaṅga iti bhūyān saṅkaraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1004: syādetat , artha evāstu , kimanena doṣāpādakena prakāśena iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1005: atrāha ---- aprakāśasya prasiddhireva na kācit , svātmani hi nīlaṃ yadi pūtaṃ na kiṃcit vā , tat kiṃ duṣyet , ata eva granthakṛtaiva
GSP30abhiprvu:1010: tat yadi prakāśaḥ tadā bhavati arthaḥ , prakāśaśca asau katham /
GSP30abhiprvu:1011: yadi prakāśataiva ghaṭasya vapuḥ saiva paṭasya ityādi viśvavapuḥ prakāśaḥ siddhaḥ //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:1013: taccaivaṃ paryavasyati , yadi prakāśasya vicitrabhāve hetvantaram apākṛtam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1014: tatra prakāśasya avicitrasya krameṇa vicitratākāraṇaṃ pratibimbātmakaṃ tatpratibimbasajātīyaṃ yat tadeva nīlādirūpaṃ bāhyam , tacca yadyapyanumeyam , tathāpi idaṃ nīlamiti pratyakṣeṇa adhyavasāyāt adhyavasāyaprāṇitatvācca pramāṇasthiteḥ pratyakṣavyapadeśyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1019: tasyāpi tatprabodhasya vaicitrye kiṃ nibandhanam // Ipk_1,5.5 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1020: iha bodhaḥ tāvat abhinnaḥ , prakāśamātrameva hi asya paramārthaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1021: , prakāśādhikaṃ yadi nīlasya rūpam , tarhi tat aprakāśarūpam iti na prakāśeta /
GSP30abhiprvu:1022: atha tathā prakāśatvameva asya rūpam , pītaprakāśaḥ kathaṃ syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1025: tasmāt prakāśaḥ prakāśa eva , aṇumātramapi na rūpāntaram asya asti iti abhinno bodhaḥ , tasya ca abhinnasya kadācit nīlābhāsatā kadācit pītābhāsatā iti ye vicitrābhāsāḥ tatra kāraṇatvam hi yasymāt na upapannam hetau abhinne kāryabhedasya asaṃbhavāt , tasmāt sa sa vicitranīlapītādirūpa ākāsmiko 'jñātapratyakṣasiddhahetukaḥ san bāhyaṃ vijñānagatapratibimbātmakasvasvabhāvasaṃpādakam aucityāt nijarūpasadṛśaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1026: kramopanipatadrūpabahutarabhedātmakaṃ jñānāt sarvathā pṛthagbhūtam anumāpayati iti saṃbhāvayate bāhyārthavādī //4//
GSP30abhiprvu:1027: na ca asya idaṃ saṃbhāvanāmātram , api tu niścayaparyavasāyi eva bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1028: tathā hi vijñānavādinā yo hetuḥ vaicitrye vāsanāprabodhalakṣaṇa uktaḥ sa na upapadyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1029: smṛtijanakaḥ saṃskāro vāsanā iti tāvat prasiddham
GSP30abhiprvu:1031: astu vā nīlādyābhāsasaṃpādanasāmarthyarūpā jñānasya yogyatātmikā śaktiḥ vāsanā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1032: tasyāśca svakāryasaṃpādanonmukhyaṃ prabodhaḥ , tato bodheṣu ābhāsavaicitryam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1033: tatrāpi tu brūmaḥ ---- iha yadyāpi ābhāsānāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1034: jñānāntarvartinām apāramārthikatvaṃ saṃvṛtisattvam ucyetāpi , tathāpi yadeṣāṃ tad vastusadeva aṅgīkāryam avastunaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1036: evaṃsthite yā etā vāsanā ābhāsakāraṇatvena iṣyante , tāsāṃ bodhāt yadi bhinnaṃ rūpam , tacca paramārthasat , tadayaṃ śabdāntarapracchanno bāhyārthavādaprakāra eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1037: atha saṃvṛtisat , tarhi tena rūpeṇa kāraṇatānupapattiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1038: tathā yena rūpeṇa āsāṃ pāramārthikatā tena kāraṇatā , tat tarhi jñānamātraṃ tacca abhinnam iti nīlādyābhāsarūpasya kāryabhedasya asiddhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1039: evaṃ vāsanānām abicitratve tatprabodho vicitra iti kā pratyāśā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1040: bhavantu vā vāsanā bhinnāḥ , tathāpi bodhamātrātiriktasya deśakālabhāvādeḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1041: prabodhakābhimatasya vicitrasya kāraṇasya abhāvāt prabodho'vicitra iti eka eva prabodhaḥ iti samameva nīlādivaicitryaṃ bhāseta /
GSP30abhiprvu:1042: atha svasaṃtānavartīni jñānāntarāṇi vicitrāṇi prabodhakāraṇāni iti , tadasat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1043: sukhaduḥkhanīkapīlādipūrvāparādideśakālabhedasya vijñānamātrarūpatve vijñānasya ca prakāśamātrapramārthatāyāṃ svarūpabhedāsaṃbhave tathā bodhavailakṣaṇyānupapatteḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1045: tatrāpi parakīyābhimatasya kṛśasthūlādeḥ kāyasya , śvāsapraśvāsādeḥ prāṇasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1046: sukhaduḥkhādeḥ dhīguṇasya ; anumātrabhimatasaṃbinmātrarūpābhede paratvaṃ kasya bhavet iti na vidmaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1048: pramāṇena yadi na siddhaḥ tat asat eva , siddho 'pi prameyatayā cet tat
GSP30abhiprvu:1049: jaḍa eva , tathāpi ca kāyādivat eva jñānamātrasvabhāvaḥ svasaṃvinmātrarūpatve paraṃ prati asya asiddheḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1050: nanu vyāhārādikriyā svātmani icchayā vyāhareyam ityevaṃrūpayā hetubhāvena vyāptā dṛṣṭā tat caitrakāye'pi tayā taddhetukayā bhāvyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1051: na ca matsaṃtatipatitā samīhā asti iti svasaṃvedanena niścitam , tataśca parasamīhā siddhyati , tadeva saṃtānāntaram iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1052: atrocyate ---- iha anumātuḥ vyāhārābhāso dvidhā bhavati ---- vyāptigrahaṇakāle 'vicchedaprāṇo 'haṃ vyāharāmi ityevaṃrūpaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1053: anumānāvasare ca vyāharati ayam iti vicchedajīvita iti anyasya vyāptiḥ gṛhītā anyaśca ābhāsaḥ katham idānīṃ hetuḥ syāt ? vyāharati iti ābhāsasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1054: hetuḥ avidita eva iti kathaṃ tato hetoḥ samīhā anumīyeta ? kiṃ ca vyāharati ayam iti yaḥ pramātrantare 'numātṛsaṃmate vicchinnatayā avabhāsaḥ so'numeyasaṃmatāyāḥ paramīhāyāḥ kathaṃ kāryaḥ syāt ? tasyā hi vyāharāmītyābhāsaḥ kāryo yo'sau avicchedajīvitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1055: na ca avicchedamayasya vicchedamayaḥ kāryam iti yuktaṃ tathābhūtakāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇopāyābhāvāt , na hi svātmani yo'yam
GSP30abhiprvu:1056: avicchinnābhāsaḥ sa paratra vicchinnaṃ vyāharati ityevaṃrūpam ābhāsaṃ janayati iti kenacit pramāṇena siddham , parasiddhipūrvakatvāt asya arthasya , parapramātṛsiddhaśca evaṃbhūtārthādhīnatvena itaretarāśrayāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1057: na ca avaśyan avicchinnāt vicchinnena bhāvyam iti niyamo 'sti vyavhicārāt
GSP30abhiprvu:1058: / na ca vicchinno 'pi ābhāsa upadyatām iti tadanusaṃdhānāt tadutpattiḥ niyatā tatsadbhāve 'pyasyānutpatteḥ tadabhāve ca utpatteḥ , vicchinna ābhāsaḥ paratra utpadyatām iti yā samīhā tayā saha pratra utpannasya vicchinnābhāsasya kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇameva parāsiddhau na yukta, iti vyāptereva asiddhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1059: pramātrantarāṇi ca yadi bhinnāni tadā tanniṣṭhānām avabhāsānāṃ bheda eva jñānādavyatiriktaṃ ca iti nyāyāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1060: tataśca ekābhāsaniṣṭhatvābhāvāt ekābhāsaviśrāntaḥ saṃbhūya pramātḥṇāṃ vyavahāro na syāt iti anyosaṃbhavaḥ ---- yat prameyaṃ bodhāt bhinnaṃ bhavati iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1061: sahopalambhaniyamādeḥ anaikāntikatvāt nīlapītādināpi prameyarāśinā kim apakṛtam , yena asya svarūpaviśrāntiḥ na sahyate , tasmāt pramātrantarāṇāmapi asiddhireva , siddhau vā sarvapramātrantargatā ābhāsā ekaikatra paratra ābhāsavaicitryahetuṃ vāsanodvodhavaicitryaṃ janayeyuḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1062: niyame hetvantarābhāvāt iti tathāpi na nīlādivaicitryasiddhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1063: evaṃ vāsanānāṃ tadudbodhahetūnāṃ ca vicitrāṇām anupapattireva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1064: tataśca sthitametat , abhinno bodhaḥ tasya ākasmikābhāsabhedahetutvānupapatteḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1065: bāhyo'rtho'numeyaḥ saṃbhāvyate iti yadi bāhyārthavādinā ucyate iti
GSP30abhiprvu:1069: adhunā tu enāṃ saṃbhāvanāṃ śithilayituṃ tāvadāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1072: syādetat iti pūrvoktasaṃbhāvanābhyupagame yadā vyākhyāyate tadā kiṃ tu iti vākyaśeṣeṇa tacchaithilyaviṣayaṃ saṃbhāvanāntaraṃ śeṣaślokena darśayate iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1073: yadi tu adhyāhāro na sahyate tadā syādetaditi idamapi saṃbhāvanāntaraṃ syāt , yadanena ślokena ucyate iti ekavākyatayā yojyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1074: anayāpi kaṣṭakalpanayā bāhyān arthān prasādhayatā bhavatā taiḥ na kiṃcit kartavyam , ābhāsaireva taiḥ bhavatā abhyupagataiḥ vyavahārasiddheḥ , na hi nityānumeyena kaścit vyavahāra iti kiṃ bāhyena , yatra sādhakaṃ ca
GSP30abhiprvu:1075: nāsti pramāṇam , bādhakaṃ ca prakāśāt bhede anumeyatayāpi prakāśanābhāva
GSP30abhiprvu:1080: aṇusaṃcayabāhyavāde 'pi saṃcayasya anyasya abhāve paramāṇava eva , te ca yadi saṃyujyante nirantaratayā tat avaśyaṃ digbhāgabhedaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1081: evanākṣe ṣaṭsu dikṣu saṃcīyamāneṣu ṣaṭsu aṇuṣu madhyamasya paramāṇoḥ yatraiva dhāmni eko lagnaḥ tatraiva yadi aparaḥ tat ekaparamāṇumātratā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1082: atha anyatra ekaḥ anyatar aparaḥ tat avaśyaṃ bhāgabhedāpattiḥ , iti bhāga eva san , tasyāpi eṣaiva saraṇiḥ iti na kiṃcit avaśiṣyate bāhyaṃ tattvataḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1083: na caitat vācyam ---- mūrtānām ekadeśatvāyogāt , saṃyoge bhinnadeśatvāvyāvṛtteḥ tanniṣṭaṃ dvyaṇukaṃ nāma kāryadravyam aṇuparimāṇam
GSP30abhiprvu:1085: avayavīvādo hi ayam , sa ca pūrvameva
GSP30abhiprvu:1087: yacca avyāpyavṛttitvaṃ saṃyogasya ucyate tanniraṃśe kathaṃ saṃgacchatām /
GSP30abhiprvu:1088: svāśraye hi yadi asau samavaiti kim anyāt asya avaśiṣyate yat na vyāpnuyāt iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1089: abhyuścayabādhakaṃ ca idam iti na atra asmābhiḥ bharaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1091: nanu bādhakaṃ nāma pramāṇasiddhe vastuni na kiṃcit kartuṃ samartham , tenaiva dṛḍhena pramāṇena bādhakābhimatasya bādhitasya apramāṇatvasaṃpādanāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1092: darśitaṃ ca iha sādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ kāryahetuḥ tattadākasmikābhāsa iti kārikayā ityāśaṅkya āha
GSP30abhiprvu:1095: iha tāvat svapna -- smaraṇa -- manorājya -- saṃkalpādiṣu nīlādyābhāsavaicitryaṃ bāhyasamarpakahtuvyatirekeṇaiva nirbhāsate iti yadyapi asti saṃbhavaḥ , tathāpi tadābhāsavaicitryam asthairyāt
GSP30abhiprvu:1097: yat punaridaṃ yoginām icchāmātreṇa purasenādivaicitryanirmāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam , tatra upādānaṃ prasiddhamṛtkāṣṭha-śukra -- śoṇi --
GSP30abhiprvu:1098: tādivaicitryamayaṃ na saṃbhavatyeva , na hi evaṃ vaktuṃ śakyam ----
GSP30abhiprvu:1099: sarvagatāḥ paramāṇavo yogīcchayā jhaṭiti saṃghaṭitāḥ kāryam ārapsyante iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1101: na ca etat prasiddham ---- pramāṇubhya eva sthūlaṃ ghaṭādi jāyate iti , kiṃ tu kapālādivyavadhānena , tathāpi niyatasahakārisamavalambanam karacaraṇādivyāpāre viśiṣṭadeśakāladharmādhipatyayogaḥ śikṣābhyāsaprakarṣa
GSP30abhiprvu:1102: iti , iyati ca āṃśrīyamāṇe yogī kumbhaṃ nirmimāṇaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1103: kumbhakāraprasiddhasanastasāmagrīsanarjanapuraḥsaraṃghaṭaṃ ghaṭayan kumbhakāra eva syāt , tasmāt prasiddhakāraṇollaṅghane kim
GSP30abhiprvu:1105: tatra yogisaṃvida eva sā tādṛśī śaktiḥ ---- yat ābhāsavaicitryarūpam arthajātaṃ prakāśayati iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1106: tadasti saṃbhavaḥ ---- yat saṃvit eva abhyupagatasvātantryā apratīdhātalakṣaṇāt icchāviśeṣavaśāt saṃvido 'nidhikātmatāyā anapāyāt antaḥsthitameva sat bhāvajātam idamityevaṃ prāṇabuddhidehādeḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1107: vitīrṇakiyanmātrasaṃvidūpāt svātantryaṃ kiṃ na abhyupagamyate svasaṃvedanasiddham , kimiti hetvantaraparyeṣaṇāprayāsena khidyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1108: evakāreṇa idamāha ---- sarveṇa tāvat vādinā viṣayavyavasthāpanaṃ saṃvidrūpam anapahnavanīyam ādisiddhaṃ hi tat iti uktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1109: tasya ca svātantryameva devaśabdanirdiṣṭaṃ cidrūpatvam iti kim aparakāraṇānveṣaṇavyasanitayā
GSP30abhiprvu:1110: hi yasmāt evaṃ prakāśayati deva iti saṃbhāvyate , tasmāt kiṃ bāhyena anupapattinā iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:1111: nanu evam ubhayathāpi saṃbhāvanānumānam unmiṣati , tatra kiṃ makurapratibimbitaghaṭādidṛṣṭāntena jñānapratibimbatābhāsavaicitrye vijñānadarpaṇātiriktaṃ tata eva bāhyābhimataṃ hetuṃ kalpayema ? kiṃ vā yogidṛṣṭāntena saṃvitsvātantryameva hetubhāvena brūyāma ? tadidaṃ sāṃśayikaṃ vartate iti āśaṅkya bāhyārthānumānasaṃbhāvanāṃ sūtradvayena apākartumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1116: na kevalam anantaraślokanirdiṣṭābhiḥ yuktabhiḥ pratyakṣeṇa bāhyo'rtho na bhāsate , iyadeva hi pratyakṣaṃ tacca nīlaṃ bhāti iti svaprakāśasaṃvidrūpaṃ nādhikaṃ kiṃcit iti , yāvat anumānenāpi na asya bāhyāsya siddhiḥ iti apiśabdasyābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1117: tatra anumānam atra naiva pravartitum utsahate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1118: pravṛttamapi na prakṛtasiddhim ādavyāt iti anena sūtradvayena upadarśyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1119: tatra anumānaṃ vikalpaḥ , sarvaśca ayaṃ vikalpo'nubhavamūla iti prasiddham /
GSP30abhiprvu:1120: tena yat sarvathā anābhātapūrvam ananubhūtacaraṃ tatra anumānam anumitivyāpāro vikalpātmā naiva kenacit vādinā iṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1121: nanu bhavatu pratyakṣato dṛṣṭe 'numāne saṃkathā iyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1122: sāmānyato dṛṣṭe tu kiṃ vakṣyasi yathā arthopalabdhyā indriyānumāne ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1123: ucyate ---- tatrāpi vikalpena yathā so'rthaḥ spṛśyate tathā anumeya iti sthitiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1124: vikalpaśca na indriyādikam arthaṃ kenacit saṃniveśaviśeṣādinā viśeṣātmanā spṛśati , api tu kiṃcidupalabdheḥ kāraṇam iti amunā svabhāvena
GSP30abhiprvu:1125: , sa ca svabhāvaḥ kāraṇatālakṣaṇaḥ pratyakṣagṛhīta eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1126: tathā ca bījāt aṅkuraḥ tantubhyaḥ paṭa ityādau kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratyakṣānupalambhabalena tāvat niśceyaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1127: tatra ca pratyakṣaṃ pratyābhāsaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bhajate , vimarśalakṣaṇasya pramitivyāpārasya ekaikaśabdavācye'rthe pravṛtteḥ tadanusāritvācca pramāṇasya iti vakṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1132: anyopalambharūpa ābhāsamātraviśrānta eva iti kāraṇābhāso viśeṣaśūnyaḥ parigṛhīta eva bījāt aṅkura iti pratītau /
GSP30abhiprvu:1133: yat yasya niyamam anuvidhatte avyatiriktam tat tasya kāryam iti pratighaṭaṃ mṛttikādirūpahetutadvanmātrasya āmāsāt //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:1134: ābhāsāt bāhyaḥ punarnābhāsarūpaḥ , sa ca ābhāsate iti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP30abhiprvu:1135: anābhāse ca nāsti vikalparūpasya anumānasya vyāpāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1136: grāmagṛhādestu yat bāhyaṃ tat agrāmādirūpaṃ na ucyate pratyekaṃ vāṭānūpakuṇyatulādeḥ bāhyatvaprasaṅgāt , api tu tatsaṃnikaṭam , tasmāt grāmabāhyam ābhāsabāhyam iti ca śabdasāmyamātram etat na vastusāmyam evaṃ ye vikalpe vastu na ābhāti iti manyante teṣāmapi tāvat anumānavikalpo na bāhye upapannaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1137: asmābhistu upapāditam ---- adhyavasāyasyāpi ābhāsamānaviṣayatvam bhrāntitve cāvasāyasya iti sūtre /
GSP30abhiprvu:1138: tena anumānavikalpātmanāpi prakāśena yadi anāviṣṭo nīlādiḥ arthaḥ tat na anumita eva syāt
GSP30abhiprvu:1139: atha āviṣṭa eva , tarhi prāgivārtho 'prakāśaḥ syāt iti nyāyena prakāśamātrasvabhāva eva , na bāhyaḥ /
