GSP30abhiprvu:1140: tena bāhye sādhye yat kiṃcit pramāṇam ānīyate , tadabāhyatāmeva pratyuta sādhayati iti viruddhameva , ata eva āha kathaṃcana iti , kenāpi prakāreṇa pratyakṣātmanā anumeyātmanā vā ābhāsanam ābhāso bāhyasya anābhāsasya na kadācit abhūt iti , tasmāt siddham cidātmaiva hi deva iti nanu antaḥsthitaṃ bahiḥ prakāśayedityuktaṃ tat antaḥsthitatvam upapādanīyam iti āśaṅkya āha
GSP30abhiprvu:1142: astyeva na vinā tasmādicchāmarśaḥ pravartate // Ipk_1,5.10 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1145: iti hi vakṣyate , tacca sadaiva , prakāśasya pramātṛtvāt , tadātmatayā ca vinā 'prakāśamānasya avastutvāt , kiṃ tu tatra aham iti ucite parāmarśe yo 'yam idantāparāmarśaḥ saiva bāhyatā , tacca iha antaḥsthitatvam
GSP30abhiprvu:1146: ahamityetāvatā citsamucitenaiva bapuṣā parāmarśanameva , tacca iha nīlādīnāmastyeva , na tu nāsti iti , yadi hi na syāt kumbhakṛto ghaṭaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1147: karavāṇi iti ya uttarakriyāmapekṣya icchāśabdavācyaḥ parāmarśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1148: eṣaṇīyena sa parāmṛśyena aniyantritaḥ cet tataḥ paṭecchāpi sā na kasmāt iti saṃkīryeran vyavahārāḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1149: atha tatrāpi ca eṣaṇīyaḥ tadānīmeva nirmitaḥ san tathā jātaḥ , tarhi tannirmāṇaṃ cidātmani vinecchayā nopapannam iti
GSP30abhiprvu:1151: tacca icchāntaramapi viṣayaniyantritaṃ na vā iti vikalpe 'navasthā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1152: viṣayaniyantritaṃ cet syāt ātmataiva jātā , na cet ghaṭe paṭecchā syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1153: atha tatrāpi tadānīmeva iti kṛtvā anavasthā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1154: tasmāt sarvo 'yaṃ bhāvarāśiḥ cidātmani aham ityeva vapuṣā satatāvabhāsuravapuḥ aiśvaryarūpācca svātantryalakṣaṇāt svāmibhāvāt
GSP30abhiprvu:1155: vicitreṇa vapuṣā kramākramādinā saṃvit enaṃ bahiḥkaroti pramātṛprathanapūrvakam , tatrāpi kvacit ābhāse pramātḥn ekīkaroti nitambanīnṛtta iva prekṣakān /
GSP30abhiprvu:1157: śarīraprāṇabuddhisukhādyābhāsāṃśeṣu tu bhedasya avigalanāt na sarvathā aikyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1158: ata eva pratikṣaṇaṃ pramātṛsaṃyojanaviyojanavaicitryeṇa parameśvaro viśvaṃ sṛṣṭisaṃhārādinā prapañcayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1167: tasmāt sthitam antaḥsthitaṃ bhāvajātaṃ tena vinā tadviṣayasya parāmarśāyogāt iti //10//
GSP30abhiprvu:1168: nanu parāmarśo nāma vikalpaḥ , sa ca avikalpaśuddhasaṃvidvapuṣi
GSP30abhiprvu:1172: iha avabhāvasya prakāśasya , anavabhāsasya ca aprakāśasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1173: ghaṭādeḥ parasparaparihāreṇa dvayoḥ svātmani cet vyavasthānam , tat ghaṭapaṭayoḥ iva idamjaḍam idaṃ jaḍam iti durupapādaṃ vailakṣaṇyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1174: atha avabhāso yato 'rthasya saṃbamdhī , tato na jaḍaḥ , tarhi saṃbandhamātreṇa mṛt api ghaṭasya iti ajaḍā syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1175: atha na svasaṃbandhamātram api tu avabhāso 'rthasya prakāśaḥ , tarhi arthātmanā sa prakāśa iti samāpatitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1176: na ca anyātmanā anyasya prakāśa upapannaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1178: ghaṭo'vabhāsasya kāraṇam , tarhi avabhāso'pi ghaṭasya kāraṇam iti ghaṭo'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:1180: atha anyena satāpi ghaṭena yato 'vabhāsasya pratibimbarūpā cchāyā dattā , tām asau adabhāso bibhrat ghaṭasya iti ucyate , tataśca ajaḍaḥ , tarhi sphaṭikasalilamakurādiḥ api evaṃbhūta eva iti ajaḍa eva syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1181: atha tathābhūtamapi ātmānaṃ taṃ ca ghaṭādikaṃ sphaṭikādiḥ na parāmraṣṭuṃ samartha iti jad.aḥ , tathāparāmarśanameva ajāḍyajīvitam antarbahiṣkaraṇasvātantryarūpaṃ svābhāvikam avabhāsasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1183: ahamevaṃ prakāśātmā prakāśe iti hi vimarśodaye svasaṃvideva pramātṛprameyapramāṇādi kṛtārtham abhimanyate na tu atiriktaṃ kāṅkṣati , sphaṭikādi hi gṛhītapratibimbamapi
GSP30abhiprvu:1184: tathābhāvena siddhau pramātrantaram apekṣate iti nirvimarśatvāt jaḍam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1190: madhyāvasthaiva tu idantā vimṛśyamānaūrvāparakoṭiḥ vimūḍhānāṃ māyāpadaṃ saṃsāraḥ iti vimarśa eva pradhānaṃ bhagavata iti sthitam //11//
GSP30abhiprvu:1191: na kevalaṃ saṃvittattvasya asmābhiḥ eva vimarśaprādhānyam uktam yāvat āgamāntarairapi iti darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:1194: yato vimarśa eva pradhānam ātmano rūpam amumeva hetuṃ prayojanarūpam uddiśya ātmā dharmisvabhāvo dravyabhūto 'pi , caitantyam iti dharmavācinā śabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam āśritya uditaḥ kathitaḥ bhagavatā śivasūtreṣu
GSP30abhiprvu:1200: ityādau api hi dharmaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam ātmano darśitaṃ guruṇā anantena /
GSP30abhiprvu:1201: dravyaṃ hi tat ucyate yadviśrāntaḥ padārthavargaḥ sarvo bhāti ca arthyate ca arthakriyāyai , tad yadi na tat sakalo 'yaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1202: tattvabhūtabhāvabhuvanasaṃbhāraḥ saṃvidi viśrāntaḥ tathā bhavati iti sa eva guṇakarmādidharmāśrayabhūtapadārthāntarasvabhāvaḥ tāmeva mukhyadravyasvarūpam āśrayate iti saiva dravyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1203: tat anantadharmarāśiviśramabhittibhūtāyāḥ tasyāḥ sa eva dharmaḥ caitanyam iti kartṛkṛdantāt utpannena bhāvapratyayena saṃbandhābhidhāyināpi prādhānyena darśitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1204: tathā hi saṃbandhaviśrāntasya pratīteḥ , dravytarūpasya ca saṃbandhinaḥ prakṛtyā uktatvāt citikriyārūpaṃ dhramaṃ saṃbaddham
GSP30abhiprvu:1206: citikriyā ca cittau kartṛtā , svātaṃtryaṃ saṃyojanaviyojanānusaṃdhānādirūpam ātmamātratāyāmeva
GSP30abhiprvu:1208: tadeva anātmarūpāt jaḍāt saṃyojanaviyojanādisvātaṃtryavikalāt vailakṣaṇyādāyi iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1209: tadevaṃ paratvena pradhānatayā abhisaṃdhāya ātmā cetana iti vaktavye dharmāntarādharīkaraṇāya vimarśadharmoddhurīkaraṇāya ca ātmā caitanyam ityuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1211: ardhayuk pādaviśrāntiḥ iti hi kāvye samayaḥ , na śāstre /
GSP30abhiprvu:1212: yadi vā citkriyā ātmā ucitaḥ citikartṛtā ca iti pṛthageva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1214: nanu yathā prakāśo 'prakāśaśca iti ybhayamapi svātmani , tataśca prakāśa iti ukte jaḍāt na vailakṣaṇyam uditaṃ syāt , tadvat vimarśo 'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:1215: avimarśo 'pi ca svātmani, iti tenāpi kathaṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ jaḍājaḍayoḥ ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1218: cetayati ityatra yā citiḥ citikriyā tasyāḥ pratyavamarśaḥ svātmacamatkāralakṣaṇa ātmā svabhāvaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1220: camatkriyate , svātmā na parāmṛśyate , na svātmani tena prakāśyate , na aparicchinnatayā bhāsyate , tato ca cetyata iti ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1221: caitreṇa tu svātmani ahamiti saṃrambhodyoyollāsavibhūtiyogāt camatkriyate , svātmā parāmṛśyate , svātmanyeva prakāśyate , idamiti yaḥ pariccheda
GSP30abhiprvu:1222: etāvadrūpatayā tadvilakṣaṇībhāvena nīlapītasukhaduḥkhatacchūnyatādyasaṃkhyāvabhāsayogena avabhāsyate , tataḥ caitreṇa cetyate iti ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1226: ātmānaṃ ca parīkaroti , ubhayam ekīkaroti , ekīkṛtaṃ dvayamapi nyagbhāvayati ityevaṃsvabhāvaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1229: 'hamityādipratyavamarśāntarabhittibhūtatvāt , pūrṇatvāt parā , vakti viśvam abhilapati pratyavamarśena iti ca vāk , ata eva sā svarasena cidrūpatayā svātmaviśrāntivapuṣā uditā sadānastamitā nityā ahamityeva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1230: etadeva paramātmano mukhyaṃ svātantryam aiśvaryam īśitṛtvam ananyāpekṣitvam ucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1231: parāparaṃ tu idaṃbhāvarūpasya pratyavamarśasya akhyātiprāṇasya udbodhamātre 'pi ahaṃbhāva eva viśrānteḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1233: aparaṃ tu idaṃbhāvasyaiva nirūḍhau māyāgarbhādhikṛtānāmeva viṣṇuviriñcendrādīnām , tattu teṣāṃ parameśvaraprasādajameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1241: saiṣā sāratayā proktā hṛdayaṃ parameṣṭhinaḥ // Ipk_1,5.14 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1242: iha ghaṭaḥ kasmāt asti , svapuṣpaṃ kasmāt nāsti ityukta itivaktāro bhavanti ghaṭo hi sphurati mama na tu itarat iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1243: tadetat ghaṭatvameva yadi sphurattvaṃ sphuraṇasaṃbandhaḥ , tat sarvadā sarvasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1244: sphuret na kasyacidvā , tasmāt mama sphurati iti ko'rthaḥ , madīyaṃ sphuraṇaṃ spandanam ādiṣṭam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1245: spandanañca kiñciccalanam , eṣaiva ca kiñcidrūpatā yat acalamapi calamābhāsate iti , prakāśasvarūpaṃ hi manāgapi
GSP30abhiprvu:1246: nātiricyate , atiricyate iva iti tat acalameva ābhāsabhedayuktamiva ca bhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1252: {atikruddhaḥ prahṛṣṭo vā kiṃ karomīti vā mṛśan /
GSP30abhiprvu:1261: sā ca svapuṣpādikamapi vyāpnoti iti mahatī , deśakālau nīlādivat saiva sṛjati iti tābhyāṃ viśeṣaṇīyā na bhavati , yat kila yena tulyakakṣyatayā bhāti tat tasya viśeṣaṇaṃ kaṭaka
GSP30abhiprvu:1263: na ca deśakālau vimarśena tulyakakṣyau bhātaḥ tayoḥ idantayā tasya ca ahantayā prakāśe tulyakakṣyatvānupapatteḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1264: evaṃ deśakālāsparśāt vibhutvaṃ nityatvaṃ ca , sakaladeśakālasparśo '; pi tannirmāṇayogāt iti tato 'pi vyāpakatvanityatve /
GSP30abhiprvu:1268: sāram iti yat atucchaṃ rūpaṃ tat iyameva vimarśaśaktiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1269: grāhyagrāhakāṇāṃ yat prakāśātmakaṃ rūpaṃ tasyāpi aprakāśavailakṣaṇyākṣepikā iyameva iti śrīsāraśāstre'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:1273: hṛdayaṃ ca nāma pratiṣṭhāsthānamucyate , tacca uktanītyā jaḍānāṃ cetanam , tasyāpi prakāśātprakatvam , tasyāpi vimarśaśaktiḥ iti viśvasya parame pade
GSP30abhiprvu:1274: tiṣṭhato viśrāntasya tasya idameva hṛdayaṃ vimarśarūpaṃ paramantrātmakaṃ yatra tatra abhidhīyate
GSP30abhiprvu:1275: sarvasya hi mantra eva hṛdayam , mantraśca vimarśanātmā , vimarśanaṃ ca parāvākchaktimayam
GSP30abhiprvu:1285: na prakāśaḥ prakāśeta sā hi pratyavamarśinī // }
GSP30abhiprvu:1291: bauddhairapi adhyavasāyāpekṣaṃ prakāśasya prāmāṇyaṃ vadadbhiḥ upagataprāya eva ayam arthaḥ , abhilāpātmakatvāt adhyavasāyasya iti //14//
GSP30abhiprvu:1292: nanu asaṃkhyaśaktiśreṇośobhitavapuṣi paramaśive vimarśaśaktireva iyam itthaṃkāram abhiṣicyate kasmāt ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1294: jñeyaṃ na tu tadaunmukhyātkhaṇḍyetāsya svatantratā // Ipk_1,5.15 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1298: sā ca vimarśarūpā iti yuktam asyā eva prādhānyam iti tātparyeṇa uttaramuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1299: śabdārthasya ayam , prakāśātmā parameśvaraḥ svātmānaṃ jñātrekarūpatvāt ajñeyamapi jñeyīkaroti iti yat saṃbhāvyate kāraṇāntarasya anupapatteḥ darśitatvāt dṛḍhena saṃbhāvanānumānena , tadata eva vimarśaśaktilakṣaṇāt
GSP30abhiprvu:1300: kartṛtvāt hetoḥ bhavati , yato hi ayam ātmānaṃ parāmṛśati tato
GSP30abhiprvu:1303: , ātmānaṃ jñeyīkaroti iti ? āha, pṛthak prakāśāt bahirbhūtā sthitiḥ yasya tādṛk jñeyaṃ naiva bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1306: abhyuccayayuktimapi āha , yadi vyatiriktaṃ jñeyaṃ syāt tat jñātṛrūpasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1307: ātmano yat etat jñeyaviṣayam aunmukhyaṃ svasaṃvedanasiddhaṃ dṛśyate tat na asya syāt , tena vyatiriktaviṣayaunmukhyena anyādhīnatvaṃ nāma pāratantryam asya ānīyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1309: svātantryameva ca ananyamukhaprekṣitvam ātmanaḥ svarūpam , iti vyatiriktonmukha ātmā anātmaiva syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1310: anātmā ca jaḍo jñeyaṃ prati na unmukhībhavati iti prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1312: avyatiriktonmukhaḥ svatantraḥ san ātmānameva jñeyīkaroti iti //15//
GSP30abhiprvu:1313: na ca kevalaṃ nīlādirūpameva jñeyam , yāvat atyaktakartṛsvabhāvaṃ svātantryeṇa aparityaktameva santam ātmānaṃ nirmāya vyavahāreṇa dhyānopāsanārcanopadeśādinā yojayati iti yat saṃbhāvyate tadapi ata eva iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1314: nanu svātantryayuktaṃ ca nirmīyate ca iti viruddham idam ? atrāha , advayātmanaḥ saṃvidekarūpasya svātantryāt hetoḥ idaṃ na na yujyate , yat kila māyāpade atidurghaṭaṃ pratibhāti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1315: tatsaṃpādane yat apratihataṃ svātantryaṃ tadeva punaḥ svātantryaśabdena darśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1316: ata eva ityanena tu vimarśaśaktirūpam iti apunaruktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1317: atha vā ata eva svātantryāt iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena ślokadvayena saṃbandhanīyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1318: udāharaṇam atrārthe darśayati , nīlādinirmāṇavat asya svatrantranirmāṇasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1319: aprasiddhatvāt , īśvaro bhagavān ātmā nityo vibhuḥ svatantraḥ ityevamādau hi pramātuḥ , pūjayituḥ , dhyātuḥ vā 'pṛthagbhūtaṃ tat prameyam , pūjyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1320: dhyeyaṃ ca bhāti iti tat tāvat nirmitam , na ca anīśvaram /
GSP30abhiprvu:1321: evaṃ hi īśvara iti , anīśvara iti saṃkalpadhyānādeḥ tulyatvaṃ syāt , na ca evam
GSP30abhiprvu:1322: phalabhedasya upalabdheḥ iti , tasmāt svātantryaśūnyatābhāsanena svātantryayuktatābhāsanena ca yat idam ubhayaṃ jñeyam ātmarūpameva parameśvaro bhāsayati tat vimarśaśaktibalāt eva , iti saiva pradhānam iti
GSP30abhiprvu:1323: nanu prakāśabalāt bhāvavyavasthā , sa ca prakāśo vimarśasāra iti vimarśābhede tadeva tat iti vaktuṃ yuktam , īśvara ātmā ityādisaṃkalpeṣu
GSP30abhiprvu:1324: ca nirmitasya idantayā parāmarśaḥ , svātantryaṃ tu ahaṃparāmarśarūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1325: iti nirmitasya tadrūpatvābhāve kathaṃ svātantryāmuktatvam iti ? tat etat parihartumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1330: tat ayam arthaḥ , aham ityevaṃ svarūpo
GSP30abhiprvu:1331: yaḥ parāmarśo yaśca īśvaraḥ pramātā ātmā śiva ityādiḥ anantaprakāraḥ parāmarśaḥ , tasya yadyapi bhedo 'nyonyarūpatā tathāpi tadbhedāt hetoḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1332: asya ātmano nirmātṛrūpasya ahaṃparāmarśamayasya nirmeyarūpasya ca īśvarādiparāmarśāspadasya yo bhedaḥ śaṅkitaḥ , sa na yuktaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1333: yata īśvara ityapi yaḥ parāmarśaḥ , sa īśanaśīle jñātṛtvakartṛtvatattve viśrānyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1334: jñātṛtvādi ca jñānādau svātantryam ananyamukhaprekṣitvam avicchinnajñānayogaḥ , avicchedaśca jānāmi karomi iti asmadarthaviśrāntiḥ iti asya īśvarasya ātmanaḥ sṛṣṭeḥ sṛjyamānasya ahaṃvimarśanīyatvameva sṛṣṭeriti vā hetau pañcamī /
GSP30abhiprvu:1335: asya īśvarasya yataḥ īśvarādisaṃkalpeṣu api ahaṃparāmarśanayogyasyaiva sṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1337: yathā kriyākārakasamuccayavikalpādiśaktayo yathāsvaṃ tiṅtṛtīyādicavādiprayogāvaseyaparāmarśaparamārthāḥ pākaḥ kartā samuccayo vikalpaḥ ityādiśabdaiḥ abhidhīyamānāḥ sattvabhāvamāpāditā api pacati caitreṇa ca vā ityevaṃrūpe mūlaparāmarśe viśrāmyanti , anyathā tu tāḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1340: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- parāmarśe nāma viśrāntisthānam , tacca pāryantikameva pāramārthikam , tacca ahamityevaṃrūpameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1341: madhyaviśrāntipadaṃ tu yat vṛkṣamūlasthānīyaṃ grāmagamane tasya tadapekṣayā sṛṣṭatvam ucyate iti ko virodhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1342: anena nīlādeḥ api idaṃ nīlam iti madhyaparāmarśe 'pi mūlaparāmarśe ahamityeva viśrānteḥ ātmamayatvam upapāditameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1343: nīlam idam vedmi ityapi hi ahaṃ prakāśe itīyattattvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1345: mūḍhastu nīlādivimarśāt eva arthakriyādiparitoṣābhimānī iti nīlādeḥ svātantryanirmuktatvam uktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1346: ātmādau tu tanmūlaparāmarśaviśrāntimantareṇa pratītiparisamāptim arthakriyāṃ ca
GSP30abhiprvu:1347: mūḍho'pi na abhimanyata iti tasya nirmitau api anujjhitasvātantryam uktam //17//
GSP30abhiprvu:1348: nanvevaṃ viśvaparāmarśanām aham ityeva viśuddhaikaparāmarśaviśrāntireva tattvam tat katham idam ucyate ----
GSP30abhiprvu:1349: jñānasmṛtyādikā asya śaktaya iti , jñānasya ca saṃśayanirṇayādibhedaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1350: nīlādīnāṃ ca vaicitryam ? iti āśaṅkāyāṃ parihāramāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1353: anupapannam avabhāsanaṃ māyā iti ucyate , tataśca bhinnaṃ prakāśāt sarvam avabhāsajātaṃ māyā , tatra ca cittattvasyaiva svātantryaṃ māyāśaktiḥ , tayā bhinnaṃ yat saṃvedyaṃ pramātuśca anyonyataśca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1354: māyāśaktyā bhinnena pramātuḥ anyonyato vedyācca karaṇavargeṇa yat saṃvedyaṃ sa eva gocaro viśrāntipadaṃ yasyāḥ tādṛśī satī , saiva pratyavamarśātmā citiḥ parāvāgrūpā jñānam iti , saṃkalpa iti , adhyavasāya iti ca ucyate , ādigrahaṇāt saṃśayaḥ smṛtiḥ ityādi /
GSP30abhiprvu:1356: indtriyeṇa sphuṭagrāhiṇā bāhyena viṣayeṇa sphuṭena ca niyantritaṃ saṃvittattvaṃ tat jñānam
GSP30abhiprvu:1358: buddhyā viṣayeṇa ca viṣayatvaparyantabhājā adhyavasāyo niścayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1359: viṣayasya ca yat bhinnatvaṃ bahirantaḥkaraṇānāṃ ca tatprakāśābhedāt anupapannaṃ cittattvena bhāsyate iti bhede yato viśrāntiḥ , na tu bhedasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1360: abhede īśvarasadāśivādivat , tato jñānasaṃkalpādayo bhinnāḥ tasya apradhvastasvasvabhāvābhedasya saṃvittattvasya anusaṃdhātuḥ śaktaya iti
GSP30abhiprvu:1361: uktāḥ , saṃśayādayaśca bhinnā nīlādivaicitryaṃ ca iti sarvam akhaṇḍitam
GSP30abhiprvu:1362: nanu pratyavamarśātmatvaṃ citiśakteḥ saṅkalpasmaraṇādiśaktiṣu sacikalpātmikāsu bhavatu /
GSP30abhiprvu:1363: yā tu nirvikalparūpā sākṣātkaraṇalakṣaṇā anubahvaśaktiḥ , tatra katham /
GSP30abhiprvu:1367: so 'pi tādṛśdṛśam , iti evaṃ prathamasamaye katham abhilāpayogaḥ iti parasya vyāmoham apohitumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1371: 'ṅgulinirdeśādiprakhyo'bhilāpayogaḥ , anyathā bālasya prathamaṃ vyavahāre dṛśyamāne vyutpattireva na syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1372: nirvikalpakajñānaparaṃparayā hi taṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti , tataḥ tamarthaṃ puraḥ paśyati , punastadviviktaṃ bhūtalaṃ paśyati iti ghaṭam ānaya naya iti vyavahārāt katham asya ayam artha iti
GSP30abhiprvu:1373: hṛdi parisphuret , idam ghaṭa iti , idamānaya iti , idaṃ naya iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1374: itiyojanāprāṇo hi ayamarthaḥ , yojanā ca vikalpavyāpāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1375: atra bālāsya prāgjanmānubhūtasaṅketasmṛteḥ evam , tathāpi saṅketakāle sa śabdo viṣayatvena idaṃbhāvena pratyavamṛśyamānatvāt bhedāt pracyutya
GSP30abhiprvu:1376: nirbhāsamāno vijñānaśarīre viśrāntaḥ san vācaka iti bhavati , tad vijñānasya savarūpaṃ cet bhāti tat abhilāpamayameva iti , yathā viṣayasya sukharūpatvābhāve 'pi jñānaṃ sukhātmakaṃ bhāti tathā mā bhūt abhilāpātmā rūpādiḥ viṣayaḥ , tathāpi vijñānaṃ tadātmakaṃ avabhāsiṣyate atra tu darśane viṣayasyāpi vimarśamayatvāt abhilāpamayatvameva vastutaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1377: staimityādyavasthāpi yadi na parāmarśamayī tarhi asyāṃ vikalpātmakapramātṛvyāpārānulāsāt saṃbhavaḥ śapathaparamārtha eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1378: smaraṇaṃ ca na syāt , rūpaviṣayādhyavasāyī hi yadi vikalpa udiyāt kimanyat
GSP30abhiprvu:1379: , sarvacintāsaṃharaṇena staimityaṃ nāma na syāt , iti tatrāpi asti antaḥ parāmarśaḥ , sakalena ca śabdagrāmeṇa śabdanaṃ hi sahante vastūni , tatra ca niyataśabdayojanaṃ kriyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1380: tathā hi ---- bālasya puraḥ puṇḍe sahajo yaḥ parāmarśaḥ , aham ityavicchedena idam iti vicchedena vā tatpṛṣṭhe eva gaura iti gauḥ iti vā śabda āropyate , so 'pi abhyāsāt pramātṛmayo bhavati
GSP30abhiprvu:1381: , tatpṛṣṭhe ca anyaḥ śukla iti , anyat balīvarda iti , ityevaṃ saṅketatattvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1384: iha sākṣātkāro vastutaḥ paśyāmi ityevaṃbhūtavikalpanavyāpāraparyanta eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:1385: vikalpo hi pratyakṣasya vyāpāra iti paro 'pi manyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1386: na ca vyapāraḥ tadvato bhinno yuktaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1392: yadi sa na syāt tat ekābhisaṃdhānena javāt gacchan , tvaritaṃ ca varkṣān paṭhan ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1393: drutaṃ ca mantrapustakaṃ vācayan , na abhimatameva gacchet , uccārayet ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1395: tathā hi ---- tasmin deśe jñānam -- ācikramiṣā -- ākramaṇam
GSP30abhiprvu:1397: deśāntarānusaṃdhiḥ , tatrāpi ācikramiṣā ityādinā yojanaviyojanarūpeṇa pratyavamarśena vinābhimatadeśāvāptiḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
GSP30abhiprvu:1401: atra ca yataḥ paścādbhāvisthūlavikalpakalpanā na saṃvedyate , tata eva tvaritatvam iti sūkṣmeṇa
GSP30abhiprvu:1403: saṃvartitā hi śabdabhāvanā prasāraṇena vivartyamānā sthūlo vikalpaḥ , yathā idamityasya prasāraṇā
GSP30abhiprvu:1404: ghaṭaḥ śkla ityādiḥ , tasyāpi pṛthubudhnodarākāraḥ śuklatvajātiyuktaguṇasamavāyī ityādiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1405: dhāvu gatiśuddhau iti pāṭhāt dhāvistvaritagatau svaśaktivaśāt vartata iti //19//
GSP30abhiprvu:1406: bhavatu evaṃ sūkṣmo vimarśaḥ prakāśaśarīrāveśī , yatra tu sthūlatvena vikalparūpatā sphuṭā , tatra śabdo nīlādivat eva pṛthak pratibhāsate ---- nīlam idam iti , sa kathaṃ prakāśasvarūpāt apṛthagbhūtaḥ syāt , śabdātmā ca vimarśaḥ , sa ca atra māyātmakaṃ bhedapade 'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:1407: prakāśāpṛthagbhūto bhavadbhiḥ iṣṭaḥ , tat etat kathaṃ pratipattavyam ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1410: kena etat uktam ghaṭa iti yaḥ sthūlaḥ śabdaḥ sa prakāśajīvitasvabhāvo vimarśa iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1413: tau nāmakarūpalakṣaṇau śabdārthau ekarūpatayā so 'yam ityevaṃrūpatvena parāmṛśantī adhyavasā yā sā parameśvaraśaktiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1414: vimarśarūpā ātmavadeva ahamityanavacchinnatvena bhāti , na tu kadācit
GSP30abhiprvu:1415: idantayā vicchinnatvena bhāti vicchinnatvena avabhāse parapratiṣṭhatvāt punarvimarśāntareṇa bhāvyam , tatrāpi evam iti anavasthāto nīlasya prakāśanameva na syāt pratiṣṭhālābhābhāvāt tasmāt sarva eva vimarśaḥ prakāśāt avicchinna eva iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1418: nanu evaṃ sarvasyaiva jñānakalāpasya ahamityeva pratiṣṭhāne vedyabhūmisparśo nāsti vedyabhuvi ca deśakālayogaḥ na tu vedakāṃśe ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1419: deśakālayogābhāve ca yat idaṃ jñānāṃ deśāpekṣayā pramātrādyaṃśāpekṣayā ca sakramatvaṃ lakṣyate tat kathaṃ syāt , kramābhāve ca ekatvameva vastuto bhavet , tataśca jñānasmṛtyādibhistadvān parameśvaraḥ iti yat uktaṃ tat kathaṃ nirvahet ityāśaṅkāṃ śamayan pūrvoktamupasaṃharati
GSP30abhiprvu:1422: satyam evam akramameva saṃvittattvam , kintu svaśaktivaśāt bhinnatvena bhāsitāni yāni vedyāni teṣāṃ mūrtibhedakṛto yo dūrādūravaitatyāvaitatyādiḥ deśaḥ , kriyābhedakṛtaśca yaḥ ciraśīghrakramādirūpaḥ kālaḥ , tau anurudhya chāyāmātreṇa abalambya,
GSP30abhiprvu:1424: tadbhāsamānāṃśakṛtaśca sakramatvāvabhāsaḥ parasparāpekṣayā svāṃśāpekṣayā ca , yadyapi kālakrama eva sphuṭo vijñāneṣu bhāti na deśakramaḥ , tathāpi vimūḍhasya parvatasaṃvedanaṃ vitatamiva vadarasaṃvedanaṃ ca sūkṣmamiva bhāti iti deśakramo 'pi darśitaḥ , tena vedyagatakramasvīkārābhāsāt sakramatvam ābhāsamānamapi na apāramārthikam ābhāsamānasya parārthatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1425: tataśca yuktamuktam jñānādayo 'sya bhagavataḥ śaktayaḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1430: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptaviracitāyāṃīśvarapratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ prathame jñānādhikāre jñānaśaktinirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcamāhnikam // 5 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1435: atha tadubhayānuprāhiṇī apohanaśaktirvitatya ślokaikādaśakena ahaṃ pratyavamarśo yaḥ prakāśātmā ityādinā siddhe sarvasya jīvataḥ ityantena nirṇīyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1436: tatra ślokena pratyavamarśe avikalpo viśeṣaḥ iti sūcyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1451: tatra vimarśo 'bhilāpātmanā śabdena yojita eva , tadyojanākṛtaṃ ca vikalparūpatvaṃ śuddhe 'pi parameśvare prāptam , na caitadiṣṭaṃ tasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1454: nāsau vikalpaḥ sa hyukto dvayākṣepī viniścayaḥ // Ipk_1,6.1 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1455: prakāśasya śuddhasaṃvidrūpasya dehādisaṃsparśairanāvilībhūtasya yaḥ ātmā jīvitabhūtaḥ sārasvabhāvo vicchedaśūnyo 'ntarabhyupagamakalpo
GSP30abhiprvu:1459: viṣayarūpāt śrotragrāhyāt śabdādanya eva antaravabhāsamānaḥ saṃvidrūpāveśī śabdanātmābhilāpo vāgityanenoktaḥ ---- vakti arthaṃ svādhyāsena so 'yamityabhisaṃdhānena /
GSP30abhiprvu:1461: āha ---- na hyasya vikalpalakṣaṇamasti , tathā hi ---- vividhā kalpanā vividhatvena ca śaṅkitasya kalpo 'nvavyavacchedanaṃ vikalpaḥ , vividhatvaṃ ca bahnāvanagnisaṃbhāvanāsamāropanirāse 'sati bhavat , dvayaṃ vahnyavahnirūpaṃ samākṣipati , tena vikalpe 'vaśyaṃ tacca niścetavyam atacca apohitavyaṃ bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1465: yogyadeśābhimatasthānākramaṇaśīlo vijñānajanakaḥ svakāraṇopanītaḥ saṃbhāvyate paṭādisvabhāvaḥ , ato ghaṭāghaṭayordvayoravabhāvasasya saṃbhāvanāt samāropaḥ sāvakāśo bhavati , aghaṭasya satyārope niṣedhanalakṣaṇopohanavyāpāraḥ iti tadanuprāṇitā vikalparūpatā ghaṭa ityetasya niścayasya , liṅ saṃbhāvanāyām /
GSP30abhiprvu:1466: yastvayaṃ prakāśo nāma tasya sthāne yaḥ saṃbhāvyate sa tāvadaprakāśarūpo na bhavati tulyakakṣasya hi saṃbhāvanaṃ bhavati , na ca yatprakāśena kartavyaṃ tadaprakāśasya kadācit
GSP30abhiprvu:1467: dṛṣṭam saṃbhāvanāropaṇādibalādeva ca asyāprakāśarūpatvaṃ vighaṭeta , ataḥ prakāśatulyasyānyasyāprakāśarūpasya bhedinastattulyakakṣyasyāpohanātmakabhedanavyāpārāsāhiṣṇoravabhāsanameva nāsti , tadabhāve kasyāpoṣṭhanam ? avabhāsasaṃbhave 'pi prakāśarūpatvameva
GSP30abhiprvu:1468: / na ca prakāśasya svarūpadeśakālabhedo yena dvitīyaḥ prakāśa ekasmādapohyeteti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1470: vikalparūpatvābhāvāt cinmātre parāmarśātmani ahamiti pratyavamarśa eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1472: nanu ghaṭe pariniṣthitarūpe dṛṣṭe taddarśanamupajīvatā vikalpena kathamaghaṭasya niṣedhanaṃ kriyate , na hyaghaṭasya kenacinnāmāpi gṛhītam
GSP30abhiprvu:1473: aghaṭavāsanāpi ghaṭe dṛṣṭe kathaṃkāraṃ prabudhyatām ? satyam , evaṃ śākyaḥ paryanuyojyo na tu vayam , yataḥ tadatatpratibhābhājā mātraivātadvyapohanāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1474: tanniścayanamukto hi vikalpo ghaṭa ityayam // Ipk_1,6.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1475: iha pramātā nāma pramāṇādatiriktaḥ pramāsu svatantraḥ saṃyojanaviyojanādyādhānavaśāt kartā darśitaḥ , tasya ca pramāturantaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1476: sarvārthāvabhāsaḥ , cinmātraśarīro 'pi tatsāmānādhikaraṇyavṛttirapi darpaṇanagaranyāyenāsti ---- ityapi uktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1477: evaṃ ca tatpratibhāṃ ghaṭābhāsam , atatpratibhāṃ ca aghaṭābhāsaṃ pramātā bhajate ---- sevate tāvat , tadavikalpadaśāyāṃ citsvabhāvo 'sau ghaṭaḥ cidvadeva viśvaśarīraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1478: pūrṇaḥ , na ca tena kaścidvyavahāraḥ , tat māyāvyāpāramukkāsayanpūrṇamapi khaṇḍayati bhāvam , tenāghaṭasyātmanaḥ paṭādeścāpohanaṃ kriyate
GSP30abhiprvu:1479: niṣedhanarūpam , tadeva vyapohanamāśritya tasma ghaṭasya niścayanamucyate ghaṭa eva iti , evārthasya saṃbhāvyamānāparavastuniṣedharūpatvāt , eṣa eva paritaśchedāttakṣaṇakalpāt paricchedaḥ , hīti ---- yata evam , tasmāt yuktaṃ dvayākṣepī vikalpaḥ iti pūrvaślokoltena vastudvayena hetū krameṇoktau yasmādevaṃ vikalpaḥ tato 'hamiti śuddho vimarśaḥ na vikalpaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1481: śākyairapi pramāturevāyaṃ vyāpāra uktaḥ ekaḥ pratyavamarśākhyaḥ ityatra prapattā iti svayam iti ca vadadbhiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1483: nanvevamahamityapi pratyavamarśe 'nahaṃrūpasya ghaṭādeḥ pratiyogino '; pohanīyasyāpohe vikalparūpatā kathaṃ na syāt ityāśayenāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1484: cittattvaṃ māyayā hitvā bhinna evāvabhāti yaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1485: dehe buddhāvatha prāṇe kalpite nabhasīva vā // Ipk_1,6.4 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1488: ahamityavamarśo dvidhā ---- śuddho māyīyaśca , tatra śuddho yaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1491: tatra śuddhe 'haṃpratyavamarśe pratiyogī na kaścidapohitavyaḥ saṃbhavati ghaṭāderapi
GSP30abhiprvu:1494: aśuddhastu vedyarūpe śarīrādau anyasmād dehāderghaṭādeśca vyavacchedena bhavan vikalpa eva ---- iti vākyārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1496: cittattvaṃ prakāśamātrarūpaṃ hitvā sadapyapahastanayā apradhānīkṛtya bhinne dehādāvahameva dehādiḥ nīlādau prameye pramātā ---- ityabhimānena yo 'haṃ sthūlaḥ ityādivimarśaḥ sa vikalpa eva , na tu śuddhaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1498: atra hetuḥ ---- paro dvitīyo dehādirghaṭādiśca yaḥ pratiyogī tulyakakṣyo 'nyonyaparihārācca viruddhastasya yo 'vabhāsaḥ ----
GSP30abhiprvu:1499: samāropaṇalakṣaṇaḥ , tasmādyato 'sāvatanniṣedhānuprāṇito '; hamityavamarśo jātaḥ ahaṃ sthūlaḥ , na kṛśaḥ , na ghaṭādiḥ iti , śuddhaprakāśarūpasya apahastanaiva dehāderbhedahetuḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1501: bhrāntirūpaṃ prati svātantryarūpā māyāśaktirhetuḥ , cidrūpasya cāpahastanaṃ dehādereva atyaktavedyabhāvasya bhinnasyaiva upapattiśūnyatayaiva pramātṛtvābhimānaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1502: tathā ca dehābhimānabhūmikāyāṃ sthitāścārvākāḥ caitanyaviśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣaḥ iti kāyameva
GSP30abhiprvu:1503: / strībālamūrkhāṇāṃ tathābhimānāt tato 'pi vivekayuktāḥ pākajotpattipariṇāmādibalādasthiraṃ śarīraṃ manvānāḥ prāṇaśaktisamadhiṣṭhānena ca vinā vikāraśatāveśaṃ śarīrasya paśyanto bubhukṣāpipāsāyogayogyaṃ prāṇamevātmānaṃ kecana śrutyantavido manyante /
GSP30abhiprvu:1506: apare tasyā api yogidśāyāṃ vedyabhāvādaparatvaṃ manyamānāḥ asaṃvedyaparvarūpaṃ yanna kiṃcidrūpaṃ sakalavedyarāśivinirmuktaṃ śūnyatvānnabhastulyaṃ na tu mahābhūtākāśasvabhāvaṃ tat pramātṛtattvaṃ śūnyabrahmavādinaḥ sāṃkhyaprabhṛtaya āhuḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1507: tasminnapi vedye śunyāntaraṃ tatrāpi śūnyāntram ---- iti yāvadbhedaḥ tāvatkalpanā na truṭyatīti tadarthamāha kalpite iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1508: na cānavasthā paramārthaprakāśabalena yataḥ sarvasya prakāśo na tu dehādivaśāt , tayā tvabhimānamātraṃ dehaḥ pramāteti , saṅkocamātrarūpaṃ cittattvaṃ śūnyam , bhūtalaṃ yathā ghaṭābhāvaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1510: amī eva bhūmikāviśeṣā uttarottaramārohatāṃ yogināṃ jāgradāditayā piṇḍasthāditayā cāgameṣu bhaṇyante , apahastanaṃ ca vyākhyāsyateḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1513: iti , tatsthitam ---- aśuddhaḥ aham ityavamarśo vikalpa eva //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:1515: anubhavamātrarūpaścānusaṃdhānātmā ca , śivātmani aham iti sadāśivātmani ahamidam iti śuddho dvidhā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1516: aśuddho 'pi ahaṃ sthūla iti , yo 'haṃ sthūlo
GSP30abhiprvu:1517: 'bhavaṃ so 'haṃ kṛśa , bālo , yuvā , sthaviraḥ , sa eva aham iti ca aśuddho dvividhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1519: aśuddhe tu anubhavarūpe vikalpatvamupapāditam , aśuddhe 'pi tu anusaṃdhānātmakatayā abhedasya prasphuraṇāt kaścidavikalpakatvaṃ śaṅketa
GSP30abhiprvu:1523: dehe ityādi vartate , kādācitkaḥ kadācidbhavo niyatadeśakālākāro
GSP30abhiprvu:1524: 'vabhāso yasya dehādeḥ svalakṣaṇarūpasya , tatra yā pūrvābhāsena
GSP30abhiprvu:1525: bālādiśarīrāvabhāsena yojanā yo 'haṃ bālaḥ sa evādya yuvā ityanusaṃdhānam , ādigrahaṇāduttareṇa bhāvinā ābhāsena saha yojanā sthaviro bhavitāsmi iti , sā yojanā sarvā kalpanā vikalpa eva , na tu śuddhaḥ pratyavamarśaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1526: atra dehāderviśeṣaṇaṃ hetutvāśayena ---- yato bhinnatāvabhāsitvameva dehādestadānīmapi avichinnam , yadi hi tasya dehādeḥ sarvataḥ pūrṇatvam
GSP30abhiprvu:1527: avacchedahīnatvaṃ paśyan anusaṃdhānam ahamidam iti vidadhyāt tadiyaṃ sadāśivabhūḥ kena vikalpātpadatvena bhaṇyeta yāvatā 'vicchinne eva so 'nusaṃdhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1528: bhinnepi(KSS: hi) kathamanusaṃdhānam iti cedāha saṃskārāt prāktanānubhavakṛtavāsanāprabodhajasmṛtivaśāt iti yāvat , prāṇe balābalavaśādanusaṃdhiḥ , buddhau jñānasukhāditāratamyāt , śūnye vaitatyāvaitatyayogāt , ayamapi vikalpa eva , evaṃ sa evāyaṃ ghaṭaḥ iti ghaṭādyanusaṃdhāne 'pi vikalpatvaṃ mantavyam , kintu etāsu anusaṃdhānabhūmiṣu vidyāśaktirādhikyena aciradyutivaddīpyate iti tāsāṃ parapadapariśīlanaprathamakalpābhyupāyatvamabhyupāgaman guravaḥ //6//
GSP30abhiprvu:1529: na ca dehādīnāṃ pūrvapūrvapramātṛvedyatā yena pramāturaprakāśe prameyaṃ na bhāti tatprakāśaśca na pūrvaprakāśaṃ vinā , so 'pi na pramātrantaraprakāśaṃ vinā ityanavasthā syāt , api tu śuddhaprakāśa eva viśvasya prakāśa iti nirūpayan uktayuktyā sadaiva sṛṣṭyādiśaktyaviyogo bhagavata ukto bhavati , iti darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:1532: yat pūrvaṃ darśitaṃ dehe buddhau ityādi tat evam upapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1533: katham ? yadi vyavahāre māyāpade dehaprāṇādimapi prabhureva prakāśaparamārtha icchayā māyāśaktirūpayā , āviśan dehaprāṇādiprādhānyena svarūpaṃ pradarśayan , antaḥ saṃbinmātre , bhāntam ahamityevaṃrūpam arthaugham icchayaiva bahiḥ idamiti bhāsayati tata etadupapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1537: , yat etāvat uktam , taditi , tasmāt hetoḥ , evaṃ jātaṃ vakṣyamāṇarūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1538: kiṃtat ? yat kila prabhuḥ parasparaṃ vyavahārakāle krayavikrayaprekṣāvyākhyādau caitramaitrādisaṃbandhino
GSP30abhiprvu:1539: ekatayā tāvati vyavahāre āviśan antarbhāntameva anujjhitāntaḥprakāśameva santaṃ bahiḥ ekābhāsatayā bhāsayati iti saṃbhāvyate ityetajjātam , iti saṃbhāvanāyāṃ liṅ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1540: tena tena pramātrā saha asminkāle aikyaṃ sṛjyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1541: anyena pramātrā aikyaṃ saṃhriyate , ghaṭādimātrarūpe sthitiḥ kriyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1542: pūrṇasvarūpanimīlanāt tirobhāva ādhīyate , tāvatyābhāse aikyāvabhāsapūrṇatvavitaraṇāt anugrahaḥ kriyate , tena na kevalaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1543: mahāsṛṣṭiṣu mahāsthitiṣu mahāpralayeṣu prakopatirodhāneṣu dīkṣājñānādyanugraheṣu bhagavataḥ krṭyapañcakayogaḥ yāvat satatameva vyavahārepi /
GSP30abhiprvu:1555: iha antararthābhāvabhāsaḥ sthita eva , tat kiṃ tatra
GSP30abhiprvu:1556: kāraṇāntaracintayā iti prakṛtaṃ prameyam , tatsiddhaye upapattiḥ uktā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1557: tena vinā icchārūpaḥ pratyavamarśo na syāt iti , tatprasaṅgāt pratyavamarśavikalpādisvarūpam upapāditam , iti śiṣyāṇāṃ dhiyaṃ samādhātuṃ prakṛtaṃ prameyam upapādayan upasaṃharati
GSP30abhiprvu:1559: jñāne vāpyantarābhāsaḥ sthita eveti niścitam // Ipk_1,6.8 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1560: prakāśātmā parameśvara eva yato dehādipramātṛtābhimānadaśāyāmapi vastutaḥ pramātā , evam iti , ato hetoḥ idaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati ---- smaraṇe apohanajīvite ca vikalpe anubhavajñāne ca antarābhāsaḥ prakāśaviśrāntaḥ sthita eva , nātra saṃśayaḥ kaścit , yadi hi dehādireva paramārthapramātā syāt tat śarīrasya prāṇasya dhiyaḥ śūnyasya vā antarghaṭādi iti na kiṃcit
GSP30abhiprvu:1562: paramārthaprakāśastu sarvaṃsahaḥ iti tatrāntarviśvam , iti anāyāsasiddhametat //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:1563: nanu antarābhāsavargasya bahirābhāsanaṃ yadi sarvatrāsti kastarhi smaraṇādau ābhāsabhedaḥ , na ca asau na saṃvedyate ----
GSP30abhiprvu:1567: anubhavajñānasya idaṃ nīlam iti antaravabhāsaṃ vahirābhāsayataḥ svāntarbhāvābhāso naisargika
GSP30abhiprvu:1568: nisṛṣṭeḥ svātantryāt āyāto na tu smaraṇāderiva anyajñānakṛtavāsanādibalāt
GSP30abhiprvu:1569: / smaraṇe utprekṣaṇe pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvini adhyavasāye ca yo
GSP30abhiprvu:1570: 'ntarnīlādyavabhāso bāhyatayā adhyavasāyitavyaḥ nāsau svātmoyaḥ api tu
GSP30abhiprvu:1571: pūrvānubhavasaṃskārajo 'sau , tatra saṃskāro nāma anubhavasya kālāntare 'pi anuvartamānatā , ato 'sāvanuvartamāno 'nubhavo yato nīlādyābhāsasaṃbhinnaḥ tataḥ tattādātmyāpannaṃ smaraṇādyapi tathā
GSP30abhiprvu:1572: nirbhāsate , tata eva smaraṇakālāsaṃbhavī ābhāsaḥ tadanubhavapūrvakālakalita eveti svayaṃ smaraṇādernirviṣayatvaṃ gṛhītagrāhitvaṃ ca uddhoṣyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1573: etadeva asphuṭatvam , iti siddho 'nubhavasmaraṇādau ābhāsabhedaḥ antarābhāsavargasya bahirābhāsanam
GSP30abhiprvu:1574: anyāvyavadhānena sphuṭatā , vyavadhānena tu tātkālikatvābhāvāt asphuṭatā iti //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:1575: nanu anubhavajñānāt aindriyakāt anyat sarvaṃ jñānaṃ vyavadhānena bahirābhāsanarūpaṃ prāptam ityāśaṅkya pravibhāgamāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1578: yaḥ pratyakṣavyāpāram anupajīvan vyākṣepasāratayā manorājyasaṅkalpādivikalpaḥ sa svaraṃ kṛtvā svapreraṇena prapreraṇanairapekṣyeṇa svātantryeṇa carati udeti vyayate ca , tatra yo bahirābhāso nīlādeḥ antarābhāsamayasya sa naisargika eva , tathā hi aparidṛṣṭapūrvamapi śvetaṃ daśanaśatakalotakarayugalayuktaṃ dantinam antaḥ pramātṛbhūmau sthitaṃ bahiḥ antaḥkaraṇabhūmau svacchadhīdarpaṇātmikāyāṃ sa
GSP30abhiprvu:1580: asmācca antarābhāsasaṃbhavasamarthanaprasaṅgāgatāt ābhāsabhedavicārāt śāstre yat prayoanaṃ mukhyatayā abhisaṃhitaṃ svātmani īśvarapratyabhijñānarūpaṃ tadadhikaraṇasiddhāntanītyā anāyāsasiddham iti darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:1582: jñānakriye sphuṭe eva siddhe sarvasya jīvataḥ // Ipk_1,7.1 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1583: pratibhāti ghaṭaḥ iti yadyapi viṣayopaśliṣṭameva pratibhānaṃ bhāti tathāpi na tadviṣayasya svakaṃ vapuḥ , api tu saṃvedanameva tat tathā cakāsti māṃ prati bhāti iti pramātṛlagnatvāt tathā ca veda
GSP30abhiprvu:1584: {tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti
GSP30abhiprvu:1586: śatrā aviratasphuraṇatvaṃ karmapravacanīyena tadīyasvātantryopakalpitanirmāṇakriyājanito vedyavedakabhāvarūpo lakṣaṇātmā saṃbandho dyotitaḥ , kevalaṃ viṣayollekhanabalāt bahiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1587: kramāvabhāsaḥ samarthitaḥ , sa sa kramayaugapadyādivicitrarūpo yaḥ padārthānāṃ vakṣyamāṇeśvarasvātantryarūpadeśakālaśaktyupakalpitaḥ kramaḥ deśakālaparipāṭī , tena rūṣitā pratibimbakalpatayā uparaktā , yā pratibhā uktā
GSP30abhiprvu:1590: eṣā iti ca sarvasya svakāśarūpā , paramārthataśca antarmukhatvena prakāśamātraparamārthatayā bhedābhāvāt akramā , saiva maheśvaraḥ , avidyamāno 'ntaḥ paricchedo deśataḥ kālataḥ svarūpataśca yasyāḥ cittaḥ saṃvidaḥ tadeva rūpaṃ yasya iti , ata eva bahirmukhaprakāśātmakavijñānasvabhāvasya pramāṇavargasya yo 'ntaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1591: pratyābhāsam idam idam iti ananta ---- kalpaḥ vikalpamayo vimarśātmā
GSP30abhiprvu:1592: pramāsamūhaḥ , tatra saṃyojanaviyojanaviśramādirūpānekaprakārasvātantryaparipūrṇaḥ śuddhāhaṃpratyavamarśamayaḥ pramātā sa bhaṇyate , ataśca bahirghaṭaprakāśaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭaḥ iti antarvikalpaḥ svīkṛtapūrvarūpaḥ aham iti tadubhayaviśrāntisthānam , itīyat pūrṇaṃ prakāśasya svarūpam //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:1596: saṃvinniṣṭhā hi viṣayavyavasthitayaḥ iti yat ucyate tat na bhinnarūpaprakātmakasaṃvinmātraviśrāntyā siddhyati api tu tāstā vibhinnāḥ saṃvido niścayarūpāḥ pramātmāno yāḥ tāni eva mukhāni dvārāṇi upāyā mārgāḥ taiḥ mukhaiḥ nadīsrotaḥsthānīyaiḥ yadi amī bhāvā nīlasukhādaya uhyamānā ekasmin aham iti pramātṛrūpe mahāsaṃvitsamudre pratitiṣṭhanti ābhimukhyena viśrāntiṃ bhajante , tata eṣu parasparaṃ samanvayarūpaṃ tat jñāteyaṃ tat upapattyā ghaṭate , jñātīnāṃ bhāvaḥ tacchabdapravṛttinimittaṃ parasparaṃ jānīyuḥ iti , karma ca anyonyayogakṣemodvahanātmakaṃ jñāteyam , tacca samanvayābhiprāyeṇa iha darśitam , na jaḍānāṃ svataḥ samanvayaḥ kadācidapi iti pratipādayitum //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:1600: arthānāṃ jaḍānām , tajjñānāṃ tadvikalpānāṃ tanniścayānāṃ ca deśakramaṃ kālakramaṃ cātyajatām , svasamāpinām ----
GSP30abhiprvu:1601: svarūpamātrapratiṣṭhānām , kaḥ samanvayaḥ , na kaścit ityarthaḥ , yato hi asau samanvayaḥ sakṛdābhāsena deśakālākāramiśrīkaraṇātmanā yojanābhāsena sādhayituṃ śakyaḥ nānyathā , na hi pṛthakpṛthak parikṣīṇeṣu srotaḥsu taduhyamānāḥ tṛṇolapādayaḥ samanvayaṃ kaṃcit yānti iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1602: anekatvena deśakālādibheda ityāśayena sakṛcchabdaḥ tanniṣedhatātparyeṇa prayuktaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1607: iha anubhūto viṣayaḥ prakāśate smṛtau , tatra viṣayasyāsau smṛtiḥ na nūtanaḥ prakāśaḥ api tu asya sa prakāśaḥ prācyo 'nubhava eva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1608: sa cānubhavo jñānarūpatvena jñeyarūpatvābhāvāt na jñānāntarasaṃvedyaḥ api tu svaprakāśaḥ , sa ca smṛtikāle yadi asan tat kathaṃ prakāśatām , bhavatu vā asau tathāpi smṛtiḥ syāt , tasmāt etat evamupapadyate , yadeva smṛtisvasaṃvedanam , tadeva anubhavasya svasaṃvedanam , na tu aparaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1609: svasaṃvedanavyatiriktaṃ pratyakṣam anumānādikaṃ vā tatra kramate , tataśca tāvatkālāpi avichinnamekaṃ yat svasaṃvedanaṃ tadeva pramātṛttvam iti siddham /
GSP30abhiprvu:1610: anyatra anubhavitari smartā anyo na upapadyate , ityanayā chāyayā smṛtyā pramātṛsiddhiḥ pūrvamuktā , idānīṃ tu svasaṃvedanaikībhāvena bhaṅgyantareṇa iti viśeṣaḥ //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:1612: aprāmāṇyaṃ hi bādhabalāt bhavati , bādhābhāve tat kathaṃ syād ityāśaṅkya so 'pi ayaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ satyāsatyapravibhājanayā viśveṣāṃ vyavahārāṇāṃ jīvitabhūto na ekena pramātṛtattvena vinā ghaṭata iti vitatya darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:1615: bādhābhāve prāmāṇyam ityetadartham avaśyasamarthyo yo bādhavyavahāraḥ so 'pi katham iti api śabdasyārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1616: iha śuktyā tāvat rajatasya na kācit bādhā nāma kriyamāṇā dṛśyate , śuktijñānena rajatajñānaṃ bādhyate ityapi na yuktam , svasmin viṣaye ātmani ca svarūpe dvayoḥ jñānayoḥ pariniṣṭhitayoḥ viśr|antayoḥ anyonyaṃ virodhasya abhāvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1617: atha ayaṃ parasparaparihāra eva virodhaḥ tarhi sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ virodhāt bādhyabādhakabhāvasya svātmani pariniṣṭhaiva na labhyeti sutarāṃ vighaṭeta satyetarapravibhāgaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1619: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- yadi jñānaṃ svayaṃ naśyati tadā kiṃ jñānāntareṇa asya kṛtam , na hi tena tatkāle 'saṃbhavatā tasya viṣayāpahāraḥ kartuṃ śakyaḥ , na rājatam ityapi jñānaṃ svaṃ rajatābhāvaṃ viṣayīkurvat na viṣayam apaharet rajatajñānasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:1620: athāpi jñānāntareṇa nāśyate ityapi pakṣaḥ , tatrāpi sarveṣāṃ jñānām iyameva saraṇiriti kiṃcideva bādhyam iti kathaṃ syāt ?
GSP30abhiprvu:1621: yadā tu rajatajñānaṃ śuktijñānaṃ ca ekatra svasaṃvedane viśrānyataḥ tadā etat upapadyate , tathā hi ---- ekatrāpi pramātṛtattve viśrāmyatāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1622: jñānānāṃ naikaprakāraiva viśrāntiḥ api tu vicitratayaiva sā saṃvedyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1623: tathā hi ---- nīlam iti utpalam iti jñāne pramātari viśrāmyantī parasparoparāgābhāsena viśrāmyataḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1624: ghaṭa iti paṭa iti parasparānāśkeṣeṇa , śuktikā iti na rajatam iti vā jñānaṃ rajatam iti jñānasya unmūlanaṃ tadīyavimarśātmakapramārūpavyāpārānuvartanavidhvaṃsaṃ kurvat pramātari
GSP30abhiprvu:1626: evaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvādau viśrāntivaicitryaṃ prameyāsaṃbhavi pramātrā svātantryeṇa nirmitaṃ tata eva asya pramāsvatantratādāyi vācyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1627: evamekatra pramātari pūrvajñānasya parivarjanena yato niścitā sthitiḥ , iti bādhyabādhakavyavahāra
GSP30abhiprvu:1628: , nīlādivat kila tānapi vyavahārān sa eva parameśvaraḥ svātantryāt ābhāsayati tat te 'pi satyā eveti //6//
GSP30abhiprvu:1632: iha śuktikājñānaṃ svātmānaṃ saṃvidat svātmābhinnaṃ pramāṇatvaṃ budhyate , tatparicchinatti iti nyāyāt , tatparicchedanāntarīyakaśca anyavyavaccheda ityaśuktijñānarūpasya rajatajñānasya apramāṇatvavedanaṃ tadeva ucyate yat etat śuktikāsaṃvedanābhinnapramāṇatvavedanam , na ca etat apūrvaṃ yat vastvantarajñānameva vastvantarābhāvajñānam iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1634: evam apramāṇatvasaṃvedanameva rajatajñānasya bādhyatvam ucyate , ataśca bādhyabādhakatvam evaṃ siddham iti cet asmābhiḥ ucyate ---- tat kiṃ pramātraikyeneti //7//
GSP30abhiprvu:1635: atra prasaṅgāt abhāvavyavahārasya siddhau tattvamupapādayiṣyan dṛṣṭāntameva tāvat paradarśane
GSP30abhiprvu:1638: yo dṛṣṭānta uktaḥ sa eva na , kuta iti cet ucyate iha bhūtalaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1639: na ghaṭaḥ iti tādātmyena abhāvo vyavahartavyaḥ kadācit , kadācit vyatirekeṇa iha bhūtale ghaṭo na iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1641: vyavahāraḥ sidhyati , yatra dṛśyatvaṃ na upayogi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1642: upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirapi hi yasya nāsti piśācādeḥ svabhāvabalāt , yasya vā śabdādeḥ tadgāhakaśrotrādisāmagrīsākalyasya tatra ekajñānasaṃsargivastvantarapratipattyabhāvenāniścayāt tasyāpi tādātmyenāyamabhāvo gṛhyate bhūtalaṃ na piśāco na śabdaḥ iti , yatra tu dṛśyatvaṃ viśeṣaṇam avaśyam apayogi tatra vyatirekeṇa abhāve vyavahartavye na eṣo 'bhyupāyaḥ //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:1647: vidyamāne 'pi ghaṭe bhūtalaṃ śuddhameva , na hi bhāvā
GSP30abhiprvu:1648: miśrībhavanti , tataśca tadāpi śuddhabhūtalajñānam asti , iti satyapi ghaṭe katham abhāvo vyatirekeṇa na vyavahriyate atra bhūtale ghaṭo nāsti iti , tajjñānam iti viviktabhūtalabhāgajñānam , jātu iti kasyāṃcideva
GSP30abhiprvu:1649: daśāyāṃ ghaṭāsaṃnidhānarūpāyām , bhinnasya ghaṭasya abhāvaṃ sādhayati na tu sarvadā iti kena prakāreṇa bhavet , etena atra bhūtale piśāco nāsti ityapi syāditi āpatitaṃ mantavyam nanvevaṃ vyatirekābhāvaniṣṭho vyavahāro loke tāvat avigītaḥ asyāṃcideva daśāyāṃ dṛṣṭaḥ , tatra kā gatirityāśaṅkya
GSP30abhiprvu:1653: iha bhāva eva bhāvāntarasya abhāva iti vyavahartavyaḥ iti ayaṃ tāvat aparityājyaḥ prātītikaḥ panthāḥ , tatra bhāvasya bhāvāntareṇa ya ādhāryādhārabhāvaḥ sa eva bhāvatadabhāvayoḥ , tataśca bhūtale ghaṭavyatiriktaṃ vastvantaraṃ śilādikam ālokapuñjādikaṃ vā yat cākṣuṣe jñāne bhāti tadeva vyavahriyate bhūtale ghaṭābhāvaḥ , bhūtale ghaṭo nāsti
GSP30abhiprvu:1654: iti vā , yatrāpi nāsti cakṣurvyāpāro netranimīlanasaṃtamasādau tatrāpi bhūtale ghaṭocitakaṭhinasparśaviviktaṃ mṛdum uṣṇaṃ śītam anuṣṇāśītaṃ vā gṛhṇan tameva atra ghaṭābhāva iti vyavaharati vāyusparśasya sarvagasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1658: tatrāha tatra bhūtale ālokacayaḥ tāvat asti jñeyaḥ , andhasya uṣṇādikaḥ sparśaḥ asti , tasya ālokacayasya sparśasya vā yat svajñānam
GSP30abhiprvu:1659: anyaghaṭādiviviktena svena rūpeṇa jñānam tat kartṛ , tasya ālokādeḥ aghaṭarūpatāṃ ghaṭābhāvarūpatāṃ tatra bhūtale sādhayati iti śakyo ';
GSP30abhiprvu:1662: āntaraprāṇaspandanajanitasūkṣmaśabdākarṇanācca śrotrādisākalyaṃ saṃbhavāyamānaḥ tameva śabdam ekajñānasaṃsargiṇaṃ śṛṇvan śabdāntaraṃ niṣedhayati na iha anyaḥ śabdaḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1664: dantodakarasaṃ tripuṭikāgandhaṃ kāyīyaṃ ca sparśaṃ saṃvedayamānenaiva rasābhāvo vedyaḥ , na hi ekajñānasaṃsargayogyavastvantaropalambhena vinā upalabdhikāraṇasākalyaniścayo 'sti , iti ekānta eṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1665: acirapravṛttatattadviṣayānubhavakalpitasya tadaiva dhvaṃsānāśaṅkanāt karaṇasya kāraṇasākalyaniścayaḥ kim ekajñānasaṃsargitayā iti cet na ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1667: nanvevam adṛśyāsyāpi piśācādeḥ niṣedhavyavahāro vyatirekeṇāpi prāpnoti , sa hi ālokapuñjo yathā ghaṭāt anyaḥ tadvat piśācāderapi /
GSP30abhiprvu:1670: adṛśyo bhūtalasyāntarna niṣedhyaḥ sa sarvathā // Ipk_1,7.11 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1671: ālokapuñjo yadyapi piśācād vyatirikto yadyapi ca āloko 'sti
GSP30abhiprvu:1672: apiśācātmā ityetāvat siddhyati tathāpi atra piśāco nāsti ityetat aśakyam adhyavasātum ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1673: ghaṭo hi ālokapūramadhye 'pi asaṃbhāvyaḥ , ghaṭasaṃnidhau tatra ālokapūrāsamarpaṇāt , ataśca siddhyatīdam atra ghaṭo nāsti iti , piśācastu tādṛksvabhāvo yo bhūtalamadhye ālokamadhye 'pi vā bhavan bhūtalasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1674: ālokasya vā tāṃ nibiḍatāṃ na vihanti , tataśca ālokamadhye tasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1675: saṃbhāvanāt kathaṃ vyatirekeṇa niṣedhavyavahāraḥ , evaṃ rūpamadhye rasādeḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1677: yadyapi anālokaḥ ālokāt anyaḥ piśācaḥ tathāpi asau bhūtalasya antarmadhye 'dṛśyo bhavati iti saṃbhāvyate yathā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1678: tadvadeva ālokasyābhyantarepi so'sti iti saṃbhāvyata eva , tataśca yadyapi ālokastato 'nyaḥ ityanena pathā niṣiddhaḥ piśācaḥ tathāpi sarvaprakāreṇa
GSP30abhiprvu:1679: na niṣiddhaḥ iti tadabhāvanibandhanāḥ kathaṃ tatra vyavahārāḥ pravartantām iti ślokārthaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1680: evaṃ prasaṅgāt abhāvavyavahārasya tattvam upadarśya prakṛte
GSP30abhiprvu:1684: yathā āloko ghaṭābhāva iti āloke gṛhīte prāk gṛhītasya ghaṭasya na kiṃcit āyātam tathaiva śuktijñānaṃ rūpyajñānābhāva iti iyat saṃbhāvyate
GSP30abhiprvu:1685: / yathā ghaṭajñānaṃ ghaṭajñānaprāmāṇyasaṃvit paṭajñānābhāvaḥ paṭajñānābhāvaprāmāṇyasaṃvit iyatā ca na pūrvapravṛttaṃ paṭajñānam apramāṇībhavati , eṣā hi tasya ghaṭajñānasya svarūpacintā sarvā na jñānāntarasya ādyasya kimapi ato jātam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1686: evaṃ śuktiriyam iti , na rajatam idam iti ca jñānameva svātmanā prakāśatām , ahaṃ śuktau rajatābhāve ca pramāṇaṃ na tu rajate iti , tāvatā tu prāktanasya rajatajñānasya na kiṃcit
GSP30abhiprvu:1687: vṛttam iti tadviṣayīkṛtaṃ rajataṃ katham asatyaṃ syāt //12//
GSP30abhiprvu:1688: nanvidamityanena tadeva parāmṛśyate yatra rajatajñānam abhūt tatraiva idānīṃ na rajatam iti śuktiḥ iti ca jñānaṃ pramāṇabhūtaṃ jātam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1689: tat ato 'numīyate ---- tat prācyaṃ rajatajñānam apramāṇam iti , na hi etat
GSP30abhiprvu:1690: saṃbhavati ---- viruddhaviṣayadvayāvagāhi jñānadvayaṃ pramāṇam ekatra viṣayībhavati iti , tadayam ānumāniko bādhavyavahāro bhaviṣyati ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1693: na kevalaṃ svasaṃvedanāt na siddhyati bādhā , yāvat anumānato 'pi na siddhyati , dharmiṇo 'siddheḥ , apiśabdāt hetoḥ vyāpteśca , apiḥ ubhayatra neyaḥ , iha dharmiṇi siddhe siddhena hetunā smaryamāṇavyāptikena
GSP30abhiprvu:1694: sādhyadharmāyogavyavacchedo 'numānavyāpāraḥ , iha ca prācye rūpyajñāne dharmiṇi aprāmāṇyaṃ sādhyo dharmaḥ tatra śuktikājñānaṃ vā , na rajatam iti
GSP30abhiprvu:1695: jñānaṃ vā , tajjñānaviṣayīkāryatvaṃ vā viṣayagataṃ hetūkriyeta , na caitat yuktam tatkāle prācyarūpyabodhasya dharmiṇo 'bhāvāt , na cāpi tasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1696: śuktijñānādayo dharmāḥ , na ca apakṣadharmāt sādhyasiddhiḥ , ataḥ smaryamāṇaṃ taddharmi syāt ityapi asat /
GSP30abhiprvu:1697: atha śuktiḥ na rajatajñānasya viṣaya iti sādhyate śuktikājñānaviṣayatvāt iti , tat yadi idānīm tadā siddhasādhanam , atha pūrvam tadā tatpūrvasvasaṃvedanena bādhyaviṣayatā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1698: kena caivaṃ vyāptirgṛhītā ---- yatra idānīm anyat jñānam tatra pūrvam
GSP30abhiprvu:1699: anyat na bhavati iti , anumānantareṇa iti cet , ananvasthā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1700: etena etat pratyuktam ---- ekasmin viṣaye kathaṃ jñānadvayaṃ syāt iti , ko hi ekaviṣayatāṃ tayorjñānayoḥ jānīyāt , te hi tāvat svātmani svaviṣaye ca
GSP30abhiprvu:1701: viśrāmyate iti uktam , iti anumānato 'pi na bādhā , na ca tathābhūtamapi
GSP30abhiprvu:1702: vyavadhānam atra pratītau saṃvedyate , svasaṃvedanasiddhatayā jhaṭiti bhāsanāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1703: ata eva etadapi aśakyaṃ vaktum ---- mā bhūt bādhā nāma iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1704: evaṃ parapakṣe 'nupapattiṃ pradarśya svapakṣe ekapramātṛpariniṣṭhiteḥ udiyāt bādhyabādhakabhāva iti vākyena pratijñātaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1705: nigamayati ---- yuktā sā ekasmāt pramātuḥ yadi jāyeta iti , sa eva hi
GSP30abhiprvu:1706: tathā nirmātā iti vyākhyātameva , sthite caivaṃ yadi vyavahārasiddhaye
GSP30abhiprvu:1707: 'nyathānupapattirapyucyate tat ucyatāṃ kāmam , adhunā sarvaṃ siddhyati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1709: na kevalamete kāryakāraṇabhāvasmaraṇabādhāvyavahārāḥ sakalalokayātrāsāmānyavyavahārabhūtā ekapramātṛpratiṣṭhāḥ , yāvat avāntaravyavahārā api ye krayavikrayādayaḥ samalāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1710: upadeśyopadeśabhāvādayaśca nirmalāḥ , tepi ekapramātṛniṣṭhā eva bhavanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1711: vyavahārā hi sarve samanvayaprāṇāḥ iti upasaṃhārakrameṇa darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:1716: idamapi mantavyam ---- yat vibhau deśakālānavacchinne , ata eva atyarthabhinnaiḥ māyābalāt bhedaikaprāṇitaiḥ nīlasukhādyābhāsaiḥ pratibimbakalpaiḥ anatiriktatayā vartamānaiḥ , khacite svarūpānanyathābhāvena uparakte , viśrāntaḥ sarvo vyavahāro 'nubhūyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1717: anubhava eva atra dṛḍhatamaṃ pramāṇam iti yāvat , anubhūyate ca sopadeśaiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1718: avadhānaparaiḥ yena eṣāṃ yaiva saṃsāradaśāsaṃmatā vyavahāradaśā saiva pramātṛtattvaprakhyātmikā śivabhūmiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1722: apratyabhijñātātmaparamārthānāṃ samalo vyavahāraḥ , anyeṣāṃ sa eva
GSP30abhiprvu:1724: iti śrīmanmāheśvarācāryavaryotpaladevapādaviratitāyāmīśvarapratyabhijñāyāṃ śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptakṛtavimarśinyākhyavyākhyopetāyāṃ prathame jñānādhikāre ekāśrayanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptamamāhnikam // 7 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1727: nityaṃ maheśvaraḥ siddhaḥ siddhānāṃ taṃ stumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:1728: evaṃ jñānasmaraṇāpohanāni vyutpādya eṣāmekamāśrayaṃ vinā vyavahāro na yuktaḥ iti nirūpitam etāvatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1730: ityatra yat uktam ekaḥ iti tat parighaṭitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1732: yadatraiva maheśvaraḥ iti uktam tanmāheśvaryaṃ svātantryarūpamupapādayitavyam , tacca jñānaviṣayaṃ kriyā ---- viṣayaṃ ca ityubhayaprakāram , tatra yato bhagavān jñātā kartā ca , yadyapi ca prakāśavimarśātmakaṃ cidekaghanam ekameva saṃvidrūpam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1733: tathāpi vyutpādanāya tatparighaṭita eva ayaṃ vibhāgaḥ , tena jñānātmakakriyāviṣayaṃ svātantryaṃ yadyapi kriyāśaktirūpaṃ tathāpi tat jñānādhikāra eva nirṇetavyaṃ tadviṣayatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1734: evaṃ ca jñātṛśabdārthaḥ prakṛtitaḥ pratyayataśca saṃpūrṇatayā nirṇīto bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:1736: tatrābhāseṣu yat svātantryaṃ tadeva jñānaśaktiviṣayaṃ svātantryaṃ saṃpadyate iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1741: tatra abhāsāntarāpekṣī ca ābhāso 'nyathā vā iti ślokena uktvā , sa eva ābhāsa eka iti ślokāntareṇa
GSP30abhiprvu:1743: arthakriyābhāso 'pi tathaiva ābhāsaniyata iti ślokadvayena uktvā kasmin ābhāse sā arthakriyā iti punaḥ ślokadvayena /
GSP30abhiprvu:1747: ślokāntareṇa maheśvaratvam upasaṃharatā bhāvinaḥ kriyādhikārasya upakṣepa iti saṅkṣepārtha
GSP30abhiprvu:1749: nanu yadi parameśvaraniṣṭhatayaiva samasto 'yaṃ vyavahāraḥ tat asya sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvaprāyaprasiddhavaicitryānupapattiḥ , yena kila ayam
GSP30abhiprvu:1750: anuprāṇitaḥ sa eka eva bhagavān , na ca tadvyatirekeṇa vyavahārasya nijaṃ kiṃcana tattvam utpaśyāma ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1755: kevalam etāvatā ābhāsānāṃ bhedo na punararthāvabhāsasya svātmagataḥ kvacidapi bheda iti ślokadvayasya saṃmelitasya saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1756: yasminneva kāle sa ābhāsa ābhāti tatkāle eva bhavati , yat akṣasāmakṣyaṃ bāhyendriyapratyakṣatvaṃ nāma ābhāsāntaraṃ paśyāmītyevaṃrūpaṃ tatsāpekṣāḥ tadvyāmiśrāḥ kvacit ābhāsā bhavanti , yatra sphuṭatāvyavahāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1758: vyavahārosphuṭatāmayaḥ tatra te ābhāsā anyathā , tathā hi jātyandhasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1759: bāhyendriyapratyakṣatvalakṣaṇam ābhāsāntaraṃ naivāsti , dṛṣṭavatastu andhībhūtasya saṃtamasashtitasya ca tātkālikaṃ tat nāsti api tu
GSP30abhiprvu:1761: tasmāt arthāvabhāsasya keṣucidapi vikalpeṣu sattāyāṃ svarūpe viśeṣo 'sti iti saṃbhāvanā na kartavyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1762: te hi vikalpā bhāvivastugāmino vā bhaviṣyanniṣṭhā vā bhavantu avrtamānaniṣṭhā vā atītavastuviśrāntā vā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1763: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- nīlamidaṃ paśyāmi , saṅkalpayāmi , utprekṣe ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1764: smarāmi , karomi vacmi ityādau nīlābhāso 'sau svarūpato 'nūnādhikaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1766: te punarābhāsāḥ svātantryeṇa yadā bhagavatā saṃyojyante viyojyante ca tadā ayaṃ sphuṭatvādirvyavahāraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1767: nīlamityābhāsasya utprekṣe ityādyābhāsāntaravyavacchedanena paśyāmīti ābhāsavyāmiśraṇāyāṃ sphuṭatāvyavahāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1769: parameśvarasvarūpāntarbhūtatve punarābhāsānāṃ na kutaścit vyavacchedaḥ na kenacit vyāmiśraṇā iti //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:1776: sukhe srakcandanādike ca tatkāraṇe , duḥkhe ahikaṇṭakādau ca
GSP30abhiprvu:1777: taddhetau atīte 'nāgate vā yadyapi ābhāsaḥ sa eva tathāpi atītamidam anāgatamidam iti ābhāsāntareṇa yato vyāmiśraṇā anubhavāmīti ābhāsācca yato
GSP30abhiprvu:1778: vyavacchedaḥ tena vidyamāneṣvapi teṣu tasya pramātuḥ tena prakāreṇa sthitirna bhavati yathā pūrvan abhūt aham adhunā sukho duḥkhīti samarjitatattannimitasāmagrīko vā iti //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:1779: yadā tu vikalpena tāni vastūni bāḍham ullikhati tadā paunaḥpunyaviśiṣṭasukhataddhetūllekhanābhidhānakāraṇābhāsānupraveśāt ābhāsāntaravyāmiśraṇātmanā tenaiva asmaduktena prakāreṇa na punaranyena ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1780: tathā iti , sukhī ahamityādikena sthitiḥ bhavati iti saṃbhāvyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1781: ucitametat yatastadānīṃ sphuṭatvābhāsamiśraṃ sukhābhāsam upalakṣayati asau
GSP30abhiprvu:1783: nanu iyatā kimuktam bhavati ---- bāhyarūpāḥ sragādayaḥ sukhādihetavo bāhyajanitāśca sukhādayaḥ sukhyahamiti abhimānahetavaḥ iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1784: tataśca bāhyatvābhāve tajjanyatvābhāve ca na tathā uktaṃ syāt , tatra ca ta eva na kecit , tataśca kathamuktam arthāvabhāsasya sattāyāṃ na kvāpi
GSP30abhiprvu:1785: viśeṣa iti sattāyā eva abhāvāt ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1787: nātmā sattā tatasteṣāmāntarāṇāṃ satāṃ sadā // Ipk_1,8.5 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1788: iha sukhamasti mama , duḥkhaṃ nāsti mameti ye bhāvābhāsā abhāvābhāsāśca teṣāṃ bāhyatvaṃ nāma ātmā svarūpaṃ na bhavati , na hi sukhamityasya svarūpaṃ bāhyam iti vapuṣā bhāti , sukhasya hi sukhameva
GSP30abhiprvu:1789: svarūpam kevalaṃ bāhyatvaṃ nāma abhāsāntaram īśvareṇa svātantryabalādeva yadā tatra sukhābhāse miśratayā bhāsyate tadā tat tasya upādhirūpatām uparañcakatāṃ viśeṣaṇatvaṃ gacchati , tataśca yathā nīlābhāsābhāve
GSP30abhiprvu:1790: utpalābhāsasya na kiṃcit vṛttaṃ svarūpato rājābhāsābhāve vā puruṣābhāsasya , tathā bāhyatvābhāsābhāve 'pi sukhābhāsasya duḥkhābhāvābhāsasya kāntābhāsasya ca na svarūpataḥ kācana mlānatā iti āntarāṇāṃ sadaiva
GSP30abhiprvu:1792: iha antaḥkaraṇe buddhidarpaṇātmani nīlādīnāmavabhāsānām āntaratvamapyasti antaḥkaraṇamadhyebhavatvāt , bāhyatvamapi grāhyatārūpaṃ pramātuḥ vicchedenāvabhāsāt , bāhyatvaṃ ca kevalaṃ bāhyapratyakṣatā , atra ca avasthādvaye 'pi arthakriyām amī kurvantyeva antato jñānaṃ svaviṣayam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1793: yat punaḥ pramātṛtādātmyalakṣaṇam āntaratvaṃ tatra amī kathaṃ na kāṃcit arthakriyāṃ vidadhīran
GSP30abhiprvu:1796: pramātraikye iti , tannimittakaṃ yat ānantaratvaṃ tasmāddhetoḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1797: eṣām ābhāsānām arthakriyā na kācit asti , sā hi arthakriyā bhede sati bhavati , sa hi nīlābhāsaḥ pītābhāsāt yato bhidyate yataśca pramāturbhidyate tataḥ svena sādhyāṃ bhinnam arthakriyāṃ tasya pramātuḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1798: kuryāt , na ca eṣa tadā bhede 'sti pramātraikyāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1799: sā hi arthakriyābhāsabhedaniyatā , tathā ca kāntābhāsasya bāhyatve 'pi sati ābhāsāntarasya āliṅganalakṣaṇasya vyapagame dūrībhavati , iyam iti ca
GSP30abhiprvu:1801: ata ābhāsabhedābhāvaḥ yataḥ pramātraikyakṛte āntaratve tasmāt na arthakriyā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1803: arthakriyākāritvamapi na bhāvānāṃ sattvam , yena tadabhāve svarūpato
GSP30abhiprvu:1805: nanu ca bāhyābhāsavyatibhedanakāle āntarābhāso virodhāt vicchinna iti katham idam uktam āntarāṇāṃ ya ābhāsaḥ sa sadā iti ? etat pariharati
GSP30abhiprvu:1808: iha avabhāsānāṃ sadaiva bāhyatābhāsatadabhāvayoḥ api antareva pramātṛprakāśa eva sthitiḥ , yata ete cinmayāḥ , anyathā naiva prakāśeran
GSP30abhiprvu:1810: yadā tu māyāśaktyā vicchedāvabhāsanasvātantryarūpayā bāhyatvam eṣām ābhāsyate tadā tat avalambya avabhāsamānānām asau sthitiḥ bahirapi antarapi /
GSP30abhiprvu:1811: nāyam antarābhāso bāhyatvasya virodho pratyuta sarvābhāsabhittibhūto 'sau , tat kathaṃ virodhaḥ iti yuktamuktam sadaiva
GSP30abhiprvu:1813: nanu bāhyatve sati arthakriyā , tacca bāhyendriyagamyatvam , na ca vikalpollikhitānāṃ tat saṃbhavati , tat katham amīṣām arthakriyā syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1814: dṛśyate ca vikalpollikhitaḥ piśācādiḥ trāsādividhāyī ityāśaṅkyāha
GSP30abhiprvu:1816: pramātraikātmyamāntaryaṃ tato bhedo hi bāhyatā // Ipk_1,8.8 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1817: vimarśaviśeṣarūpe vikalpajñāne ya ullikhyamānaḥ kāntācaurādiḥ arthaḥ sopi bāhyaḥ , na kevalaṃ bahiravalokyamānaḥ , yasmāt so 'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:1818: pramātuḥ sakāśāt pṛthageva prathate ayam iti , yacca pramātari ahamityeva
GSP30abhiprvu:1819: viśrāntatvaṃ tat āntaratvam , antariti nikaṭam , tacca kiṃcit apekṣya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1820: apekṣaṇīyaśca sarvatra pramātaiva apekṣaṇīyāntaraābhāve , tataśca pramātari nikaṭaṃ tādātmya ---- prāptameva iti , tato yat bhinnaṃ tat bāhyameva iti yuktā ullekhasyāpi arthakriyā //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:1822: antaḥkaraṇagocarasya tu kiṃ kṛtaṃ tat ityāśaṅkya āha
GSP30abhiprvu:1825: antarvikalpapratibimbatasya nīlādeḥ yo bahirātmanā pramātṛvicchinnena svabhāvena prakāśaḥ , sa bhartuḥ antarābhāsān bibhrato bahiḥ sṛṣṭiṃ ca puṣṇataḥ īśvarasyaiva icchayā , yathaiva cakṣurādiviṣayabhūtānāṃ pratyakṣajñānaśabdavācyo bāhyātmanā prakāśo nīlādīnām /
GSP30abhiprvu:1828: tataśca tathā īśvarecchayā prakāśāt avahirbhūtā api nīlādyā bāhyakaraṇagocarībhūtāḥ kalpitāt pramātuḥ vicchinnarūpatvena bāhyatvena bhāsante , tathā antaḥkaraṇagocarībhūtā api iti ko viśeṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1829: sukhaduḥkhaprāyāstu bharatādyuktarūpāḥ sthāyivyabhicārirūpā ritinirvedādayo 'ntaḥkaraṇaikagocarībhūtā bahirātmanā bhānti , saṅkalpeṣu yadyapi kṣetraJñasyaiva svātantryam tathāpi citparamārthatāyā
GSP30abhiprvu:1830: nyagbhāvayitum aśakyatvāt īśvarasyaiva tat vastutaḥ , yathoktaṃ granthakṛtaiva
GSP30abhiprvu:1832: jīve niruddhā tatrāpi paramātmani sā sthitā //
GSP30abhiprvu:1835: yatra tu anicchoreva kṣetrajñasya svarasavāhivyākṣepasārā sāṅkalpikī sṛṣṭiḥ tatra sphuṭaḥ īśvarasyaiva vyāpāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1836: tasmāt sāṅkalpikānāmapi bahirbhāve parameśvarecchiava heturiti siddhāntaḥ //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:1837: adhunā pūrvoktam aikyaṃ māheśvaryaṃ ca nigamayati
GSP30abhiprvu:1839: prakāśaikyāttadekatvaṃ mātaikaḥ sa iti sthitam // Ipk_1,8.10 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1841: vimarśa eva devasya śuddhe jñānakriye yataḥ // Ipk_1,8.11 //
GSP30abhiprvu:1842: yat etat pūrvoktena granthena upapāditam , tat iti , tasmāt hetoḥ , saṃvidāṃ jñānām aikyena vinā , lokapaddhatiḥ lokamārgaḥ sarvo
GSP30abhiprvu:1843: vyavahāro na saṃbhavet , saṃbhavati ca ayam , tasmāt aikyam āsām /
GSP30abhiprvu:1844: na caitat durghaṭam yato viṣayaprakāśa eva saṃvit ucyate , kevalaṃ viṣayoparāgamahmnā bahirmukhatayā nīlaprakāśo 'nyaḥ , pītaprakāśaścānyaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1845: pramārthatastu prakāśasya deśakālākārasaṅkocavaikalyāt ekatvameva , ityeka eva prakāśo'ntarviśrāntaḥ , sa eva ca pramātā ucyate iti sthitam idānīmupapattitaḥ //10//
GSP30abhiprvu:1846: na ca asya asau prakāśalakṣaṇaḥ svātmā nīlādyuparāgaśca parāmarśan śūnya eva āste sphaṭikrama.eriva , api tu sadaiva
GSP30abhiprvu:1849: sa eva hi ahaṃbhāvātmā vimarśo devasya krīḍādimayasya śuddhe pāramārthikyau jñānakriye , prakāśarūpatā jñānaṃ tatraiva svātantryātmā vimarśaḥ kriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1850: vimarśaśca antaḥkṛtaprakāśaḥ , iti vimarśa eva parāvasthāyāṃ jñānakriye ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1851: parāparāvasthāyāṃ tu bhagavatsadāśivabhuvi idantāsāmānādhikaraṇyāpannāhatāvimarśasvabhāve , aparāvasthāyāṃ ca māyāpade idaṃbhāvaprādhānyena vartamāne iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1852: sarvathā tu vimarśa eva jñānaṃ tena vinā hi jaḍabhāvo 'sya syāt iti uktam , sa eva ca kriyā iti bhāvinaḥ kriyādhikārasya upakṣepaṃ karoti iti śivam //11// āditaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:1859: bahutarabhavadbhaṅgībhūmiṃ kriyāsaritaṃ parāṃ prakaṭayatu naḥ śrīmāngaurīpatiḥ sa ṛtaṃ param
GSP30abhiprvu:1862: atha kriyāśaktisvarūpaṃ vitasya nirṇetum adhikārāntaram ārabhyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:1872: tataḥ ślokadvayena sakramatvākramatvayorviṣayavibhāgaḥ , viṣayavibhāge ca sati vastutaḥ ekatraiva tayoḥ viśrāntiḥ , iti ślokena nirūpyate , iti tātparyaṃ āhnikasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:1874: tatra pūrvokte jñānaśaktisamarthanopayoganimeye siddhe prameyāntaramapi ayatnataḥ siddham , iti adhikaraṇasiddhāntadiśā darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:1875: ata eva yadapyuktaṃ kriyā naikasya sakramā /
GSP30abhiprvu:1877: yat tāvat uktam jñānānyeva anubhavavikalparūpādibhinnāni na teṣām āśrayo 'sti kaścit , saṃskārācca smṛtiḥ siddhā jñānaṃ ca jaḍaṃ cet na arthasya prakāśaḥ , ajaḍaṃ cet deśakālasaṃkocavaikalyāt ātmatattvāt abhinnam iti , tat tāvat pratikṣiptaṃ bhinnānāmanubhavādīnāmanupapatteḥ vitatya darśitatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:1880: tatsvātantryāvabhāsitajñeyoparāgavaśāt tu tasya saṃkocāvabhāsa ityapi darśitaṃ yataḥ , na kevalam ato hetukalāpāt jñānaśakticodyāni nidāritāni ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1881: yāvat kriyāśaktiviṣayāṇyapi dūṣaṇāni ata eva hetukalāpāt apasāritāni iti apiśabdaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1882: ekā kriyā kramikā katham āśrayasya ekasvabhāvatve sati ghaṭate ? iti yuktam , tathā
GSP30abhiprvu:1886: iti ca yaduktaṃ tadapi pratikṣiptameva , yataḥ iyati pūrvapakṣe iyadeva jīvitamekamanekasvabhāvaṃ kathaṃ syāt iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1887: atra ca uktaṃ citsvabhāvasya darpaṇasyeva ekatānapabādhanena ābhāsabhedasaṃbhave ka iva dhirodha iti , tasmāt pratyabhijñānabalāt eko

GSP30abhiprvu:1915: svātmani tu ekarasenābhāsena , iyati ca na kramasya udayaḥ , yadā tu śaradābhāsaṃ hemantābhāsena ca sarvathaiva śūnyamābhāsayati hemantābhāsaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1916: ca śāradābhāsena tadā kālātmā krama uttiṣṭhati , iti seyam itthaṃbhūtā

GSP30abhiprvu:1925: yadā tu gāḍhapratyabhijñāprakāśabalāt tadeva idaṃ hastasvarūpam iti pratipattau mūrterna bhedaḥ , atha ca anyānyarūpatvaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1926: bhāti tadaikasmin svarūpe yadanyat anyat rūpaṃ tadvirodhavaśāt asahabhavatkriyā ucyate , tasyā yat vaicitryaṃ parimitāparimitātmakaṃ tadekānusandhānena phalasiddhyādinibandhanavaśāt yathāruci carcitena nirbhāsayan kālarūpaṃ kramamevāvabhāsayati /

GSP30abhiprvu:1932: anābhāsaśca pramātā , sa hi na kasyacit ābhāsate , tasya sarvam ābhāti
GSP30abhiprvu:1933: yataḥ , tataśca tau pramātari katham , dṛśyete ca abhavam ahaṃ bhavāmi bhavitāsmi iti , gṛhe tiṣṭhāmi araṇye devagṛhe iti ca , kiṃ ca svayaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:1934: deśakālakramaśūnyasya kiṃ dūraṃ kim antikaṃ kiṃ vartamānaṃ kim atītaṃ kiṃ bhāvi , iti pramātrāśrayo bhāveṣvapi kramo na yuktaḥ , na ca pramātṛnirapekṣeṣvapi teṣu svātmani dūratvādi bhūtatvādi vā , tadetat samarthayitum āha
GSP30abhiprvu:1938: svātmeva svātmanā pūrṇā bhāvā bhāntyamitasya tu // Ipk_2,1.7 //

GSP30abhiprvu:1943: saṃsārayātrāpatitatve śūnyasya prāṇādeḥ , tadā asya bhāsanaṃ vicchidyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1946: sa ca yataḥ pramātā ahaṃbhāvasamāveśanāt aparipūrṇāt ata eva udriktakālakramavattvāt bhāveṣvapi kālakramam ābhāsayati , yo 'haṃ bālo 'bhavaṃ tatsahabhāvī vaṭābhāso 'pi abhavat iti , na tu yaḥ sakṛd vibhātaḥ iti anayā vācoyuktyā avicchinnabhāsanaḥ pramātā saṃvidrūpaḥ , tasya svātmani kālakramaḥ , nāpi tadapekṣayā vedye bhāvajāte , taddhi tatra abhedena bhāti iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1948: dehāntasya svātmani bhāti iha tiṣṭhāmi iti , svāpekṣayā ca bhāveṣvapi yat mama saṃyogapārimityena vartate tadantikam itarat dūram iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:1949: amitasya svarūpeyattāśūnyasya tu saṃvittattvasya bhāvāḥ svātmanā ahaṃbhāvena yato bhānti tataḥ pūrṇāḥ ---- aparicchinnasvarūpeyattākāḥ , yataḥ svātmā tasya
GSP30abhiprvu:1951: {apūrvāparaṃ hi idaṃ mūrtitaḥ kriyātaśca sarvaṃ sarvataḥ pūrṇam}
GSP30abhiprvu:1953: kriyāprasaṅgāt iha kālakramaḥ prākarṇiko dṛṣṭāntatvena tatprasaṅgāt deśakramo nirūpitaḥ , dṛṣṭāntaśca pūrvaṃ vācya iti vaicitryanirūpaṇāvasare deśakramasya ādau abhidhānaṃ nyāyyam , upasaṃhāre tu prākaraṇikasya

GSP30abhiprvu:1956: kintu nirmāṇaśaktiḥ sāpy evaṃ viduṣa īśituḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1958: iha tattvataḥ parameśvarasya apratihatasvātantryarūpāvicchinnasvātmaparāmarśamayī ananyonmukhatārūpā icchaiva kriyā iti upasaṃhariṣyate adhikārāntare evam icchaiva hetutā kartṛtā kriyā iti caitramaitrāderapi pacāmi iti yaiva antaricchā saiva kriyā , tathā ca adhiśrayaṇādibahutaraspandanasaṃbandhe 'pi pacāmi iti nāsya vicchidyate , yattu pacāmi iti icchārūpaṃ tadeva tathāspandanātmatayā bhāti , tatra tu na ko'pi kramaḥ tattvataḥ /

GSP30abhiprvu:1960: vākyena , tadatrāpi na kaścit kramaḥ , yathā tu icchārūpaṃ pacāmi iti spandanātmatāṃ kāyāparyantāṃ gataṃ kramārūpitam ābhāti tadā bhagavadicchā pramātṛprameyabhedaparyavasitā tatkramopaśliṣṭā bhāti darpaṇatalamiva vitataprabahannadīprabāhakramasamāśliṣṭam , atra ca kevalaṃ darpaṇasya tathā icchā nāsti , parameśvarasya tu sā asti ---- iti ubhayathā asya
GSP30abhiprvu:1962: / evaṃ deśakrame'pi vācyam , tatra tu asya cicchaktiḥ ucyate anyaiḥ , iha tu kriyāśaktireva sā svīkṛtā iti piṇḍārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1963: akṣarārthastu ---- tathā iti svarūpabhedena deśakramakāriṇā kriyābhedena ca kālakramasaṃpādakena upalakṣito yo vijñātuḥ śūnyādeḥ pramātuḥ bhedo'nyonyaṃ jñeyācca , evaṃ ghaṭādeḥ parasparaṃ jñātuśca sa bhagavatā avabhāsyate , yat tadavabhāsanaṃ sā īśiturapi nirmāṇaśaktiḥ kriyāśaktiḥ na tu kevalaṃ śūnyādereva kriyā , yataśca tannirmitaṃ jñātṛjñeyakriyāvaicitryabhedam asau vidvān vetti aviratam tatraiva hi tat sphurati tato'pi tasya sā kriyāśaktiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:1964: ato bhāsanavicchedanābhāvāt kramābhāve sthūladṛṣṭyā yadyapi asya bhavet kriyānupapattiśaṅkā , kiṃ tu evamasya kriyāśaktirūpapannā ---- iti saṃgatiḥ /

GSP30abhiprvu:1983: nanvevaṃ tathā nirmāṇaśaktyā avabhāsanārūpayā yat nirmīyate tasyāvabhāsanaiva nirmāṇam , nānyat , sā ca dvicandrāderapi asti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:1984: nīlāderapi , nīlādiniṣṭhasya karmasāmānyasaṃbandhāderapi , tataśca asatyaṃ satyaṃ saṃvṛtisatyamiti ya evaṃprāyeṣu vyavahāraḥ sa kathaṃ saṃgaccheta nirmeyatvāviśeṣāt ityāśaṃkya kriyādīnāmasatvatvaṃ tāvat nipapannam iti
GSP30abhiprvu:1985: vadan dvicandrādīnāṃ tu itthamapi asatyatvam iti sūcayan āha ----
GSP30abhiprvu:1988: cittattvāt anyatra yā kriyābuddhiḥ kartṛkarmakaraṇādiṣu caitro bhrajati taṇḍulā viklidyante edhā jvalanti iti , tasyā ekānekarūpaścaitrādyartha āśrayaḥ ālambanam /
GSP30abhiprvu:1990: tattaddeśakālākārabhinnaḥ tatra caitradeho'nekasvabhāvo'pi sa evāyam iti
GSP30abhiprvu:1991: ekarūpatām aparityajanneva nirbhāsate , sa eva ca ekānekarūpā kriyā tathaiva pratibhāsanācca pāramārthikī , dvicandrādi tu tathābhāsamānamapi
GSP30abhiprvu:1992: uttarakālaṃ pramāvyāpārānuvṛttirūpasya sthairyasya unmūlanena dvicandro nāsti ityevaṃ rūpeṇa asatyam , iha punaḥ calati caitraḥ ityevaṃbhūto vimarśaḥ anuvartamāno na kenacit unmūlyamānaḥ saṃvedyate , dvicandrādi ca yadyapi hlādodvegayoḥ upayujyate , tathāpi dvicandrābhimānī na tāvatīṃ tatra arthakriyām abhimanyate , api tu yādṛśī ekena śaśinā kartavyā
GSP30abhiprvu:1993: timirāpasāraṇādirūpā , tādṛśyeva apareṇa , iti na taddviguṇām arthakriyāṃ tatra adhyavasyati , tasyāṃ ca asau na upayujyate , brajyāyāṃ tu yāmeva
GSP30abhiprvu:1994: grāmaprāptim adhyavasyati tasyām avikalāyām upayogo 'syā iti sthairyāt upayogācca ekānekarūpakriyātattvālambanabuddhiḥ satyaiva , evaṃ saṃbandhādiṣu kālaparyanteṣu vācyam uttarakārikāsu sphuṭīkariṣyati //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:1995: nanvekatvam anekatvaṃ ca parasparaṃ viruddhe , katham ekatra vastuni syātām , tataścāyaṃ bādhakapramāṇakṛtaḥ sthairyonmūlanaprakāra
GSP30abhiprvu:1999: iha tāvat caitre calati dṛṣṭe na jātucit na calati ayam iti buddhiḥ jāyate ---- na rajatam itivat , dvicandro 'pi nāyaṃ dvicandraḥ timiravaśāt aham upaplutanayanaḥ param evaṃ vedmi iti bhavati unmūlanābuddhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2000: yattu uktam ---- ekameva katham anekaṃ bhavati iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2001: tatra ucyate ---- iha kāraṇameva katham akāraṇaṃ bhavati atha ucyate ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2002: viṣayabhedāt tathā iti , tadviṣayabhede etat na virudhyate iti kena ayaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2003: vitīrṇo'vasaraḥ ? saṃvedanena iti cet calati ityādau saṃvedanameva asmāmiḥ pramāṇīkṛtaṃ kimiti na sahyate , viṣayabhedo 'pi ca atra vaktuṃ na na śakyate ; tathāhi ---- ābhāsāntareṇa asaṃbhedane tadekābhāsamātram , ata eva anyāpekṣāviyogāt antaraṅgatvāt āntaram anuvartamānaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2004: tathābhūtābhāsamātragrahaṇocitāntaḥkaraṇavedyatayā ca āntaraṃ tathāsvarūpāparicyuteḥ tattvam ābhāsāntarayogena tananasahiṣṇutvācca tattvam ekam iti pratīyate , tadeva deśābhāsena iha amutra iti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2005: kālābhāsena adhunā tadānīmiti , svabhāvābhāsena kṛśaḥ sthūla ityādinā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2009: iti uktanītyā viśvameva ānantaraṃ sat ekam , tadeva
GSP30abhiprvu:2014: ābhāsāntarāmiśratāyāmantaḥkaraṇaikavedyatve cinmātratāyām , anekatvaṃ punar ---- ābhāsāntaramiśratāyām uvhayakaraṇavedyatve cidatiriktatābhāsane
GSP30abhiprvu:2015: ca , iti sphuṭo viṣayabhedaḥ , tasyaiva ca tathātvam iti parāmarśabalādeva kāraṇākāraṇavat upādānasahakārivat /
GSP30abhiprvu:2016: atha vyapadeśamātram etat kāraṇam akāraṇaṃ ca ityādi , tadihāpi ekamanekamiti vyavahāramātram , nīlaṃ pītam avikalpakaṃ savikalpakam ityapi sarvaṃ māyāpade vyavahāramātram iti sarvaṃ samānam , tasmāt ekatvānekatvavirodho na bādhakaḥ , tadetat evakāreṇa uktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2017: tatra iti , teṣu kriyādiṣu yat āntaraṃ tattvaṃ tadekam , tadeva indriyavedyatāṃ prāpya deśādibhedāt anekatāṃ yāti iti saṃbandhaḥ , tatra iti satyatve sthite , tayorvā ekatvānekatvayoḥ madhye ekatvamevam anekatvamevam iti vā yojanā //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:2018: nanu evaṃ viṣayabhede abhyupagamyamāne yadā ekaṃ pratibhātaṃ bhavati tadā na anekam , anekapratibhāse ca na ekaṃ pratibhātam , iti katham ekānekarūpaṃ vastu syāt , tathāhi bāhyena indriyeṇa caitro vicitradeśakaḥ param anubhūyate , na tu anekābhāsasaṃmiśrīkāre
GSP30abhiprvu:2019: bāhyendriyajasya avikalpakasya vyāpāraḥ ---- saṃnihitaviṣayabalotpatteḥ avicārakatvāt ityāhuḥ , vikalpenāpi mānasena tathābhūtaṃ vastu naiva spṛśyate iti kayā dhiyā vastu ekānekarūpaṃ gṛhyeta ? iti paravyāmohanibarhaṇāya āha ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2022: iha jñānamālāyā antaḥsūtrakalpaḥ svasaṃvedanātmā pramātā jīvitabhūtaḥ iti upapāditaṃ prāk , sa ca svatantra ityapi nirṇītam , sa tu viśuddhasvabhāvaḥ śivātmā , māyāpade tu saṃkucitasvabhāvaḥ paśuḥ , tadasya manaḥsamullāsāvasare vikalpabhūmikāyāṃ sphuṭa ullāsaḥ , aindriyake nirvikalpake sadāśiveśvaradaśābhyudayāt , avikalpabodhābahirbhūtasya vimarśavyāpāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2023: paścādbhāvinaṃ vyavasāyaṃ niścayātmakaṃ vikalpakam anuvyavasāyaśabdavācyaṃ vidadhadantaḥkaraṇam etān kriyāsaṃbandhādivikalpān saṃpādayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2024: te ca vikalpāḥ taddvayam ekatvānekatvarūpam avalambante ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2025: nahi vikalpeṣu pratibhāsamānam avastusat iti hi uktam prakāśataiva vastutvam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2026: na ca vikalpasya prakāśarūpatāṃ muktvā āropaṇādhyavasāyābhimānādināmadheyaṃ vyāpārāntaraṃ yuktam , tato 'bāhye

GSP30abhiprvu:2302: naikaikataḥ pramāṇāt sā pravṛttiḥ api tu pramāṇasamūhādeva
GSP30abhiprvu:2303: / samūhatā ca parasya na upapannā , asmākaṃ tu ekasvasaṃvedanaviśrāntimayī
GSP30abhiprvu:2308: iyameva ca sā pramāṇānāṃ yojanā , yojikā ca yuktirityucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2311: deśādikeṣvadhyakṣeṣvapi deśābhāsādiyojanāyāmapi , antaḥ ---- pramātari abhinnaṃ yat svalakṣaṇaṃ tatra iti vā saṃgatiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2312: deśādikairadhyakṣāntaraiḥ pratyakṣībhūtairābhāsāntarairbhinne svalakṣaṇe nimitte sati pravṛttiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2314: atrāpi prameyavahutvanirūpaṇadiśā tadanuyāyitvena abhidhīyamānaḥ pramāṇasamūho nimittatvena ukto bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2315: nanu kiṃ prāttyakṣyāmeva pravṛttau pramāṇasamūha upayogī ?
GSP30abhiprvu:2318: na kevala pratyakṣataḥ pravṛttiḥ deśādikādhyakṣāntarabhedarūpapramāṇasamūhanimittā yāvat anumānato
GSP30abhiprvu:2320: dhūmābhāsamātre agnyābhāsamātre dhūmasyāgnyābhāsāvyabhicāritve parvatābhāse ca yāni pratyakṣāntarāṇi yacca tadgṛhītātirikte ayogavyavacchede agniratra ityevaṃbhūte pṛthak anumānaṃ pramāṇam tatsamūhādeva arthinaḥ tātkālikī pravṛttiḥ iti saṃbandhaḥ //9//
GSP30abhiprvu:2321: evaṃ vimarśabalādeva bhedābhedavyavasthā , tadeva hi parameśvarasya saṃvedanātmanaḥ śivanāthasya svātantryaśaktivijṛmbhitam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:2322: tataśca paraiḥ yat ucyate dūrāntikādau arthasya abhedaḥ iti tadapi uappadyate , na tu anyathā kathaṃcit , ---- iti nirūpyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2327: pratibhāsamātreṇa vyavasthāṃ kurvataḥ kathaṃ dūrādūrayorvastunorabhedaḥ , pratibhāsasya sakalāsakalāvṛtānāvṛtāditayā yathākathaṃcidapi bhedāt ? nanuvimarśe'pi pratyābhāsaṃ tathaiva bhinnatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2328: ? satyam , tathāpi tu paro yo vimarśaḥ sa evāyaṃ padārthaḥ iti
GSP30abhiprvu:2329: ekapratyavamarśarūpaḥ , tena prāṇitakalpena ā samantāt khyānaṃ prathanaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2330: yasya mukhyāvabhāsasya ekarūpabhāvābhāsasya , ekapratyavamarśe taducito 'pi hi astyekāvabhāsaḥ , ābhāsavimarśayoranyonyabhaviyogāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2333: ityatra pratyakṣaparokṣatārūpeṇātmanā svabhāvena bhinnā avabhāvacchāyā amukhyo'vabhāso yeṣāṃ teṣām ekatvaṃ mukhyāvabhāsata ekapratyavamarśānuprāṇitāt , ---- iti saṃgatiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2334: bāhyāntaratayā bhināvabhāsānāmaikyaṃ yathā yadeva dṛṣṭaṃ tadevāntarahamullikhāmi , ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2336: vyañjakānāṃ dīpālokādīnāṃ doṣairbhonnāvabhāsānām aikyam , yadeva raktotpalaṃ dīpena nīlaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadeva sūryāṃśubhirlohitaṃ paśyāmi , iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2337: anyenāpi prakāreṇa indriyāpāṭavādinā ekapārśvasaṃmukhatvādinā vā yeṣāmavabhāsacchāyā bhinnā , teṣāmapi mukhyapratyavamarśānuvartyavabhāsasvarūpabalāt aikyameva , ---- iti sthitam //10////11//
GSP30abhiprvu:2338: nanu dūrādūrādāvastu sa evārthaḥ pramātradhyavasitārthakriyāṃśe tathaivopayogāt , vāhyāntaratvādau katham , āntarasyārthakriyāyāṃ pramātradhyavasitāyāmanuyogāt ---- iti bhrāntiṃ bhaṅktumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:2340: niyatā sā hi tenāsyā nākriyāto'nyatā bhavet // Ipk_2,3.12 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2342: madhye gaṇitā , sā sahajārthasvarūpabhūtā na bhavati , tatkāritvaṃ hi yasmāt īśvarecchayā niyataṃ bhavane cābhavane ca /
GSP30abhiprvu:2343: yato naiṣā svarūpaṃ tena tasyā akaraṇāt hetorbhāvasyānyatvaṃ nāśaṅkanīyaṃ svarūpabhedāt hi saṃbhāvyetānyatvaṃ , na ca svarūpam arthakriyākāritvam , ---- ityuktaṃ vakṣyate ca bahuśaḥ svarūpaṃ ca pratyavamarśavalādekameva bāhyāntarādāvapi , iti //12//
GSP30abhiprvu:2344: nanu vimarśabalādeva yadi vastūnāṃ bhedābhedavyavasthā tarhi idānīṃ trijagati nivṛttā bhrāntisaṃkathāḥ , śuktikāyāmapi satyarajatataiva āpatati idaṃ rajatam iti vimṛśyamānatvāt , tataśca bhrāntyabhāve bādhānupapatteḥ kimarthamuktaṃ {mitirvastunyavādhitā}(Ipk 2,3.2) iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2345: vyabhicārābhāve hi avādhitā ityasya viśeṣaṇasya vyavacchedyaṃ na labhyate , ityāśaṅkāṃ nirasyati
GSP30abhiprvu:2348: idaṃ rajataṃ sthiraṃ sarvapramātṛsādhāraṇam arthakriyāyogyam iti idamaṃśe rajatādyaṃśeṣu tatsaṃmelanāṃśe ca ābhāsavimarśanabalāt na tāvat kiṃcit mithyātvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2349: kiṃtu uttarakālaṃ yo bhaviṣyati vimarśo nedaṃ rajataṃ vastu sthiraṃ pramātrantaragamyamabhimatakāryakāri iti tadvimarśavimarśanīyam yat tatpūrvavimarśakālasamucitameva rūpaṃ tat tasmin pūrvavimarśakāle naivāmṛśyate , bhāvyaṃ ca tenāmarśanīyena /
GSP30abhiprvu:2350: tatraiva kāle nedaṃ rajataṃ abhūt iti hi uttaraḥ parāmarśo na tu uditapratyastamitāyāṃ śatahradāyāmiva idānīmeva idaṃ na iti vimarśaḥ ;
GSP30abhiprvu:2351: tato yāvatā pūrṇena rūpeṇa prakhyātavyaṃ vimarśaparyantaṃ tāvat na prakhyāti , ityapūrṇakhyātirūpā akhyātireva bhrāntitattvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2358: diṣṭyā dṛṣṭirunmīliṣyati āyuṣmataḥ , māyāpadaṃ hi sarvaṃ bhrāntiḥ , tatrāpi tu svapne svapna iva gaṇḍe sphoṭa iva apareyaṃ bhrāntirucyate , anuvṛttyucitasyāpi vimarśasyāshtairyāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2359: ataśca pṛthak idantādyābhāseṣu na kācana bhrāntiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2360: mekanāṃśe tu vimarśānuvṛttinirmūlanaṃ vimarśodayakālādeva ārabhya bādhakena kriyate , iti tatraiva bhrāntibhāvaḥ , ---- iti siddham /
GSP30abhiprvu:2361: rajatasya śuktikayā saha yadyapi eko vimarśaḥ tathāpi śuktau rajatasya jñānena yā dattā sthitiḥ idaṃ rajatam iti , sā na , yata upādhirūpo yo
GSP30abhiprvu:2362: deśaḥ atra rajatam iti rajatacchāyām ātmanoparañjayan śuktideśaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2363: tasyāsaṃvādāt , samyagvimarśānuvṛttyābhāsanaṃ saṃvādanam vadiḥ atra bhāsanaviṣayaḥ , tasyābhāvāt kāraṇāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2364: nanvevaṃ bhavatu śuktikārajate , dvicandrajñāne tu dvau candrau ityābhāse śuktikayeva melanaṃ na kenacitsākamābhāsate yatra bādhaḥ syāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2365: ekābhāsāṃśe ca na bādhaḥ , ---- ityuktaṃ bhavataiva /
GSP30abhiprvu:2368: evaṃ hi sati svālakṣaṇyena niyatadeśakālatayā kathamābhāsaḥ , ? taddeśakālābhyāṃ saha tatrāpi asti melanābhāso yadvimarśo'nuvivṛtsurnirudhyate , dvitvābhāsacandrābhāsayorapi melanābhāse vimarśānuvṛttivyāvartanaṃ vācyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2369: tadetadāha --- dvirūpe candre'pi , na kevalaṃ rajata eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:2371: anyathā iti dvicandrāvaruddho yovimṛṣṭaḥ sa na tathā , ---- iti bādhakena unmūlitaprācyavimarśānuvṛttikaḥ kriyate , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2375: tathā ca kāṭhinyābhāsa iti pṛthivī , lohitābhāsa iti rūpaṃ tejaśca , melanābhāso rajaḥ , saṃniveśastu niyatirūpaḥ , niyatirhi niyamaḥ , sa ca abhāvaprāṇaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2376: , abhāvasphuraṇameva ca pṛthivyābhāsasya vicitratayā cakāsat pṛthubudhnodarākāratā , bhedābhāsaśca māyā , tatpṛṣṭhe satyaprakāśābhāsaśca śivatattvam, ---- ityāstāṃ tāvat /
GSP30abhiprvu:2378: sarvathā tāvadatra prameye bhagavata eva bhedane ca abhedane ca svātantryaṃ ghaṭagatābhāsabhedābhedadṛṣṭireva ca paramārthādvayadṛṣṭipraveśe upāyaḥ samavalamvanīyaḥ , na tu vyavahāro'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:2380: etadeva sphuṭayan sakalaprameyasiddhiḥ parameśvara eva āyattā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2384: iha anuvṛttaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ ca cakāsadvastu katareṇa vapuṣā na satyamucyatām ubhayatrāpi bādhakābhāvāt , satyato hi yadi bādhaka eva ekatarasya syāt tattadudaye sa eva bhāgaḥ punarunmajjanasahiṣṇutārahito vidyudvilāyaṃ vilīyeta ; na caivam , ata eva bhedābhedayorvirodhaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2385: duḥsamarthamabhimanyamānairekairavidyātvena anirvācyatvam , aparaiśca ābhāsalagnatayā sāṃvṛtatvam abhidadhadbhiḥ ātmā paraśca vañcitaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2386: saṃvedanaviśrāntaṃ tu dvayamapi bhāti saṃvedanasya svātantryaāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2387: sarvasya hi tiraśco'pi etat svasaṃvedanasiddhaṃ ---- yat saṃvidantarviśrāntamekatāmāpādyamānaṃ jalajvalanamapi aviruddham , tata eva uktam
GSP30abhiprvu:2390: ataśca guṇairupādhirūpairupādhitayā vivakṣitaiḥ śabdādibhirvā daṇḍādibhirapi vā yo bhedaḥ , jātivaśāt sādṛśyāt bhedāgrahaṇādvā , yaśca abhedo bhāvānām itthamityuktanītyā {kriyāsaṃbandha}(2,2.1) ityataḥ prabhṛti nirūpitaḥ , sa ekatrapramātari sakalapramāpramāṇasaṃyojanaviyojanādivicitrāsaṃkhyakṛtyaprapañcocitasvātantrye bhagavatyasmadīyahṛdayaikāntaśāyini śivaśabdavyapadeśye sati upapadyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2392: viśeṣaṇānyeva ca bhedakāni ---- iti kimantyairanyairviśeṣaiḥ ayaṃ sa paramāṇurya
GSP30abhiprvu:2394: ayaṃ sa ātmā , yaḥ purā svargasadane
GSP30abhiprvu:2397: siddhaṃ tāvat bhedābhedarūpaṃ prameyatattvam ekapramātṛviśrāntyā niḥśaṅkatāṃ śrayati , iti
GSP30abhiprvu:2398: nanvevaṃbhūto yadyayaṃ pramātā tatrava tarhi pramāṇopanyāse prayatanīyaṃ na prameye , yadāha pradhāne hi yatnaḥ phalavān iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2401: {ajaḍātmā miṣedhaṃ vā siddhiṃ vā vidadhīta kaḥ /}(Ipk 1,1.2)
GSP30abhiprvu:2403: yadvastu tadevedānīṃ jñāte pramāṇasvarūpe parameśvarasvarūpe ca nirvāhaṇārham , evaṃ bhūtaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ tadevaṃbhūte hi bhagavati kathaṃ kramatām , iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2410: tatra prakāśavauṣi prakāśamātrasvabhāve pūrvasiddhe kaḥ pramāṇasyopayogaḥ saṃbhāvanā vā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2411: tathā ca pūrvasiddhe pramātari sati tallagnaprakāśāntarbhūtavimarśamayīm abhūtapūrvāṃ prameyasya siddhiṃ vitarati pramāṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2413: viśvavaicitryaṃ hi tarta parameśvare prakāśaikātmani sati bhāti yathā citraṃ bhittau /
GSP30abhiprvu:2414: yadi hi nīlapītādikaṃ pṛthageva parāmṛśyate tadā svātmaviśrānteṣu teṣu tataiva anyonyaviṣaye jaḍāndhabadhirakalpāni jñānāni svaviṣayamātraniṣṭhitāni , vikalpāśca tadanusāreṇa bhavantaḥ tathaiva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2415: iti citram idam iti kathaṃkāraṃ pratipattiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2416: ekatra tu nimnonnatādirahite bhittitale rekhāvibhaktanimnonnatā divibhāgajuṣi gambhīranābhirunnatastanīyam iti citrāvabhāso yuktaḥ , tadvat ekaprakāśabhittilagnatvena vaicitryātmakabhedopapattiḥ , iti bhāvabhedagrahaṇaprakāśabhitteranapāyinīṃ svaprakāśatāmāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:2419: tarhi sa eva nāsti iti syāt prakāśamātrarūpatvāt tasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:2421: , ityabhāvena sparśa upapannaḥ , yato hi asāveva paramārthataḥ san ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2423: athocyate ---- īśvaratā tasyāpramitā pramāsyate tadapi na , yato hi asau pramātṛtvena cet
GSP30abhiprvu:2424: cakāsyāt kasyāyamucyamaḥ , cakāsti cet tarhi pramātṛtaiva īśvaratā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2425: tadāha īśvare pramātari sarvadā bhātavigrahe iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2431: kastatra pramāṇasyopayogaḥ , ---- iti , tatra ca kiṃ pramāṇam na kiñcit
GSP30abhiprvu:2433: yataḥ pramāṇaṃ nāma navābhāsarūpaṃ pramātari pramitilakṣaṇāṃ viśrāntiṃ vidadhat pramāṇaṃ bhavati , pramātā cāvicchinnābhāsaḥ sarvāśca pramitīḥ svātmani antarmukharūpe bhajate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2434: tat tasmin kathamabhinavābhāsastatpramitiśca kutra viśrāmyatu tasmāt dehaprāṇapuryaṣṭakaśūnyaprāya eva pramātari pramāṇamucyatām /
GSP30abhiprvu:2435: tatrāpi ca vedyāṃśe yadi nāma , na tu kathaṃcit saṃvidaṃśe , tatrāpi viṣayonmukhe tata eva saṃkucitatvāt abhinavābhāse saṃkocavihīnasatyapramātṛlagnatāpekṣayā kathyatāṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2436: saugatenāpi mamedaṃ jñānam iti kalpitapramātṛlagnameva tadupetyam na tu paramārthapramātari pramāṇena kiṃcit /
GSP30abhiprvu:2441: nanvevaṃ yadi bhagavati pramāṇamanupayogyanupapatti ca kimarthaṃ tadviṣayaṃ śāstram , taddhi pramāṇameva , parārthānumānātmakaṃ hi śāstram
