GSP30abhiprvu:2443: yattu saugataiḥ pañcāvayavatvādi dūṣyate tadāgrahamātraṃ , ṣoḍaśasu hi padārtheṣu nirūpyamāṇeṣu samyak pratipādyaṃ paraḥ pratipādyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2446: taddhi parasya pratipattyai , sā ca parārthānumānāt , tatra ca pratijñāderupayogaḥ iti
GSP30abhiprvu:2447: tat paripūrṇaparapratipattikāri paramārthataḥ sakalameva śāstraṃ parārthānumānam āgamavyatiriktaṃ nyāyanirmāṇavedhasākṣapādena nirūpitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2452: iha parameśvarasyedameva paraṃ svātantryaṃ ---- yat asmādṛkprācyapaśudaśāviśeṣāsaṃbhāvyamānātiduṣkaravastusaṃpādanaṃ nāma /
GSP30abhiprvu:2453: itaśca kim atiduṣkaraṃ bhaviṣyati , ---- yatprakāśātmani akhaṇḍitatādrūpye eva prakāśamāne prakāśananiṣadhāvabhāsaḥ prakāśamānaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2454: tasmāt parameśvarasya tatparaṃ svātantryaṃ yat tathānavabhāsanaṃ paśurūpatāvabhāsanaṃ nāma grāhakāṃśasamutthāpanaṃ taddvāreṇa ca grāhyollāsanamapi /
GSP30abhiprvu:2459: tadevaṃbhūtānmāyāśaktirūpāt svātantryāt yā mūḍhatā vinaṣṭapūrṇacetanatā svātmavartina icchāspandodayasphuṭasphuritaviśvabhāvanirbharatātmanaḥ pūrṇatvasya ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2460: smṛtyādiśaktyātmanaḥ svātantryasya , deśakālasaṃkocavaikalyāt ayatnasidhabaibhavanityatādharmasya ca prakāśamānasyāpi yadaprakāśamānatayā abhimananam , tasyā vaśāt sāmarthyāt , pūrvaṃ yo na
GSP30abhiprvu:2461: pravartitaḥ samanantaraślokadvayoktasvarūpe pramātari bhagavati īśvaratvādinā uktenaiva pūrṇatādinā vyavahāro yaḥ khalu aham iti bhāti sa pūrṇaḥ vibhuḥ svatantro nityaḥ , ---- ityevamādirūpaḥ , taṃ pravartayantu vyavahāraṃ lokā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2462: etena śaktīnām icchājñānakriyāṇāṃ prakāśakena pratyabhijñārūpeṇa vyavahārasādhanaparārthānumānātmanā śāstreṇa taṃ vyavahāraṃ pravartayatāṃ tatsamarthācaraṇaṃ kriyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2464: kevalamiti na tu kiṃcidapūrvaṃ kriyate , nāpi tattvato 'prakāśamānaṃ prakāśyate , prakāśamāna eva yat na prakāśate ityabhimananaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2469: etaduktaṃ bhavati ---- yathā bhautasya bhāsamāne evātmani apahārito 'ham iti mohānmanyamānasya moho'pasāryate , ---- kaḥ khalu tvaṃ ? , yasyedṛśaṃ vastraṃ mukhamīdṛśam
GSP30abhiprvu:2470: ---- iti cet , paśya tadasti bahvataḥ ---- iti punaḥ punarabhidadhatā na ca asya apūrvaṃ kiṃcana racitam , tathā paśulokasya bhāsamāna eva ātmani nāhamīśvaraḥ ityādi mohādabhimanvato moho 'pohyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2471: yo hi jñānakriyāsvātantryayuktaḥ sa īśvaro yathā siddhāntapurāṇādiṣu prasiddhaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2473: yadi vā yasmin yadāyattaṃ sa tatreśvaro rājeva svamaṇḍale , tathā ca tvayi viśvam , ---- iti īśvaratāvyavahāro nānyanimittakaḥ , ---- iti vyāptiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2474: yat khalu yallagnaṃ bhāti tattena pūrṇaṃ nidhānamiva maṇibhiḥ tvallagnaṃ ca viśvam , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2475: yasya yadantarvarti bhāti , sa tāvati vyāpakaḥ samudga iva maṇiṣu , tvayi ca saṃvidrūpe dharādisadāśivāntaṃ śāstraprakriyoktaṃ viśvam , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2476: yasmin sthite yadudeti līyate ca tat tatpūrvāparabhāgavyāpi yathā bhūmāvaṅkuraḥ , tathā ca tvayi prakāśarūpe viśvam , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2477: evam anye 'pi dharmāḥ sahasraśo 'pi āgamādisiddhā yojyāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2480: evātmatābhimāne ghaṭādau ca prakāśamāna evānātmatābhimāne jñātendrajālatattvasya paśyato'pi indrajālaṃ yathā na tattvato vyāmohaḥ tathā pratyabhijñātātmasvarūpasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:2482: abhyāsabhāvanābalena tu śiva śāsanopadiṣṭena dehaghaṭādāveva parameśvaratāsamāveśamabhiniviśya paśyata ihaiva śarīre pārameśvaryāṃśadharmodgamaḥ , na tu vastutaḥ pūrṇatā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2484: yasya tu vyavahārasādhane hetukalāpe 'pi asiddhatābhimānaḥ , tasya tatrāpi vyavahārasādhanaireva vyāmoho'pasāryaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2486: tatreśvaraśaktivalānmūḍhataiva , tasyāpi karṇapathagamanāt saṃskārapakināvaśyaṃ kadācidbhaviṣyatyeva svarūpalābhaḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2488: kartari(Ipk 1,1.2) ityādiślokadvayena yaduktaṃ tadeva viśvavaocitrya ityādiślokatrayeṇopaskṛtya punarnirūpitam , evaṃ bhūtaṃ tāvat pramāṇam tadevaṃ bhūte bhagavati kathamupapadyatām /
GSP30abhiprvu:2489: tataśca yuktamuktaṃ śāstrādāviti maṅgyantareṇa idānīṃ tadeva nirvāhitam ---- iti śivam //17//
GSP30abhiprvu:2491: iti śrīmadācāryābhinavaguptācāryaviracitāyāṃ pratyabhijñāsūtravimarśinyāṃ kriyādhikāre mānatatphalameyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma tṛtīyamāhnikam // 3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2494: kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ ca yaścitraṃ taṃ stumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:2495: kriyāśaktisphāraprāyasaṃbandhaprasaṅgāt jñāpyajñāpakabhāvasya tattvaṃ prasādhya , kāryakāraṇabhāvasya tattvaṃ prasādhayituṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2496: ślokaikaviṃśatyā āhnikāntaramārabhyate , ---- eṣa ca ityādi evamicchaiva hetutā kartṛtā kriyā ityantam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2497: tatra ślokena svamate kartṛkarmabhāva eva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ , ---- ityupakṣipyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2499: tataḥ ślokaṣaṭkena cetanasyaiva kartṛtārūpā kāraṇatā prasādhyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2503: asmanmatamevāvalambate , no cet na kiñcit , ---- iti tribhiḥ ślokaiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2504: sāṃkhyopadarśito 'pi kāryakāraṇabhāvo nopapadyate , yadyasmaduktaṃ cetanasya kartṛtvaṃ nāṅgīkriyate , ---- iti tribhiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2505: cetanasyāpi anīśvaratāyāṃ naitadghaṭate , ---- iti dvābhyāmiti saṃkṣepārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2507: evaṃ kriyāśaktimukhena pramātrekarūpatāṃ bhagavati vyavahartavyāṃ prasādhya , kartṛrūpatāpi tata evāyatnasiddhā , ---- iti darśayitumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:2511: eṣa eva purāṇaḥ pramātā amūn bhāvān ābhāsitapūrvān ābhāsān ābhāsayati avicchinnena prabandhena
GSP30abhiprvu:2513: icchāyā īśiturabhinnāyā avikalparūpāyā akramāyā vaśena sāmarthyena kutrāsya te bhāvāḥ sthitāḥ ? āha , anantaśaktitvāt iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2514: viśve hi bhāvāstasyaiva śaktirūpeṇa svarūpātmatvena sthitāḥ ; ityuktaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2517: yadetadābhāsanaṃ yāsāvicchā , sā kriyā , asya bhagavato nirmātṛtvam //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:2518: nanu bījādaṅkura udbhavan dṛśyate , na ca atra kaściccetano
GSP30abhiprvu:2519: 'nupraviśan dṛṣṭaḥ , tatkathametaduktam ? , ---- ityāśaṅkyāha jaḍasya tu na sā śaktiḥ sattā yadasataḥ sataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2522: ubhayātmakam anubhayātmakamanirvācyam , iti tu svavācaiva virudhyate tat kimanena /
GSP30abhiprvu:2523: yadi asan ghaṭaḥ , tarhi tasyāsadrūpataiva paramārthaḥ iti kathaṃ svarūpaviruddhaṃ sattvamabhyupagacchet , na hi pādapatanaśatairapi
GSP30abhiprvu:2525: atha sanneva ghaṭastarhi kimanyat upayācyate daṇḍacakrasūtrāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2531: tataśca itthamupapadyata iti darśayati kāryakāraṇatā loke sāntarviparivartinaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2533: kumbhakārahṛdaye antarmanogocaratvāt pūrvamapi svasaṃvidekātmatayā vicitratvena viśvasya bhedābhedātmanā parivartamānasya spandanena sphurato yat antaḥkaraṇahiṣkaraṇadvayavedyatvamābhāsyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2535: ubhayagrahaṇamupalakṣaṇam , yasya yāvati pūrṇārthakriyā samāptiriti yāvat /
GSP30abhiprvu:2537: na ca kumbhakāre prāṇapuryaṣṭabuddhiśūnyadehaprāye tadetat sthitam , etasyāpi jaḍatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2539: tasya kasyāpi iti pūrvamuktasya acintyāparyanuyojyamahimna ityarthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2540: naca vācyam ubhayendriyavedyatvamapi sadasad vā iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2542: yathā darpaṇāntaḥ kumbhakāranirvartyamānaghaṭādipratibimbe darpaṇasyaiva tathābhāsanamahimā , tathā svapnadarśane saṃvidaḥ , tathāpi tanmahimnaiva etena idaṃ bahiḥ sphuṭarūpaṃ kriyata ityabhimāna ullasati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2543: evaṃ saṃvinmahimnā kumbhakṛti daṇḍacakrādau ghaṭe sthite tanmahimnaiva abhimāno jāyate ; yathā mayā idaṃ kṛtam , anena idaṃ kṛtam , mama hṛdaye sphuritam
GSP30abhiprvu:2545: tatra jaḍasya mṛdāderdūrāpeto'bhimāna iti saṃvitsvabhāve kartṛtvaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2546: nanu bhāvarūpameva itthaṃ bhāsyatāṃ kiṃ dvayendriyavedyatvenoktamatra , sphuṭamarthakriyākṣamaṃ rūpamanenoktam , ---- iti ko virodhaḥ //4//
GSP30abhiprvu:2547: anena ca vicāreṇa prakṛtamapi kriyāsvarūpaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2549: evam ekā kriyā saiṣā sakramāntarbahiḥ sthitiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2551: saiṣeti , yasyāḥ svarūpata āśrayataśca nopapadyate iti upālambhaḥ kṛtaḥ , sā upapattyā sthāpitā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2552: yataḥ saṃvidrūpādāntarāt prabhṛti indriyagocaratayā bahiṣparyantatayā sthitirābhāsanārūpā , tata eva vedyātmakakarmāliṅganena sakramā tāvadupapannā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2554: sa caika āśrayaḥ saṃvidrūpatvena svacchatvasvatantratvābhyāmubhayamapyantarbahīrūpaṃ sahata iti //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:2555: nanu bhavatu ghaṭādāvevaṃ , yatra tu bījāṅjurādau
GSP30abhiprvu:2556: cetanānupraveśo na dṛśyate tatra kathaṃ bījasyaivāṅkuraḥ kāryo na bhavati
GSP30abhiprvu:2562: tataśca yad vastu yamapekṣya antarityuktaṃ tad vastu tasyaiva āntararūpaviparivṛttimātrasya bahiṣkāryaṃ bahiṣkaraṇārhaṃ bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2563: saṃvidrūpaṃ ca pramātāramapekṣya antarābhāsino bhāvāstadapekṣayaiva bāhyābhāsā iti tenaiva eteṣāṃ bahiṣkaraṇābhāsanaṃ yuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2564: tataśca pramātaiva kāraṇaṃ bhavati na jaḍaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2566: yasmāt sa pramātā kāryasyāntarbahirābhāsanadvayanimittatayā sthitastena vinā tadapekṣasyābhāsadvayasyānupapatteḥ , tasmādekasya pramātureva na tu kathaṃcit jaḍasya uditā prasādhitarūpā kriyā nirmātṛtā bhavatīti etadeva draḍhayati ata evāṅkure'pīṣṭo nimittaṃ parameśvaraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2568: yata evaṃ cetana eva nirmātā , ata eva naiyāyikādibhiraṅkurādau
GSP30abhiprvu:2571: samavāyikāraṇanijāvayavārambhaparamparayā tu tata īśvarādanyasyāpi bījabhūmijalāderhetutā kathitā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2573: uktayuktyā jaḍasya hetutāyogāt ; tataśceśvara eva bījabhūmijalābhāsasāhityenāṅkurātmanā bhāsate , ---- itīyānatra paramārthaḥ //8//
GSP30abhiprvu:2574: nanuparidṛṣṭabījādivyatiriktabuddhimatkāraṇakalpanena vinā kimuparudhyata iti parasya bhrāntiṃ bhindannāha
GSP30abhiprvu:2577: tathā hi iti nidarśanopakrameṇa vyāptirevaṃbhūtaiva dṛṣṭā , ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2579: jaḍā hetavaścetanapreritāḥ kāryaṃ kurvanti , mṛdādayo yadi hi sannidhānamātreṇa vidadhyuḥ kumbhakāreṇa kimatra kṛtyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2580: śivikastūpakādiparamparayā te janayanti ; sā ca kumbhakārāyattā iti cet siddhaṃ naḥ sādhyam ---- śivikasaṃpādane 'pi te cetanapreraṇāmapekṣante iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2582: yadi hi syāt mṛdādīnāmapi syāt , iti ekānta eṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2583: tataśca yat acetanaṃ kāryakāri tat cetanāpekṣaṃ mṛdādaya iva , tathā ca vījādi , ---- iti svabhāvaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2584: acetanakāryakāritvaṃ hi kādācitkatvāt sanimittam , na cānyadasya nimittamupapadyate anupalambhāt , iti tat cetanapreraṇaṃ yadi na nimittīkuryāt vyāpakaviruddhamanimittakatvaṃ prasajyeta ; na ca yuktaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2585: tat , mṛdādāvapi tasyaiva prasaṅgāt , iti siddhā vyāptiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2587: tadetadāha ---- īśvararūpayā vyavasthayā yaḥ sa sa mṛddaṇḍacakrādīnāṃ saṃskāraḥ , mṛdo mardanaṃ , daṇḍasya praguṇatvaṃ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2588: cakrasya parivartanam ityādiḥ , tadārambho yaḥ kramaḥ śivikastūpakādirūpaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2589: , tena ghaṭaṃ niyogato janayati , nānyathā , ---- niyoge liṅ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2590: kiṃ ca yadi na krudhyate vastutaḥ kumbhakāro'pi aiśvaryaiva svatantraviśvātmatārūpayā vyavasthayā mṛdādisaṃskārāpekṣayā pradarśitaniyatyabhidhānanijaśaktivijṛmbhāto janayet ; anyathā acetanā mṛdādayaḥ kathaṃ kumbhakārecchāmanurudhyeran , tantavo 'pi vā paṭasaṃpādanecchāṃ kiṃ nādriyetan tadetadapi uktam anenaiva sūtreṇa tathā hi iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2591: nanvevaṃ kumbhakṛto nāsti kartṛtvam , ---- iti samutsīdet dharmādharmavyavasthā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2593: tathāpi samastetaranirmāṇamadhya eva idamapi parameśvareṇaiva nirmitaṃ yadavicalastasya kumbhakārapaśormithyākartṛtvābhimānaḥ pratibhuva iva adhamarṇatābhimānaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2594: yadi punarīśvarasyecchaiva iyamīdṛśī mā asya abhimāno'yam udgamat iti , tadā nāsau kartā kaścit /
GSP30abhiprvu:2595: tadidamapi uktaṃ sūterṇaiva tathā hi iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2596: kumbhakārasyāpi mṛdādisaṃskāra krameṇa kiṃ ghaṭaṃ janayāmi , uta na janayāmi iti ya ekapakṣaniścayāya saṃpraśnātmā vicāraḥ , sa īśvarasaṃnamdhina eva vividhāt svarūpāvacchādanatattvaprakāśanarūpāt avasthānāt , ---- iti saṃpraśne liṅ
GSP30abhiprvu:2597: / tasmāt vastuta īśvara eva sarvatra kartā , ahaṃ ca sa eva iti na
GSP30abhiprvu:2598: parimite kartā , api tu sarvatra kartā , ---- iti etāvati sarvathā
GSP30abhiprvu:2600: dṛśyate 'sya cetanasya svātantryameva sarvatra jambhamāṇaṃ jaḍānapi yat svātmatāmāpādayati , na tu jaḍānāṃ vastvantarāviṣkaraṇe sāmarthyam , ---- iti yaduktaṃ , tat sarvavādiprasiddhanidarśanena draḍhayati yogināmapi mṛdbīje vinaivecchāvaśena tat /
GSP30abhiprvu:2602: yadiha cetanapreritaṃ kāraṇam iti prasiddhaṃ mṛdādi , yacca tadanapekṣaṃ bījādi ghaṭaāderaṅkurādeśca janakaṃ , tadeva yadi paramārthataḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt tat tadvyatirekeṇa ghaṭāṅkurādeḥ kathaṃ yogīcchāmātreṇa janma syāt , akāraṇakatvaprasaṅgāt teṣāṃ vā
GSP30abhiprvu:2604: athocyate ---- anye eva te ghaṭāṅkurādayo mṛddhījādijanyāḥ , anye eva ca yogīcchādijanyāḥ , ---- iti , tatrāpi prabodhyase ---- vimarśābhedāt tāvadabheda , ---- iti pūrvameva uktam tatrāpi yogī khalu apratihatecchaḥ , tasya ca icchā tādṛgeva ghaṭo bhavatu
GSP30abhiprvu:2606: tadetadāha ---- tasya tasya sthirasya arthakriyāviśeṣasya karaṇe hetutacchīlānukūlarūpaṃ ghaṭādi jāyate , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2608: nopādānaṃ vinā ghaṭādyutpattiḥ , yogī tu icchayā paramāṇūn paśyan saṃghaṭṭayatīti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2609: te vācyāḥ ---- yadi khalu anvayavyatirekāgamādiparidṛṣṭaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo yogiṣu na viparyeti
GSP30abhiprvu:2610: ---- iti hṛdayamāvarjayati vaḥ tat kiṃ paramāṇugraheṇa ; no cet ghaṭasya
GSP30abhiprvu:2611: kapālāni śarīrasya svāvayavāḥ , teṣāṃ nijaṃ nijaṃ prasiddhaṃ tṛṇaśastilaśo 'pi anyathābhavabanasahamānaṃ laukikameva kāraṇam , iti ghaṭe mṛddaṇḍacakrādi , dehe strīpuruṣasaṃyogādi ubhayamapekṣyaṃ dehādisaṃbhavo duḥsamartha eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:2612: cetana eva tu tathā tathā bhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2613: bhagavān bhūribhargo mahādevo niyatyanuvartanollaṅghanatarasvātantryaḥ , ---- ityatra pakṣe niyatyanuvartinaḥ laukike prasiddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve svātantryaṃ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2614: tadullaṅghanamādriyamāṇasya tu yogiprāyaprasiddhe lokottare , ---- iti na kaścit virodhaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2617: cetano hi svātmadarpaṇe bhāvān pratibimbavadābhāsayati iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2623: nanu yadi prasiddhakāraṇollaṅghanenāpi tatkāryaviśeṣatulyavṛttānyeva kāryāṇi jāyante , bhagnāstarhi anumānakathāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2624: tathā hi mathamanyadanyatra niyamavadbhavet ityāśaṅkya prāmāṇikatarammanyaistādātmyatadutpattī niyamanidānamupagate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2625: na hi niḥsvabhāvaṃ vastu bhavati , nāpi bhinnasvabhāvaṃ svabhāvabhedena bhedāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2627: evaṃ nirhetuke bhinnahetuke ca kārye vācyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2629: svahetuta eva hi śiṃśapā vṛkṣasvabhāvāvyabhicāriṇī jātā , svahetutaśca hutabhugdhūmajananasvabhāvaḥ , tadidānīṃ niyatyullaṅghini kāryakāraṇabhāve
GSP30abhiprvu:2632: dhūme tu dviguṇaṃ codyam ; agnyādisāmagrī yogīcchodbhūtā dhūmaṃ na janayet , yogīcchā vā anagnikaṃ dhūmam , ---- iti na syādanumānam , asti ca talloke , ityāśaṅkyāha yoginirmāṇatābhāve pramāṇāntaraniścite /
GSP30abhiprvu:2633: kāryaṃ hetuḥ svabhāvo vāta evotpattimūlajaḥ // Ipk_2,4.11 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2634: yogīcchāpi sarvathā tādṛśameva na tu vṛścikagomayādisaṃbhūtavṛścikādinyāyena kathaṃcit rasavīryādinā bhinnaṃ kāryaṃ janayati , ---- iti yat kathitamata evāsymādeva hetoḥ kāryaṃ vā dhūmādi agnyādyanumāne , śiṃśapātvādisvabhāvo vā vṛkṣatvādyanumāne evaṃ heturbhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2635: yadi pramāṇāntareṇa evānumāne janmāntarābhyāsalokaprasiddhyādikamavaśyopajīvyam , sā ca śrutānumānaprajñayorbījam , ---- iti ca ṛtaṃbharāviṣayamuvāca patañjaliḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2636: anye ca yauktikā yogipratyakṣakalpapratyakṣasadbhāvaṃ samastavastugrahaṇāya kalpitavantaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2637: sāṃvyavahārike ca pramāṇe nāsmākaṃ bharaḥ , prakṛtaṃ hi asmākamīśvarasvarūpam , tacca svaprakāśameva
GSP30abhiprvu:2639: nanu svabhāvahetau kimanyā cintayā ? , āha ---- vṛkṣatvāvyabhicāriṇyāḥ śiṃśapāyā utpatteryanmūlaṃ kāraṇaṃ tata eva sa sanmātrānubandhī svabhāvo jāyate ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2644: nanu ca vṛścikādīnāṃ kīṭagomayādyanekakāraṇakatvaṃ tāvat dṛṣṭaṃ , rasavīryādibhedastu tatra
GSP30abhiprvu:2648: na hi nīlaṃ sadevānīlaṃ yogīcchayā bhavati , ---- iti kaścit prāmāṇikaḥ pratīyāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2651: vahnimānayaṃ parvato dhūmavattvāt iti , anityo 'yaṃ kṛtakatvāt iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2652: tatra ādyasya tāvat kāryakāraṇabhāva eṣa mūlam ---- iti kiṃ tatrocyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2653: aparastu vicāryate , yadi tāvat kṛtakatvasya kāraṇāyattatvaṃ nāma svabhāvaḥ katham abhavanaparicchinnabhavanasvabhāvatā nāmānityatvaṃ svabhāvaḥ syāt ābhāsabhedāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2654: abhede tu ābhāsasya hetusiddhāveva sādhyasya siddhatvāt , yadi paraṃ vyavahāraḥ sādhyate , tarurayaṃ vṛkṣatvāt , ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2655: iti nyāyena , vyavahāraśca jñānābhidhānātmā kāryaṃ eva , tatra ca niyatiśaktiraṅgīkrṭā bhavatāpi /
GSP30abhiprvu:2656: tasmāt sarveṣu svabhāvahetuṣvābhāsabhedaṃ vinā vyavahāramātrasādhanameva , hetvābhāsamayatvādevānadhiko hi tatra
GSP30abhiprvu:2658: tasmāt niyataḥ śiṃśapābhāsavṛkṣābhāsayoḥ pūrvanītyā sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāso hetubalāt ! tataḥ svabhāvo'yaṃ hetuhetumadbhāvamūla eva , tata eva sāmānyenedamuktaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ ---- sarvaḥ svabhāvaheturutpattimūlajaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2660: ābhāsā eva ca vastu , ---- iti ca samarthitaṃ prāk /
GSP30abhiprvu:2661: tataśca śiṃśapāyāmekasyāmeva sṛjyamānāyāṃ śākhādimadarthāntarāṇāmasṛṣṭervṛkṣābhāsasya sāmānyātmanaḥ sādhyasya nāmāpi nāsti , ---- iti saṃbhāvyata eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:2662: yattu tadekarūpaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ vṛkṣatvaṃ tat khalu śiṃśapātvameva tacca siddham , ---- iti na sādhyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2667: ityanābhātena kathaṃ dhūmo janyate , tataśca dhūmādagneḥ kāraṇasya
GSP30abhiprvu:2672: tatra vijñānavādino darśane pratisantānamanyaścānyaścābhāsaḥ , ---- iti svābhāsayoreva kāryakāraṇatā gṛhītā na tu
GSP30abhiprvu:2674: tataścedānīmanumānaṃ na bhavet svasantānagatāt dhūmābhāsāt krimisarvajñādipramātṛsantānāntaraniṣṭhasyāgnyābhāsasya iti niścayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2675: iha tu darśane vyāptigrahaṇāvasthāyāṃ yāvantastaddeśasaṃbhāvyamānasadbhāvāḥ pramātārastāvatāmeko'sau dhūmābhāsaśca vahnyābhāsaśca vāhyanaye iva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2676: tāvati teṣāṃ parameśvareṇaikyaṃ nirmitam , ---- iti hi uktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2678: ---- iti vyāptau gṛhītāyāṃ bhūyo'pi parvate yo dhūmābhāsaḥ so 'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:2679: agnyābhāsādeva iti vyāptiṃ smṛtvānuimimīte atra parvate agnyābhāsaḥ iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2680: tāvati dhūmābhāsaviśeṣe pramātrantaraiḥ sahaikībhūya vahnyābhāsasāmānyāṃśe parokṣarūpāṃśasahite viśeṣābhāsāntaravivikte pramātrantaraiḥ sākamekībhavati , iti yāvat /
GSP30abhiprvu:2681: bhūya iti vyāptiṃ gṛhītvā punarapi yo dhūmābhāsaḥ , ādigrahaṇādaṅkurābhāsādirgṛhyate so'pyābhāso nūtano 'pūrvo
GSP30abhiprvu:2683: sa ca adhipaterasaṃcetyamānāt vahnyābhāsāt bījābhāsādeva vā bhavet tata eva janituṃ śaknoti nānyataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2685: sa cābhāsasteṣu teṣu pramātṛṣveka eva , anekatve na tu yujyate evaitadityāśayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2687: tato dhūmābhāso'syaivāgnyābhāsasyāvyabhicāritaṃ kāryaṃ liṅgaṃ yogikṛtatvābhāve niścite sati , ---- iti tasmāt kāryāt so 'numīyate yataḥ parokṣo 'sāvadhipatitvādeva //12//
GSP30abhiprvu:2688: nanvevaṃ gopālaghaṭikāntarālaciroṣitanirgatādapi dhūmābhāsāt syāt vahnyābhāsānumānam , ---- ityāśaṅkyāha kāryamavyabhicāryasya liṅgamanyapramātṛgāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2690: paro nūtanādanyo yo dhūmābhāsaḥ sa dhūmābhāsādeva
GSP30abhiprvu:2691: pramātrantaravartino'dhipatirūpāt parokṣāt , ---- iti tathābhūtāt dhūmābhāsāt kathamakāraṇabhūto vahnyābhāso'numīyatām ityabhiprāyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2694: ---- ityāśayena nūtanamiti yatsūcitaṃ tadeva vyavacchedyadvāreṇa sphuṭīkṛtam //13//
GSP30abhiprvu:2695: nanu caivaṃ dhūmābhāso vahnyābhāsāt , ---- ityaṅgīkṛtaṃ cet tarhi cetanasyaiva kartṛtvam , ---- iti yaduktaṃ tat kathaṃ ? tathāhi vīje satyaṅkuro bhavati iti yadetat dṛṣṭaṃ dhūmāgnivadeva tat kathamanādarāspadam ? ityāśaṅkyāha asmin satīdamastīti kāryakāraṇatāpi yā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2697: eka eva bhāvastāvat na kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ , bhāvadvayamapi ca na
GSP30abhiprvu:2698: yugapadbhāvi kāryakāra.anarūpaṃ ghaṭapaṭavat , kramabhāvyapi nāniyatakramakaṃ nīlapītādijñānavat , niyatakramikatve 'pi na pūrvabhāvi kāryamuttarakālabhāvi ca kāraṇam , ---- ityevaṃ niyatapūrvabhāvaṃ kāraṇaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2699: niyataparabhāvaṃ ca kāryam , ---- iti parasya tāvanmatam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2700: tatra svarūpādanadhikā cet pūrvatā paratā ca tat bhāvadvayamātraṃ sa ca sa ca ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2702: cārtho 'pi vā na kaścit tasyāpyapekṣārūpatvāt sa sa ityeva hi syāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2703: atha pūrvatā nāma prayojakasattākatvaṃ paratā ca prayojyasattākatvaṃ tarhi vījasyāṅkuraprayoktrī sattā aṅkuraviśrāntā aṅkurāntarbhāvamātmanyānayati , aṅkurābhāve prayoktṛtvamātraṃ syāt tadapi na kiṃcit anyāpekṣatvāt tasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:2705: evaṃ na kevalaṃ bhāvamātrameva kāryakāraṇatā ityādayaḥ pakṣā nopapannā , yāvat idamasti iti bhāvyamānavibhaktyā prayojyasattākatvam , ---- ityevaṃ rūpāpi yā kāryakāraṇatā sāpi nopapadyate pramāṇena na saṃbhavati jaḍānām ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2706: anyonyāpekṣā hi atra jīvitaṃ sā ca jaḍānāṃ na saṃbhavati //14//
GSP30abhiprvu:2711: anyonyānusaṃdhānarūpatvaṃ jaḍaviruddhena caitanyena vyāptam , anusaṃdhānaṃ cāpekṣā caitanyasvarūpameva , anyatra tu sopacaritā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2714: tataśca yadi bījaṃ sadaṅkuro'san athāpi viparyaya ubhayamapi vā sat yadi
GSP30abhiprvu:2715: vāsat , athāpi ekaṃ sopākhyamanyat nirupākhyam , dvayamapi vā sopākhyaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2718: yasyādacetaneṣu nāpekṣopapadyate ata eva vibhaktyarthaḥ pramātrekasamāśrayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2721: kriyākārakabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ sa eva tāvadbhāvānāṃ samanvayo nānyaḥ śuṣkaḥ kaścit /
GSP30abhiprvu:2722: sa ca yadi svatantre cidrūpe bhāvadvayaṃ viśrāmyati tadopapadyate , anyathā tu na kathaṃcit
GSP30abhiprvu:2723: tathā hi vikalpenāpi asau vyavahriyamāṇo na vastuniṣṭhatayopapadyate , vastvanusaraṇaprāṇo hi vikalpo
GSP30abhiprvu:2725: vastvanusārī hi anubhavo , vastu ca syātmaniṣṭham ---- ityuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2726: tasmāt bīje sati aṅkuro , bahnau sati dhūmaḥ , ---- iti ca svatrantracidrūpapramātṛviśrāntatve sarvametadyujyate nānyathā , iti
GSP30abhiprvu:2727: nanu prayojyaprayojakasattākatālakṣaṇāpekṣā yadi svātmaikaniṣṭhatve nopapadyate , tarhi kāryakāraṇayostādātmyavādināṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ mate sā saṃbhavatyeva , tat kiṃ caitamyavijṛmbhātmakakartṛvādasamarthanena ? ityāśaṅkyāha parasparasvabhāvatve kāryakāraṇayorapi /
GSP30abhiprvu:2729: yadi bījasyāṅkuraḥ svbhāvastarhi aṅkura eva na bījaṃ syāt kiṃcit viparyayo vā syāt , ---- iti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ vā kāryam ; atha
GSP30abhiprvu:2730: anyadvījamaṅkuro'nyaḥ , tarhi na parasparātmakatvam , bhedābhedau hi ekadaikaviṣayau viruddhāveva
GSP30abhiprvu:2731: nanvevamapi bījamaṅkurādivicitramavabhātaṃ dīrghadīrghaparāmarśaśālibhiḥ srotovadavicchinnasvarūpameva nirbādhaṃ pratyavamṛśyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2732: tathā ca kva gataṃ vījam , ---- iti praśne vaktāro
GSP30abhiprvu:2735: evaṃ pradhānaṃ mahadādidharāntībhūtaṃ yāvadvitatībhūtamanantasargapralayaparamparātmatāṃ prāptam , ---- iti vitatagrāhiṇī pratītiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2736: bhāgābhiniveśavaśāt tu kāraṇakāryatāparikalpanaṃ tasyaiva bhāvasya viśasanaprāyam , ---- ityāśaṅkyāha ekātmano vibhedaśca kriyā kālakramānugā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2737: tathā syāt kartṛtaivaivaṃ tathāpariṇamat tayā // Ipk_2,4.18 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2738: iha dīrghadarśinā pratyakṣānumānāgamānyatamapramāṇamūlāṃ pratyabhijñāmāśritya tadevedaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohasāmyamanantaprakāravaiṣamyāvalambanena viśvībhūtam , ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2740: tatra pratyabhijñānabalena yadekātmakamekasvabhāvaṃ tasya yo bhedo'nyānyarūpatā iyameva sā kriyocyate , yataḥ kālalakṣaṇena krameṇānugatā , te hi anyānyasvabhāvā yugapat na bhānti pūrvāparībhūtarūpataiva ca kriyocyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2741: yata evaṃ kriyā tathā iti tena prakāreṇa pradhānādeḥ kriyāviśeṣalakṣaṇena kartṛtaiva syāt , natu śuṣkaṃ kāraṇatāmātraṃ , yato hetoḥ tathā iti tena tena mahadādiprakāreṇa satatameva krimikāṃ tathābhāsanarūpāṃ pariṇāmalakṣaṇāṃ kriyāmāviśataḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2742: pariṇamattā kiṃcidrūpaṃ parivarjya tyaktvā vyāvartyamanuvartanīyaṃ ca vyavasthāpya nirvartyamānatṛtīyarūpaprahvatā pradhānādestathā hetubhūtayā
GSP30abhiprvu:2744: ---- iti ko doṣo , na hi puruṣavadasyākartṛtvamiṣyate ? ityāśaṅkyāha na ca yuktaṃ jaḍasyaivaṃ bhedābhedavirodhataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2746: evamityabhinnarūpasya dharmiṇaḥ satatapravahaddharmabhedasaṃbhedasvātantryalakṣaṇaṃ pariṇamanakriyākartṛkatvaṃ yaduktaṃ tat pradhānāderna yuktaṃ jaḍatvāt ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2747: jaḍo hi nāma pariniṣṭhitasvabhāvaḥ prameyapadapatitaḥ sa ca rūpabhedādbhinno vyavasthāpanīyo nīlapītādivat ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2748: ekasyabhāvavattvāccābhinno nīlavat , na tu sa eva svabhāvo bhinnaścābhinnaśca bhavitumarhati vidhiniṣedhayorekatraikadā virodhāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2749: kaścit svabhāvo bhinnaḥ kaścit tvabhinnaḥ , ---- iti cet , dvau tarhi imau
GSP30abhiprvu:2750: svabhāvāvekasya svabhāvasya bhavetām , na caivaṃ yuktaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2753: evaṃ jaḍasya idam iti pariniṣṭhitāmāsatayā sarvataḥ paricchinnarūpatvena prameyapadapatitasya nāyaṃ svabhāvabheda ekatve satyupapadyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2754: yattu prameyadaśāpatitaṃ na bhavati kiṃ tu cidrūpatayā prakāśaparamārtharūpaṃ cidekasvabhāvaṃ svaccham , tatra bhedābhedarūpatopalabhyate ; anubhavādeva hi svacchasyādarśāderakhaṇḍitasvasvabhāvasyaiva parvatamataṅgajādirūpasahasrasaṃbhinnaṃ vapurupapadyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2755: na ca rajatadvicandrādi yathā śuktikaikacandrarūpatirodhānena vartate , tathā darpaṇe parvatādi
GSP30abhiprvu:2756: darpaṇasya hi tathāvabhāse darpaṇataiva sutarāmunmīlati ---- nirmalo'yamutkṛṣṭo 'yaṃ darpaṇaḥ ityabhimānāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2757: na hi parvato bāhyastatra saṃkrāmati svadeśatyāgaprasaṅgādasya , na cāsya pṛṣṭhe'sau bhāti darpaṇānavabhāsapraṅgāt , na ca madhye
GSP30abhiprvu:2758: niviḍakaṭhinasapratidhasvabhāvasya tatrānupraveśasaṃbhāvanābhāvāt , na paścāt tatrādarśanāt dūratayaiva ca bhāsanāt , na ca tannipatanotphalitapratyāvṛttāścākṣuṣā mayūsvāḥ parvatameva gṛhṇanti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2762: ---- iti cidrūpasyaiva kartṛtvamupapannam . abhinnasya bhedāveśasahiṣṇutvena kriyāśaktyāveśasaṃbhavāt
GSP30abhiprvu:2763: nanvetāvatā vijñānameva brahmarūpamimāṃ viśvarūpatāvaicitrīṃ parigṛhṇātu kimīśvaratākalpanena
GSP30abhiprvu:2767: ---- ityucyate tadā kasyāyamavidyopaplavaḥ , ---- iti na saṃgacchate
GSP30abhiprvu:2768: brahmaṇo hi vidyaikarūpasya kathamavidyārūpatā , na cānyaḥ kaścitasti
GSP30abhiprvu:2771: kasya anirvācyā , ---- iti na vidmaḥ ; svarūpeṇa ca bhāti , na cānirvācyā , ---- iti kimetat ? ; yuktyā nopapadyate , ---- iti cet saṃvedatiraskāriṇī kā khalu yuktirnāma , anupapattiśca bhāsamānasya kānyā
GSP30abhiprvu:2773: sadrūpameva brahmābhinnaṃ cakāstyavikalpake , vikalpabalāttu bhedo 'yam , ---- iti cet , kasyāyaṃ vikalpanavyāpāro nāma ? brahmaṇaścet
GSP30abhiprvu:2774: , avidyāyoge na ca anyo'sti ; avikalpalaṃ ca satyaṃ vikalpakamasatyam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2776: bhāsamāno'pi bhedo bādhitaḥ , ---- iti cet , abhedo'pi evam , bhedabhāsanena tasya bādhāt
GSP30abhiprvu:2777: viparītasaṃvedanodaya eva hi bādho nānyaḥ kaścit /
GSP30abhiprvu:2778: bādho'pi ca bhāsamānatvādeva san nānyataḥ , ---- iti bhedo'pi bhāsamānaḥ kathamavidyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2780: bhedātmaka eva vastubhūtaḥ pramātṛpramāṇaprameyavibhāgaśca , ---- iti na kiṃcidetat /
GSP30abhiprvu:2783: parāmarśasvarūpaṃ tu svātantryaṃ yadi bhavati tadopapadyate sarvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2784: parāmarśo hi cikīrṣārūpecchā , tasyāṃ ca sarvamantarbhūtaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2788: tena svātmarūpameva viśvaṃ satyarūpaṃ prakāśātmatāparamārthamatruṭitaprakāśābhedameva sat prakāśaparamārthenaiva bhedena bhāsayati maheśvaraḥ , ---- iti tadevāsyātidurghaṭakāritvalakṣaṇaṃ svātantryamaiśvaryamucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2789: ābhāsabhinnayoriti kriyāpekṣā saṃbandhasāmānye ṣaṣṭhī , paścādyayocitaṃ vibhajyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2790: ābhāsena bhinnau jaḍājaḍābhāsau , jaḍo ghaṭādiḥ karmarūpaścidābhāsaḥ kartṛrūpaḥ , ---- iti tayoḥ kriyā , ekasya kriyamāṇatvamaparasya kartṛtvaṃ na bhavet /
GSP30abhiprvu:2791: cikīrṣārūpeṇa nirmātavyābhedaparāmarśātmanā vinā ekā cāsau kriyā kathaṃ bhinnayoḥ svabhāvabhūtā bhavet /
GSP30abhiprvu:2793: , kārakāntarāṇyapi tu ekakartṛtvānupraveśīni paramārthato'nyathā karaṇādau bhinne kārakavrāte kathamabhinnā sā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2794: yadi vā ābhāsena yau bhinnau jaḍacetanau tayoryā cikīrṣā ekasyeṣyamāṇatā , parasyaiṣitṛtā tassvabhāvamekatvaparāmarśaṃ vinā , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2795: yadvā ābhāsabhinnayoḥ ahamidam iti yaḥ parāmarśa ekaviśrāntirūpaścikīrṣātmā taṃ vinā , ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2796: / ābhāsabhinnayorekaparāmarśaṃ vinā cikīrṣālakṣaṇā kathaṃ kriyā , ---- iti vā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2797: evaṃ kriyāṃ vā cikīrṣāṃ vā parāmarśaṃ vā apekṣya ṣ.aṣṭhī ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2801: yathā na jaḍasya kāraṇatā na kartṛtā , tathānīśvarasya cetanasyāpi , ityanenaiva hetutāprakāreṇedaṃ jātaṃ yat ya eva tathā cikīrṣustasyaiva sā cikīrṣā bahiṣparyantatāṃ prāptā kriyā ityabhidhīyate saiva ca kartṛtā tadeva ca hetutvaṃ nānyat kiṃcit /
GSP30abhiprvu:2802: tena ghaṭastiṣṭhati ityayamarthaḥ ---- ghaṭātmanā tiṣṭhāsuḥ svātantryāt sthānamabhyupagacchan na tu tadrūpamasahamāno yo maheśvaraḥ prakāśaḥ sa tiṣṭhati ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2803: ghaṭapaṭādyābhāsarūpaṃ yatkila jagat tadātmanā yaḥ tathā iti tena tena tajjagadgatajanmasthityādibhāvavikāratadbhedakriyāsahasrarūpeṇa yaḥ sthātumicchuḥ svatantraḥ , tasya yā evamiti vicitrarūpecchā saiva kriyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2805: tena maheśvara eva bhagavān viśvakartā , ---- iti śivam //21//
GSP30abhiprvu:2813: yadantarbhāti tattvānāṃ cakraṃ taṃ saṃstumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:2815: athedaṃ vaktavyaṃ kriyā nāma viśvapadārthāvabhāsalakṣaṇā ityuktaṃ samanantarameva , ke ca te viśve padārthāḥ , iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2816: tatrābhāsarūpā eva jaḍacetanalakṣaṇāḥ padārthāste ca kriyatā rūpeṇa saṃgṛhyante , nahi pratyakṣaṃ māyāpramātuḥ sarvatra kramate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2817: anumānamapyevam , na hi yadyadasti tatra tatra liṅgavyāptyādigrahaṇasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2821: tatra ślokaikādaśakena evamantarbahirvṛttiḥ ityādinā sthūlasūkṣmatyabhedataḥ ityantenāgamasiddhaṃ śivādidharaṇīprāntamekaikābhāsarūpatātmakaṃ darśanāntare sāmānyam iti yadvyavahṛtaṃ , yasya sāmānādhikaraṇyayogādanantasvalakṣaṇāvabhāsanavyūhaviśeṣapūrvakaḥ samasto
GSP30abhiprvu:2824: tatrādhikārasaṃgatiṃ yojayan pūrvapakṣapratikṣepaṃ copasaṃharan śivatattvasvarūpameva darśayitumāha evamantarbahirvṛttiḥ kriyā kālakramānugā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2827: jaḍarūpapratiṣṭho na kathaṃcidupapannaḥ , kintu cidrūpa evāntarbahirātmanā
GSP30abhiprvu:2828: prakāśaparamārthenāpi vapuṣā tathābhāsanarūpeṇa vartamānaḥ kālakramamākṣipan kriyābhidhīyate , tasya pramātureva jñānaśaktivapuṣo
GSP30abhiprvu:2831: jñānaṃ vimarśānuprāṇitam , vimarśa eva ca kriyeti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2833: tadetadaviyuktajñānakriyārūpaṃ kriyādvāreṇa sakalatattvarāśigatasṛṣṭisaṃhāraśatapratibimbasahiṣṇu yat tadupadeśabhāvanādiṣu tathābhāsamānamanābhāsamapi vastutaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2837: ekacittattvaviśrāntau ca tattvānāṃ kathaṃ kramo bhavet , deśakālābhedāt ? evametat kiṃtvāntaradaśodrekātsādākhyaṃ tattvamāditaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2839: yadyapyekameva śivatattvaṃ tathāpi tadīyameva svātaṃtryaṃ svātmani svarūpabhedaṃ tāvatpratibimbakalpatayā darśayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2842: tataścāntarī jñānarūpā yā daśā tasyā udrekābhāsane sādākhyam sadākhyāyāṃ bhavam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2847: bahirbhāvasya kriyāśaktimayasya paratve udrikābhāse sati pārameśvaraṃ parameśvaraśabdavācyamīśvaratattvaṃ nāma /
GSP30abhiprvu:2851: iti bhinnānāṃ vargāṇāṃ vargīkaraṇanimittaṃ yadekamavibhaktaṃ bhāti tattattvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2852: yathā girivṛkṣapuraprabhṛtīnāṃ nadīsaraḥsāgarādīnāṃ ca pṛthivīrūpatvamabrūpatvaṃ ceti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2853: tataśca śuddhacaitanyavargo yo mantramaheśvarākhyaḥ , tasya prathamasṛṣṭāvasmākamantaḥkaraṇaikavedyamiva dhyāmalaprāyamunmīlitamātracitrakalpaṃ yadbhāvacakram , tathā saṃhāre ca
GSP30abhiprvu:2854: dhvaṃsonmukhatayā tathābhūtameva cakāsti pratibimbaprāyatayā , tasya caitanyavargasya tādṛśi bhāvarāśau tathāpravanaṃ nāma yaccidviśeṣatvaṃ tatsadāśivatattvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2855: mantreśvarādirūpasya tu caitanyarāśeḥ sphuṭībhūtamasmadbahiśkaraṇasaraṇisaṃprāptabhāvavargapratimaṃ viśvaṃ pratibimbakalpatayā bhāti , tasya tu tat tathāprathanamīśvaratattvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2856: yastu sadāśivabhaṭṭāraka īśvarabhaṭṭārakaśca dhveyopāsyādirūpatayā sa brahmaviṣṇutulyaḥ pṛthageva mantavyo na tu nāmasārūpyāt bhramitavyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2857: yathāhureke brahmaviṣṇurudrā api tattvamadhye kiṃ na gaṇitāḥ iti //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:2858: nāmadheyāntaramapyatra tattvadvaye darśayati īśvaro bahirunmeṣo , nimeṣo'ntaḥ sadāśivaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2860: yasyonmeṣāṭudayo jagataḥ , ityatra īśvaratattvamevonmeṣaśabdenoktam , viśvasya hi sphuṭatvabāhyatvamunmeṣaṇam
GSP30abhiprvu:2865: parameśvarasya hi paramārthata etāḥ śaktayo yastattvagrāmaḥ , kācittu śaktiranyabahutaraśaktikroḍīkāraṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:2866: nikaṭatvādupāsyā ghaṭasyeva ghaṭatvātmikā , kācidanyāpekṣiṇī svarūpamātraniṣṭhā dūrā ghaṭasyeva sattāsmikā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2867: evaṃ nimeṣonmeṣaśaktī eva sadāśiveśvarau tayostvadhiṣṭhātṛdevate api tathānāme //
GSP30abhiprvu:2872: sa ca svaprakāśamātre punarananyonmukharūpe viśrāmyati paramārthataḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2873: tatrādye vimarśaṃ śivatattvam dvitīye vidyeśatā madhyate tu rūpe ahamidam iti samadhṛtatulāpuṭanyāyena yo vimarśaḥ sa sadāśivanātha īśvarabhaṭṭārake ca
GSP30abhiprvu:2875: ye ete aham iti idam iti dhiyau tayormāyāpramātari pṛthagadhikaraṇatvam aham iti grāhake idam iti ca grāhye , tannirāsenaikasminnevādhikaraṇe yatsaṃgamanaṃ saṃbandharūpaṃ prathanaṃ tat satī śuddhā vidyā , aśuddhavidyāto māyāpramātṛgatāyā anyaiva /
GSP30abhiprvu:2876: tatra yadā aham ityasya yadadhikaraaṇaṃ cinmātrarūpaṃ tatraivedamaṃśamullāsayati tadā tasyāsphuṭatvāt sadāśivatā ahamidam iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2879: nanu kasmādiyaṃ śuddhā vidyā ityāha idaṃbhāvopapannānāṃ vedyabhūmimupeyuṣām /
GSP30abhiprvu:2881: avalokanaṃ prathanaṃ vedanaṃ vidyā , yathāvastutvaṃ vastvanusāritvaṃ ca ; tasyāḥ śuddhiraviparītatā
GSP30abhiprvu:2882: vedyadaśāṃ copagatavatāmaṅgīkṛtavatām , ata evedamityevaṃbhūtenocitena parāmarśenopapannānāṃ parāmṛśyamānānāṃ bhāvānāṃ bodha eva prakāśātmā
GSP30abhiprvu:2884: tadeṣāṃ yadeva pāramārthikaṃ rūpaṃ tatraiva prarūḍhatvāt ahamodamityasya śuddhavedanarūpatvam
GSP30abhiprvu:2890: atra ca tattvadvaye bhāvānāṃ dhyāmalādhyāmalarūpāṇāmubhayāṃśasparśāt parāparatvamiti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2892: yā tu tanniṣṭhasaṃvedanadaśā sā śuddhā vidyā , tatpramātradhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ śrīsadāśiveśvarabhaṭṭārakarūpatā iti sakṣepaḥ //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:2893: evamekeṣāṃ mate aham ityācchādako yo bhāgaḥ tatprathāpradhānā śuddhavidyā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2894: anye tu manyante , ---- yo 'sāvidaṃbhāga ācchādanīyastasya yadavabhāsanaṃ tatpradhānā śuddhavidyā
GSP30abhiprvu:2895: anyathā hi sa idamaṃśaḥ kena bhāsyatāṃ māyāyāstatrābhāvāt bhāve vā prarohaprasaṅgāt ; ata eveyaṃ prarohāsahiṣṇuṃ yata idantāṃ bhāsayati tataḥ śuddhā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2900: māyāśaktyeva sā vidyetyanye vidyeśvarā yathā // Ipk_3,1.6 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2902: kartari ca sati cidekarūpaṣvapi bhāveṣu yadacidrūpatayā bhedaprakāśanalakṣaṇaṃ svātantryaṃ sā śuddhavidyā māyāśaktyā tulyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2904: na ca māyaiva , grāhakasya cinmātrabhāge tāvadaviparyāsanāt , yena prakāreṇa vidyeśvarā bhagavanto 'nantādyā
GSP30abhiprvu:2906: te hi śuddhacinmātragṛhītāhaṃ bhāvāḥ svatastu bhinnaṃ vedyaṃ paśyanti , yathā dvaitavādināmīśvaraḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2912: , sā ca paśupramātṛṣu , grāhakagrāhyobhayaviparyāsasaṃskāre tu avinivṛtte'pi yadetat vastuparamārthaprathanaṃ tatra vidyāśaktivyāpāro yogijñāniprabhṛtiṣvapaśupramātṛṣu /
GSP30abhiprvu:2917: dṛśyadraṣṭṭadarśanabhede satyapi jāte pūrvoktayuktibalena yadetadaiśvaryamuktaṃ tasya yā prakāśikā parameśvaraśaktiḥ ---- yadvaśāt kecideva tā yuktīrādṛtya tadā śvastahṛdayāḥ kṛtino bhavanti ---- sā vidyāśaktiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2918: ayameva ṣaḍardhasārādidṛṣṭo'pyasyācāryasya hṛdayamāvarjayati pakṣaḥ , anye ityanukteḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:2921: māyāśaktiḥ punaracidrūpe śūnyādau pramātṛtābhimānaṃ prarūḍhaṃ dadhrtā bhāvānapi cinmayān bhedenābhimānayantī sarvathaiva svarūpaṃ tirodhatte āvṛṇute vimohinī sā /
GSP30abhiprvu:2923: , yat kṛtyapañcakamadhya āgameṣu gaṇyate , dīkṣitasyāpi gurumantrādinindanaprāyamapi tvāvaraṇameva
GSP30abhiprvu:2925: śūnye buddhe śarīre vā māyāśaktirvijṛmbhate // Ipk_3,1.8 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2926: suṣupte pralaye na ityabhāvasamādhau ca tāvacchūnyamākāśakalpamanātmarūpaṃ vedyabhāvocitam aham ityātmatvena vīkṣyate ; ucchvasananiḥśvasanādau vā prāṇa eva tejaḥsamupavṛṃhitaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2927: svacchodakāśayakalpā vedyapratibimbanavatī vā buddhirabhiniviśyate antarahaṃ vedmi duḥkhyahamiti cintādyavasthāsu , śarīrameva tu pṛthivīprāyaṃ kṛśo'hamityādidaśāsu ahamityātmatayā bhāti sarvameva cedaṃ śūnyādi vastutaścinmātrasārameva māyayaiva tāvadacidrūpatayā bhāsitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:2928: tathāvidhameva tu sat ahamiti saṃvidrūpatābhiniveśasthānaṃ saṃpāditamapraśāntajaḍabhāvameva iti atiduṣkaravastusaṃpādanāpratīghātarūpā parameśvarasya māyāśaktiḥ , ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2931: nanvacidrūpatvādanātmā yadi śūnyādistadātmatayāsau abhiniviśyamānaścidrūpa eva , ---- iti sarvajñatvasarvakartṛtvādiviśuddhaiśvaryadharmaiva syāt , ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2932: ityāśaṅkyāha yaś ca pramātā śūnyādiḥ prameye vyatirekiṇi /
GSP30abhiprvu:2933: mātā sa meyaḥ san kālādikapañcakaveṣṭitaḥ // Ipk_3,1.9 //
GSP30abhiprvu:2936: tathāhi sati prameyamapyasya nīlādivyatiriktatayā naiva bhāseta /
GSP30abhiprvu:2937: yāvatā yaḥ śūnyādiḥ pramātā kathitaḥ , sa yāvadeva svarūpādvyatirekābhimate nīlādau prameye pramātā tāvadeva svayamapi
GSP30abhiprvu:2939: meyaṃ hi mīyamānatvādeva parimitam , ---- iti tādṛśādeva meyāntarādupapannavyatirekam , na tvevaṃ cidrūpamaparimitatvāt
GSP30abhiprvu:2940: / parimitatvaṃ ca śūnyāderahaṃbhāvasya yat tadeva kālādipañcakam . tathā hi kālaḥ kramamāsūtrayan pramātari vijṛmbhamāṇastadanusāreṇa prameye 'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:2941: prasarati , yo'haṃ kṛśo'bhavaṃ sa sthūlo varte bhaviṣyāmi sthūlataraḥ ityevamātmānaṃ deharūpaṃ kramavantamiva parāmṛśaṃstatsahacāriṇi prameye'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:2943: asya śūnyāderjaḍasya vidyā kiṃcijjhatvonmīlanarūpā buddhidarpaṇasaṃkrāntaṃ bhāvarāśiṃ nīlasukhādiṃ vivinakti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2947: atra cāṃśe tukye'pi kiṃcittve kasmādidameva kiṃcit , ---- ityatrārthe'bhiṣvaṅgarūpaḥ pramātari dehādau prameye ca guṇādyāropaṇamaya iva rāgo vyāpriyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:2948: na ca tadbuddhigatamavairāgyameva , taddhi sthūlaṃ vṛddhasya pramadāyāṃ na bhavedapi , rāgastu bhavatyeva /
GSP30abhiprvu:2950: / atraiva kasmādabhiṣvaṅga ---- ityayamartho niyatyā niyamyate iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:2952: mitaḥ pramātā bhāti ---- idānīmidaṃ kiṃcijjānānaḥ , idaṃ kurvāṇo'tra
GSP30abhiprvu:2954: eṣāṃ ca bhinnaviṣayatvamapi bhavati kadācit , yathānyatra rakto'pi niyatyānyat kāryate iti
GSP30abhiprvu:2955: ete ca pramātṛlagnatathaiva bhānti , ---- iti tasyaiva śaktirūpāḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:2960: yaduktamidamityatra prameye vyatirekiṇi mātā , ---- iti tatra tatprameyaṃ darśayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:2963: yat kāryakaraṇarūpaṃ trayoviṃśatiprakāraṃ yacca tasya mūlabhūtaṃ kāraṇaṃ sarvakāryakaraṇāvibhāgarūpaṃ pradhānaṃ nāma tatsarvaṃ meyam ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2967: kālādayastu prameyā api pramāryeva lagnāḥ , ---- iti pramātṛśaktisvabhāvatvāt na
GSP30abhiprvu:2969: vastuto hi atratyo'yaṃ pramātāpi prameya eva , sa tu pramātrīkriyamāṇa
GSP30abhiprvu:2971: nanvatra trayoviṃśatau kiṃ kāryaṃ kiṃ karaṇam ? ityāśaṅkyāha trayodaśavidhā cātra bāhyāntaḥkaraṇāvalī
GSP30abhiprvu:2973: pramātuḥ pūrvaṃ karaṇopayogaḥ , ---- ityatrādau trayodaśa karaṇāniḥ tatra buddhirapyavasāyasāmānyamātrarūpā
GSP30abhiprvu:2976: buddhau śabdādyadhyavasāyarūpāyāmupayogīni buddhīdntriyāṇi pañca ---- śrotraṃ , tvak , cakṣuḥ , jihvā , dhrāṇam ,
GSP30abhiprvu:2979: tathā hi ---- tyāgo grahaṇamiti dvayam , ---- bahirviṣayaḥ yat tatra pāṇiḥ pāyuḥ pādaḥ , ----
GSP30abhiprvu:2985: kevalaṃ tattatsphuṭapūrṇavṛttilābhasthānatvāt pañcāṅgulirūpamadhiṣṭhānamasyaucyate , ---- ityevaṃ karaṇāni trayodaśa /
GSP30abhiprvu:2987: sthūlaṃ kāryaṃ pṛthivī , āpaḥ , tejo , vāyuḥ , nabhaḥ , ---- iti pañca bhūtāni /
GSP30abhiprvu:2988: sūkṣmameṣāmeva rūpaṃ , gandho , raso , rūpaṃ , sparśaḥ , śabdaḥ , ---- iti
GSP30abhiprvu:2989: / tatraikaikaguṇamākāśādi , ekaikavṛddhaguṇaṃ vā , ---- iti darśanabhedaḥ , ---- iti na vivecito , nupayogāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:2991: atra pṛthivyādyābhāsā eva miśrībhūya ghaṭādisvalakṣaṇībhūtāḥ karmendriyairupasarpitāḥ , buddhīndriyairālocitāḥ , antaḥkaraṇena saṃkalpitābhimataniścitarūpāḥ , vidyayā vivevitāḥ, kalādibhiranurañjitāḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3000: evaṃ tattvarāśau nirṇīte etadantarbhāvenoltamapi mukhyatayā nirṇetavyaṃ pramātṛtattvaṃ vitatya nirṇetuṃ tatraitanmātṛtāmātra ityādi vyānoviśvātmakaḥ paraḥ ityantairviṃśatiślokairāhnikāntaraṃ prastūyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3002: sa hi heyamupādeyaṃ ca svaṃ svabhāvaṃ vidvān paramopādeyarūpaṃ śivasvabhāvaṃ svātmānamabhedenāviśan jīvanneva mukto bhavati , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3003: tatra ślokena brahmāditrayasvarūpam , tatkataṃ ca pramātṛbhedaṃ ślokasaptakena , dvayena samāveśasvarūpam , ślokapañcakena pramātureva suṣuptādyavasthāḥ , trayeṇa tāsāṃ heyopādeyavibhāgaṃ nirūpayati , ---- ityāhnikatātparyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3007: tatreti , evaṃbhūte 'sminnāgamasiddhe yuktyanugate ca tattvasvarūpe sati yadetat kālādipañcakaveṣṭitaṃ pramātṛtārūpam , tadeva yasyāṃ śuddhamupasaṃhṛtaprameyajātaṃ bhavati daśāyāṃ saṃhārākhyāyāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3008: tasyāmadhiṣṭhātṛdevatātvaṃ taddaśāsaṃpādanena svopāsakalokasya taddaśādhyānāveśasamāpannasya svābhimukhyasaṃpādanena ca bhajamāno bhaṭṭāraka īśvara eva rudro bhagavān , yo māyāpade 'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:3010: bhinnasya tu prameye tatsaṃtānapravahaṇalakṣaṇe prasare 'dhiṣṭhātṛdevatā viṣṇuḥ , ata eva tayoḥ prameyaprasararūpasya idaṃ nīlam ityevaṃ prakāśātmanaḥ prādhānyāt aham iti pramātṛdaśāveśaśūnyatvāt na tṛtīyanetronmīlanam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3013: yadetanmātṛtāmātramuktaṃ tasya vibhāgamāgamikaṃ ca saṃjñābhedaṃ nirūpayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3018: māyayāndho vimohitaḥ , ata eva karmāṇi svātmano bandhakānyabhimanyamāna eṣa iti kālādiveṣṭitaḥ śūnyādipramātā saṃsarati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3023: vidyayā tu svarūpaprakāśanaśaktyā pratyabhijñāpadaṃ prāpitamaiśvarayaṃ yasya , ata eva śarīrādyapi viśvamapi ca saṃvedanamevābhimanyamāno'ta eva cideva ghanā anvācidrūpavyāmiśraṇaśūnyā yasya rūpam , sa punarjanmabandhavirahāt dehe 'pi sthite mukta iti
GSP30abhiprvu:3025: patite tu śiva ekaghanaḥ iti kaḥ kuto muktaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3026: bhūtapūrvagatyā tu pramātrantarāpekṣayā muktah śivaḥ , ---- iti vyavahāraḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3027: yaścāsau muktaḥ sa bhāvān svāṅgavadabhimanyamānaḥ pramimīte iti sa teṣāṃ svāmī , svarūpaparamārthasamarpaṇācca pālakaḥ iti patirupadiṣṭaḥ śāstre /
GSP30abhiprvu:3028: māyāśaktikṛtabhedān vyatiriktāneva sato yadā mimīte tadā taireva meyaiḥ pāśarūpaiḥ pāśitaḥ iti paśuruktaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3029: tathāhi vedyarāśivaśādevāsmāvi dyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśādayaḥ kleśāḥ , dharmādharmādirūpāṇi karmāṇi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3030: ādipadādāśayarūpā vāsanā , phalabhogarūpo vipākaḥ , ---- iti kāluṣyamanantaprakāram , yataḥ pāśitatvāt paśuḥ ityuktaḥ //3//
GSP30abhiprvu:3035: kartaryabodhe kārmaṃ tu māyāśaktyaiva tattrayam // Ipk_3,2.5 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3036: iha jñātṛkartṛrūpaṃ tāvaccittattvasya svarūpaṃ , tasyāpahāro nāmāṇavaṃ malaṃ yenāsāvaṇuḥ saṃkucito jātaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3038: tatsthite bodharūpe kartṛtvalakṣaṇasya svātantryātmanaḥ svarūpāntarasya nimīlanaṃ viparyayo vā , ---- ityubhayayāpyāṇavaṃ malaṃ svarūpāpahānirūpamekameva /
GSP30abhiprvu:3039: atraiveti , satyāṇave male dviprakāre svarūpasaṃkoce vṛtte bhinnasya yatprathanaṃ tasya māyīyam iti saṃjñāmātram /
GSP30abhiprvu:3041: tatra karturabodharūpasya dehāderbhinnavedyaprathane sati dharmādharmarūpaṃ kārmaṃ malam , yato janma bhogaśca sa ca niyatāvadhikaḥ , iti jātyāyurbhogaphalaṃ karma
GSP30abhiprvu:3043: athaiṣāṃ malānāṃ viviktaviṣayanirūpaṇāt svarūpaṃ sphuṭīkartuṃ svātanryahānirbodhasya ityasya tāvadviṣayamāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:3045: nirmitāḥ svātmano bhinnā bhartrā te kartṛtātyayāt // Ipk_3,2.6 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3046: yeṣāṃ cinmātrameva paramārtho na tu aham iti svātmaviśrāntyānandarūpaṃ pramaṃ svātantryam
GSP30abhiprvu:3047: te parmeśvareṇa tayā nirmitāḥ svātmanaḥ sakāśādvyatiriktāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3048: atra hetuḥ ---- kartṛtāyā uttamasvātanryalakṣaṇāyā atyayāt abhāvāt ; parmeśvarasya tūttamasvātantryāviyuktabodharūpatvam , ---- ityabhiprāyaśeṣaḥ //6//
GSP30abhiprvu:3049: nanvasmāddhetorbhavatu parameśvarāt teṣāṃ bhinnatvamanyonyatastu kathaṃ bhedo bodharūpasya vyāpitvanityatvakṛtasya ca deśakālābhedasya samābatvāt ; anyonyabhedābhāve ca nirmitāste iti kathaṃ bahuvacanam ?
GSP30abhiprvu:3053: iha hi sarvatrāpratihataśaktiḥ parameśvara eva tayābubhūsaṃstathā tathā bhavati , natvanyaḥ kaścit paramārthayo 'sti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3055: śarīrādiśūnyāntapramātṛpadottīrṇānāṃ bodhatvanityatvavibhutvādidharmajātasyaikye 'pyanyonyaṃ bhedaḥ , te ca śāstre vijñānakevalā uktāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3057: ityādau vijñānaṃ bodhātmakaṃ rūpaṃ kevalaṃ svātantryavirahitameṣāmiti
GSP30abhiprvu:3058: evaṃ svātantryahānirbodhasya ityasya bhāgasya vijñānākalaviṣayatāmuktvā svātantryasyāpyabodhatā ityamumaṃśaṃ viṣayapradarśanena spaṣṭayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3060: teṣāṃ kārmo malo'pyasti māyīyastu vikalpitaḥ // Ipk_3,2.8 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3061: śūnye jaḍatvādanodharūpe eva , yadi vā prāṇe buddhau vā yeṣāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3062: ahamiti camatkārayogāt kartṛtvaṃ te pralayena kṛtāḥ akalāḥ kalātattvopalakṣitakaraṇakāryarahitā abodharūpāḥ kartāraśca /
GSP30abhiprvu:3063: pralayāvadhi hi te tathākṛtāḥ uttarakālaṃ tu kāryakaraṇasaṃbaddhā eva bhavanti ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3064: yatasteṣāṃ na kevalamuktarūpa ā,ava eva malo yāvat kārmo 'pi
GSP30abhiprvu:3068: satyam , savedye suṣuptapade , 'pavedye tu na bhavati ; tena māyīyo mala eṣāṃ vikalpito vyavasthitaviṣayatvena
GSP30abhiprvu:3069: tathā hi ---- ke'pi śūnyādibhāgaviśrāntā gāḍanidrājaḍīkṛtā apavedyasuṣuptapadabhājaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3073: prasaṅgācca kārmamalasya viṣayo darśitaḥ , māyāmalasya ca pākṣikatvamuktam
GSP30abhiprvu:3074: / adhunā punarāṇavakārmamaladvayābhāve'pi śuddho'sti māyākhyasya malasya viṣayaḥ , ---- iti darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:3077: ye cinmātramevātmatayā paśyanti aham iti ca camatkārollāsāt kartārastata eva sarvajñāḥ sarvakartāraśca te vidyeśvarāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3078: kintu tanukaraṇabhuvanādi yadeṣāṃ vedyatayā kāryatayā ca bhāti, tat kuvindapaṭadṛṣṭyā bhinnameva sat , ---- ityasti vidye śvarāṇāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3080: atha malatrayasyāpi yaugapadyena yo viṣayastaṃ darśayitumāha /
GSP30abhiprvu:3081: devādīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhavināṃ trividhaṃ malam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3085: ye tvete māyātattvāntarālaparivartino devādayaḥ sthāvarāntāśvaturdaśa śāstreṣu parigaṇitāste sarve bhavinaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ , teṣāṃ ca trayo'pi yugapanmalāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3086: nanu malatrayamadhye katamo malaḥ saṃsaraṇameṣāṃ saṃpādayet ? āha ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3087: tatrāpi teṣu triṣvapi satsu kārmaṃ malaṃ mukhyatayā saṃnipatya saṃsaraṇe kāraṇam . yathoktam
GSP30abhiprvu:3092: āṇavamāyāmalau tu yadyapi na kāraṇaṃ saṃsāre , tathāpi kārmeṇa vinā tau dehādivicitrabhāvābhinirvartanaśaktiśūnyau vijñānākalādiṣu , ---- iti mukhyaṃ kārmameva malaṃ saṃsārakāraṇaṃ tatra tatra śāstre gaṇyate ata eva tadupakṣaye vṛtte dattastāvadasaṃsaraṇasopānapadabandhaḥ , ----
GSP30abhiprvu:3099: asya ca malatrayasyodbhavatirobhāvabhedāt saṃsāriṇāṃ prakāradvayam , ---- iti darśayati
GSP30abhiprvu:3104: etacceti , yat tridaśādīnāṃ bhavināṃ caitanyaṃ kartṛtāṃśasya prādhānyānmalena saṃvidbhāgasya nimajjitatvāt kartṛtāmayam cidrūpasya tattvaṃ svātantryam , kalākhyena parameśvaraśaktyātmanā tattvena
GSP30abhiprvu:3106: śūnyāderdehaparyantasya māyāpramātuḥ saṃbandhi , tat guṇatvena apradhānatvena sthitam , yato mitam idantāpannadehādiśūnyāntaprameyabhāganimagnatvāt prameyam , yo gauro , yaḥ sukhī , yastṛṣito , yaḥ sarvarūparahitaḥ so'ham , ---- iti hi idantaivāntarnītāhaṃbhāvā saṃsāriṇāṃ parisphurati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3109: vidadhatā tataḥ śūnyādeḥ prameyādunmajjyevāsyate tadā turyātītāvasthā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3110: yadāpi parāmṛṣṭatathābhūtavaibhavādinityaiśvaryasaṃbhedenaivāhaṃbhāvena śūnyādidehadhātvantaṃ siddharasayogena vidhyate , tadāsyāṃ turyadaśāyāṃ tadapi prameyatāmujjhatīva /
GSP30abhiprvu:3111: seyaṃ dvayyapi jīvanmuktāvasthā samāveśa ityuktā śāstre /
GSP30abhiprvu:3112: samyagāveśanameva hi tatra tatra pradhānam , tatsiddhaye tūpadeśāntarāṇi /
GSP30abhiprvu:3122: dehapāte tu parameśvara evaikarasaḥ , ---- iti kaḥ kutra kathaṃ samāviśet /
GSP30abhiprvu:3123: tadetadāha --- yat punaḥ kartṛtāyā mukhyatvaṃ tannāntarīyakaśca śūnyāderguṇabhāvaḥ , tasmiṃścāpyacidrūpe guṇībhūte svātantryasyāpyabodhatā iti malalyāpārasyāpahastanāt cito yaḥ paro'pyātmabhāgo bodhalakṣaṇo malena nyakkṛto'bhūt tasyāpi adhunonmagnatvena mukhyatvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3125: idameva jñānamajñānātmakamalapratipakṣatvāt ; tadetanmukhyatvaṃ samāveśasya lakṣaṇaṃ yena dehasthito'pi patiḥ iti muktaḥ iti śāstreṣūktaḥ //12//
GSP30abhiprvu:3126: nanvevaṃ patyuḥ samāveśātmikā turyatadatītarūpā bhavatu daśā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3127: paśostu kathaṃ suṣuptasvapnajāgradṛśābheda āgameṣūktaḥ , ---- ityāśaṅkya suṣuptasvarūpameva tāvadācaṣṭe ślokatrayeṇa /
GSP30abhiprvu:3134: iha cittattvaṃ svasvarūpamācchādayat jñeyarūpeṇa buddhyādinā dehāntena ghaṭādinā vābhāsate
GSP30abhiprvu:3135: ekameva cedaṃ svātantryavijṛmbhitaṃ , na tvatra vāstavaḥ kramo vā bhedo vā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3137: tadevaṃsthite yaścittattvasya svarūpācchādanabhāgaḥ sa evottarabhāgāntrāsaṃkīrṇo yadā viśrāmyati tadanudayādvā tatpradhvaṃsādvā pralaya iva tadanādaraṇādvā nidrāsamādhimūrcchādāviva , tatraiva cāhantārūpaṃ kartṛtāyāḥ padaṃ parāmarśo 'sphuṭatvādarūpātmanā saṃskāreṇa śuddhena vedyapadavīmaprāptena yukto bhavati , tadā saivāvasthā netyevaparāmarśaleśānapekṣitaniṣedhyabuddhyādiviṣayasuspaṣṭaparāmarśasaṃbhedāpi avaśyaṃbhāviniṣedhyayogāt akiñcano'ham itivat svīkṛtasāmānyākāraniṣedhyā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3139: tathāvidhe buddhyādīnāṃ dehādinīlāntānāmabhāvarūpe śūnyatvamucyate , yatastatra jñeyānāṃ śūnyatā
GSP30abhiprvu:3141: iyameva hi sarvatrābhāvo na tu satāṃ sarvātmanā vināśaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3142: tatraiva śūnye pramātari samavetā prāṇāpānasamānodānavyānātmake vāyucakre preraṇātmikā śaktiḥ , sā ca vidyākalayoḥ prapañcabhūtau yau krameṇa buddhīndriyakarmentriyavargau tayorāntarī vṛttiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3147: evaṃ śūnya evāhantā akṣacakropodvalitā jīvanam , iti sa śūnya eva jīvaḥ saṃsarati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3148: yadi vendriyaśaktīnāmeva yāntarī sādhāraṇaprāṇanātmikā prāṇaśabdavācyā prāṇādimārutaviśeṣapreraṇāmayī saiva aham ityadhiśayānā jīvanam , tadā prāṇa eva jīvaḥ saṃsārī , sa eva śūnyaḥ , prāṇāśca puryaṣṭakaśabdavācyaḥ , prāṇādipañcakaṃ buddhīndriyavargaḥ karmendriyagaṇo
GSP30abhiprvu:3156: evaṃ yadubhayātmakaṃ puryaṣṭakaṃ tāvatyeva śuddhe yā viśrāntiḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3157: tasyāṃ satyāṃ yadahantāyāḥ suṣuptāyā bodhalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ karma ca kriyāsvabhāvaṃ tat sauṣuptam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3158: malena hi pramātā suptaḥ kalayā tvasupta iva , atra tannimajjane suṣṭhu suptastasya bhāvaḥ karma vā , ---- iti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3159: tatra śūnyasauṣupte na kiñcidvyatiriktaṃ vedyam , ---- iti māyīyamalābhāvādapavedyaṃ tat ; prāṇasuṣupte tu sparśakṛtasya
GSP30abhiprvu:3160: sukhaduḥkhāderbhāvāt māyākhyamasti malam , ---- iti savedyaṃ tat /
GSP30abhiprvu:3163: suṣuptaṃ tu dehādyanādarakṛtamacirakālaṃ ca , ---- iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3164: tatrāpi śramakṛtaṃ nidrā , dhātudoṣakṛtaṃ mūrcchā , dravyakṛtaṃ madonmādādi , svātantryakṛtaṃ samādhiḥ , ---- ityādyavāntarabhedaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3167: svapnajāgrahaśayostu sphuṭavedyāvabhāsayoginyoḥ ko bhedaḥ ? ityāśaṅkya ślokadvayena bhedamāha
GSP30abhiprvu:3169: spaṣṭāvabhāsā bhāvānāṃ sṛṣṭiḥ svapnapadaṃ matam // Ipk_3,2.16 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3171: sṛṣṭiḥ sādhāraṇī sarvapramātḥṇāṃ sa jāgaraḥ // Ipk_3,2.17 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3172: bāhyendriyāṇi cakṣurgolakādīni nimīlitāni nidrāyamāṇasya lakṣyante , na ca teṣu nimīliteṣu bāhyendriyagrahaṇavyāpāro dṛṣṭaḥ , tena śuddha eva manomārge rūpasparśādayo bhāvā akṣagrahaṇasamucitena spaṣṭena vapuṣā bhāsanayogyāḥ parmeśvareṇa sṛjyante , na tvaṇunā , aniṣṭasyaiva darśanāt , iṣṭasyāpi deśakālāntarādiyogena /
GSP30abhiprvu:3173: ata eva manomātrasthitatvādeva na pramātrantarasādhāraṇīyaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3174: yattu tatra bāhyendriyaviṣayatvaṃ pramātrantarasādhāraṇyaṃ cakāsti , tadyadyapi yāvadbhāti tāvat tathaiva , tathāpyuttarakālaṃ prabuddhasya na tathā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3175: ---- iti parāmarśena tadrūpaṃ nirmūlatvenāvabhāti , ---- iti bhrāntam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3176: yāni hi pramātrantarāṇi svapne sventriyāṇi ca bhānti , etāni prabodhakālabhāvibhireva tairabhinnāni , ---- iti niścayaḥ , prabodhakāle ca na tathā , ---- iti niścayānuvṛttirapahṛtaiva /
GSP30abhiprvu:3180: iti svakaṇṭhena , tat jāgratpratiyogidharmanirūpaṇāvasare'pi na darśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3181: evaṃbhūtā yā sṛṣṭiḥ sā paśoḥ svapnasamaye bhāvāt svapnapadaṃ svapnakāle viṣayaḥ iti , tathābhūtaviṣayaṃ pramātṛttvaṃ paśoḥ svapnāvasthā iti yāvat
GSP30abhiprvu:3183: yatra tu bāhyākṣavi.ayaṃ sarvapramātṛsādhāraṇatvaṃ ca niścayānuvṛttyā bādhārahitayā paramārthatvena cakāsti , tata eva sthairya
GSP30abhiprvu:3184: viṣayasya sā sṛṣṭiḥ paśoḥ jāgaraḥ ; tadviṣayaṃ pramātṛtvaṃ jāgarāvasthā ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3187: tanmadhye ca niścayānuvṛttinirmūlanāt svapnaḥ , ---- ityavabhāsasāratvāt vastūnāṃ , svapne 'pi dīrghe yatra svapnāntaraṃ sa tadapekṣayā jāgradeva ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3188: jāgradabhimatamapi vā dīrghadīrghaṃ kālāntare niścayānuvṛttinirpdhājjāgradantarāpekṣayā svapna eveti mantavyam //17//
GSP30abhiprvu:3189: āsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ heyatvapradarśanena turyāvasthātaḥ prabhṛtyupādeyatvaṃ sūcayati heyā trayīyaṃ prāṇādeḥ prādhānyātkartṛtāguṇe /
GSP30abhiprvu:3191: yatrāyaṃ pramātā tyāgopādānatadicchāprayatnādikaṃ parikleśaṃ paśyati , tadevāsya heyatayā bhāti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3192: sa cāsya sukhaduḥkhayogavaicitryeṇaiva kṛtaḥ , taccaitadavasthātraye saṃbhavati ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3193: yataḥ kartṛtārūpaṃ svātmaviśrāntyananyaunmukhyalakṣaṇamānandaikaghanaṃ yaccinmayaṃ vapuḥ , tadyadā prāṇādimat śūnyapuryaṣṭakadehādibhūmiṣu guṇa tāmabhyeti , tadā tasmin guṇībhūte prāṇādeḥ prādhānyaṃ sphurati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3194: tathā ca tasya cidrūpasya yathāyathā hānistathātathā duḥkhopacayo , yathāyathā kiñcidunmajjanaṃ tathātathā sukhopacayaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3195: tathāhi ---- bubhukṣākāle prāṇasyaivodrekāt duḥkhaṃ , tṛptau tasya nyagbhāvādahantodreke sukhaṃ yuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3202: evaṃ prāṇādeḥ prādhānye kartṛtāyā guṇabhāve sukhaduḥkhavaicitryaśatayogaḥ prayāsabhūmiḥ , --- iti jāgratsvapnasuṣupte prāṇādiprādhānyaṃ kartṛtānyambhāvaścāsti , ---- iti tat trayameva heyam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3203: kartṛtāprādhānyonmeṣāttu turyarūpātprabhṛti tatsthairyātmakaturyātītadaśāntamupādeyam , ekarasānandaghanasvabhāvalābhe upāditsā -- jihāsā -- vaivaśya -- pariśrama-- praśamāt , ---- iti tātparyam //18//
GSP30abhiprvu:3204: nanu prāṇādiprādhānyaṃ heyatāyāṃ kāraṇamuktaṃ taccejjāgradāditraya eva tarhi turyādau tadabhāvāt tatsamāveśe vyutthāmānupapattiḥ , ---- iti ślokadvayena śaṅkāṃ pariharati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3206: tacchedātmā samānākhyaḥ sauṣupte viṣuvatsv iva // Ipk_3,2.19 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3209: prāṇa iti prāṇāpānarūpā jīvanasvabhāvā yeyaṃ cidrūpasya sthitiḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:3210: , sā tāvatsāmānyaparispandarūpā , dehaprāṇāderacetanasya cetanāyamānatāsaṃpādanātmikā ahamitisvātranryāropasārā satī vikalpaparāmarśamayī saiva prāṇāpānādiviśeṣātmanā pañcarūpatāṃ bhajate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3211: tatra kiñcijjahatī kvacitpatantī ca śvāsaniḥśvāsarūpā krameṇa prāṇatvamapānatvaṃ ca viśeṣaṃ darśyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3212: tadidaṃ viśeṣadvayaṃ jāgrati tāvat sphuṭameva dehāt prasṛtya viṣeye viśrānteḥ , tato 'pi dehe
GSP30abhiprvu:3213: smṛtyādau vābhyantare vedye viśrānteḥ prāṇāpānayoḥ suspaṣṭatvāt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3217: svayameva ca vedya saṃvedanāt tyāgopādānarūpā sthitiḥ saṃvedyata eva , tena prāṇanā prāṇāpānaviśeṣadvayamayī jāgrati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3218: tathā svapne ; suptaṃ svapnaḥ , tadeva tu yadā sutarāṃ puṣṭaṃ bhavati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3219: tadā suṣuptaḥ pramātā , tasyedaṃ sauṣuptaṃ padam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3221: savedye tāvatsuṣupte yadyapi prāṇāpānaspando lakṣyate , tathāpi tayormadhye yā viśrāntihṛdayasadane nirindriye pradeśe tadeva mukhyataḥ suṣuptamiti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3222: tatra prāṇāpānayoryaśchedo viśrāntiḥ kaṃcitkālaṃ tadātmā sakalarasādivargasyordhvādharatiryakṣu samānīkaraṇavyāpārātmā , tata eva hṛtpadmavikāsadānādbhuktapītajaraṇakārī samāno dinarātrirūpayoḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:3224: viṣuṃ vyāptiṃ samānīkaraṇamarhati , ---- iti , {tadarham}(pāṣū.5-1-117) iti vatiḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3225: upamāne vatereva cāvyavatvam uddhato nivataḥ iti prayogāt ; taddhi nyāyasiddhaṃ na vācanikam
GSP30abhiprvu:3226: viśeṣaṃ vā dinarātritadūnādhikarvalakṣaṇaṃ suvati prerayatyaviratam , ---- iti śatari viṣuvat
GSP30abhiprvu:3227: tatra ca viṣuvati vicchidyamānasya prāṇāpānasya saṃskārarūpatayā sadbhāvaḥ , saiva hi vicchedo na tu sarvātmanā nāśo'sti , ---- ityuktamasakṛt /
GSP30abhiprvu:3228: tataśca hānādānayorbījarūpatā suṣupte ; iyati ca sarvaḥ pralayākalāntaḥ paśuvargaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3229: yadā tu sā prāṇanāvṛttirvāmadakṣiṇamārgau khilībhāvayantī madhyarūpeṇordhvena pravahati , tadā tatpravahaṇaṃ sakalasya
GSP30abhiprvu:3230: bhedasyābhedasāratādānalakṣaṇaṃ vilāpanamāśyānasyeva sarpiṣo vidadhatī udānavṛttirvijñānākalādārabhya sadāśivāntam , sā ca turyātmikā daśā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3231: māyordhve hi vijñānākalāḥ , ---- iti tataḥprabhṛti bhedagalanaṃ pravartate
GSP30abhiprvu:3234: prāṇa eva pramātā prāṇāpānarūpaḥ samānarūpa udānarūpo vyānarūpaśca , ---- iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam , vijñānākalaścāsau mantraścāsau vargāpekṣayā , īśaśca sadāśiveśvararūpo yo'sau , ---- iti udānaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3235: etaduktaṃ bhavati , yadyapi turyatadatītayorapyasti prāṇanā ---- anyathā jīvatvasya vyutthānasya
GSP30abhiprvu:3237: suṣuptādau tu saṃskārarūpatvāsphuṭavedyollāsasphuṭavedyāvabhāsarūpasya bhedasya vidyamānatvāt asti sukhaduḥkhādivaicitryam , ---- iti heyataiva , ---- iti yuktamuktaṃ heyā trayīyam ityādi bhagavataśca viśvaśarīrasya prāṇāpānasamānodānavyānarūpataiva sakalagatollāsapraveśapralayākalavijñānākalaādivargaśivarūpatā ityapyanena darśitam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3246: ātmānaṃ yaḥ prathayate bhaktānāṃ taṃ stumaḥ śivam //}
GSP30abhiprvu:3247: evaṃ svasaṃvedanopapattyāgamasiddhaṃ maheśvararūpamātmasvarūpaṃ yadadhikāratrayeṇa vitatya nirṇītaṃ tadeva saṃkṣepeṇa śiṣyabuddhiṣu niveśayitumāgamārthagrahaṃ ślokāṣṭādaśakena darśayati svātmaiva sarvajantūnām ityādinā utpalenopapāditā ityantenaikenāhnikena /
GSP30abhiprvu:3249: ‘lsokena pāramārthikaṃ rūpamuktvā ślokanavakena bandhasvarūpaṃ pramātṛprameyatattvadarśanadiśā , saptakena pratyabhijñātmakaṃ mokṣatattvaṃ , ślokenopasaṃhāraṃ darśayati , ---- iti tātparyam granthārthastu nirūpyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3252: iha jaḍāstāvaccetananimagnā eva bhānti ; idamiti hi jaḍaparāmarśo'hamiti saṃvitparāmarśa eva viśrāmyati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3253: tataśca jaḍā nirātmāna iti jantava eva jīvāḥ sātmānaḥ , teṣāṃ ca maheśvara eva svātmā sa eva maheśvaro na tvanyaḥ kaścit /
GSP30abhiprvu:3254: yataḥ saṃvitsvabhāvo'sau , saṃvidaśca na deśena na kālena na svarūpeṇa ko'pi bhedaḥ , kāmaṃ dehaprāṇādayo bhidyantāṃ , te tu jaḍapakṣyāścetananimagnā eva , ---- ityeka eva cidātmā
GSP30abhiprvu:3255: svātantryeṇa svātmani yato vaiśvarūpyaṃ bhāsayati , tato
GSP30abhiprvu:3256: maheśvaro'ntarnītāmidantāṃ kṛtvā parānunmukhasvātmaviśrāntirūpāhaṃvimarśaparipūrṇaḥ , ata eva sarvajñasarvakartṛtve nāsya yatnopapādye , vicitrabuddhikarmendriyaviṣaye hi yathā jñātṛtvakartṛtve ekasyaivātmanastayendriyasthānīyarudrakṣetrajñasahasraviṣayasya bhāvarāśerjajjñānaṃ karaṇaṃ ca tadekatra cidātmani , ---- iti //1//
GSP30abhiprvu:3257: nanu yadyeka evāyaṃ maheśvararūpa ātmā kastarhi bandho yadavamocanāyāyamudyamaḥ ? ityāśaṅkyāha tatra svasṛṣṭedaṃbhāge buddhyādi grāhakātmanā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3259: tatraivaṃ svātmani maheśvare sthite tasminneva prakāśarūpe svātmadarpaṇe tenaiva parameśvareṇa svātantryāt tāvatsṛṣṭaḥ saṃkocapuraḥsara idaṃbhāgaḥ , tanmadhe yadetadbuddhiprāṇadeharūpamidantayā vedyaṃtadbuddhyādibhinnasya vedyasya prāhakatayā samucitam idaṃbhāvābhibhavāprabhaviṣṇutvāt kṛtakenāpūrṇenāhaṃbhāvena parāmarśena bhāsamānaṃ cakāsti ahaṃ devadatto 'haṃ caitra iti //2//
GSP30abhiprvu:3260: nanvevamapyastu , tathāpi kasya bandhaḥ ? īśvaravyatirikto hi ko'nyo'sti ? tadetatparihartumāha
GSP30abhiprvu:3262: tatra sṛṣṭau kriyānandau bhogo duḥkhasukhātmakaḥ // Ipk_4.3 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3263: satyam , paramārthato na kaścid bandhaḥ kevalaṃsvasmādanuttarāt svātantryāt yadā svātmānaṃ saṃkucitamavabhāsayati sa eva , tadā svasya pūrṇasya rūpasya yadaparijñānaṃ bhāsamānatve 'pyaparāmarśarūpaṃ tadeva kāraṇatvena prakṛtaṃ yasya sa pūrṇatvākhyātimātratattvaḥ puruṣaḥ ityucyate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3265: sa ca pumān bhoktā sambandhanaṃ bhogalakṣaṇamanubhavati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3266: bhogaśca nāma tasya yau kalpitau kriyānandau , kalpitā kriyā duḥkham , rajo hi prakāśāprakāśacāñcalyarūpaṃ duḥkhamucyate ; prakāśarūpaṃ ca sattvaṃ sukham
GSP30abhiprvu:3268: nanu sṛṣṭāvityanena kiṃ vyavacchedyaṃ kiṃ ca saṃgrāhyam ? ityāha
GSP30abhiprvu:3269: svāṅgarūpeṣu bhāveṣu patyurjñānaṃ kriyā ca yā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3270: māyātṛtīye te eva paśoḥ sattvaṃ rajastamaḥ // Ipk_4.4 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3271: viśvarūpasya bhagavataḥ svarūpabhūta eva viśvatra yaḥ prakāśo yaśca vimarśaḥ , te tāvajjñānakriye svarūpadvayaparāmarśa eva viśrāntam ahamidamitisadāśiveśvaraparamārthaṃ sā bhagavato māyāśaktiḥ , tā etāstisraḥ śaktayo bhagavati naisargikyo'sṛṣṭāḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3272: svarūpāparijñāne tu bhinneṣu bhāveṣu jñānaṃ kriyā , śuddhameva bhinnatvaṃ prakāśavimarśaśūnyam
GSP30abhiprvu:3273: , ---- iti paśoḥ prakāśaḥ prakāśāprakāśāvaprakāśaśca iti krameṇa
GSP30abhiprvu:3275: nanu caivaṃ sati yathā parmeśvarasya jñānakriyāmāyā avyatirekaṇyaḥ śaktayaḥ , ---- ityucyante , tadvat paśoḥ sattvarajastamā/msi prasajyante , vyatiriktāni ca tāni puṃsttvād gaṇyante , tadetat katham ? iti saṃśayaṃ śamayati
GSP30abhiprvu:3278: satyam evaṃ syāt yadi bhedagraha na bhavet , bhedastvayaṃ vicāryate /
GSP30abhiprvu:3279: tatra ca saṃkucitacinmātrasvabhāvaḥ puruṣo , nāsya naisargikaṃ bhāvaviṣayaṃ prakāśanādi rūpaṃ sarvadā tatprasaṅgāt , api tvanyasaṃbandhakṛtam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3280: tataśca tasmāt paśoḥ śaktimattvena śaṅkyamānād bhedena yata etāni sattvādīni , tataḥ śaktayo vyatirekamuktāḥ ---- iti nocyante kiṃ tūpakaraṇatvāt gu.ā ityucyante /
GSP30abhiprvu:3281: nanu puruṣāt kimiti te bhedenocyante ? , ucyate , iha sukhaduḥkhamohapariṇāmarūpametatkaraṇatrayodaśakaṃ kāryadaśakaṃ ca sukhādisvabhāvatvenānubhūyate , ---- iti sukhaduḥkhamohāḥ karaṇakāryavargatādātmyavṛttayo yadi puruṣavyāpi tādātmyaṃ bhajeran tarhi
GSP30abhiprvu:3284: tathā ca na kaścit puruṣa īśvara eva , tasmāt apratyabhijñānamayapuruṣasvarūpavicāre sattvādayo bhinnā eva , ---- iti sthitam //5//
GSP30abhiprvu:3285: nanu jñānādīni kathaṃ sattvādirūpāṇi paśuṃ prati ? ityāha sattānandaḥ kriyā patyustadabhāvo'pi sā paśoh /
GSP30abhiprvu:3286: dvayātmā tadrajo duḥkhaṃ śleṣi sattvatamomayam // Ipk_4.6 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3287: iha tāvat paritviśvasyāvabhāsavaicitryalakṣaṇeṇa sṛṣṭyādinā pālayitā svaprakāśasvabhāvaḥ , tasya viśvapateryā sattā bhavanakartṛtā sphurattārūpā pūrvaṃ vyākhyātā {sā sphurattā mahāsattā}(Ipv_1,5.14)
GSP30abhiprvu:3288: ityatra , saiva prakāśasya vimarśāvyatirekāt vimarśātmakacamatkārarūpāsatī kriyāśaktirucyate , paraunmukhyatyāgena svātmaviśrāntirūpatvācca saiva
GSP30abhiprvu:3290: paśostu sattā tadabhāvaśca ānandaśca tadabhāvaśca saṃkucitatadrūpatvāt , tena yo'sau
GSP30abhiprvu:3292: yastadabhāvastadāvaraṇamoharūpaṃ tamaḥ , ete ca te sattvatamasī nīlānīlavat parasparaparihāreṇa yadyapi vartete kāryakāraṇatvavat tayāpi ekaparāmarśagocarīkāryadharmyapekṣayā citrapataṅgasaṃgatanīlānīlātmakarūpanyāyenānyonyamiśratayāpi bhātaḥ , ato
GSP30abhiprvu:3293: yo'yaṃ dvayātmā miśrasvabhāvaḥ tadrajoguṇaḥ , ata eva prakāśāprakāśasvarūpayoḥ sattvatamasoratra śleṣeṇāvasthānam iti duḥkhatvam ; priyaputrāderekaghana eva hi prakāśaḥ sukham ; ekaghana evāprakāśo mohaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:3295: kathañciccāprakāśo yathā gatagadakalyāṇadharmayogitayābhimatayā tadeva duḥkhatvam ; ayameva ca pūrvāparībhāvasāraḥ kriyāparamārthaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3296: atrānubhayarūpatvaṃ tu nāsti , pratītau kasyāṃcit kalpitākalpitarūpāyāmāmananupraveśāt tasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:3297: tathā hi ---- nīlaṃ tāvadakalpitarūpāyāṃ dhiyi bhāti ; nīlābhāvastu tuccho 'pi kalpanākalpita ābhāsamānatvāt tāvadvyavahāraparamārthaḥ , tadubhayavyābhiśraṇāttu nīlānīlaṃ bhātu nāma , yattvanubhayarūpaṃ tannīlapratītyā tāvadakalpitayā
GSP30abhiprvu:3298: na viṣayīkṛtaṃ cet tat kalpitāmanīladhiyamanudhāvet , atha tāṃ kalpitāṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3299: dhiyaṃ nāviśatyakalpitayā viṣayīkṛtaṃ nīlameva syāt , ---- iti na paśoścaturtho'sti guṇaḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:3302: evaṃ tāvat patipaśurūpaṃ pramātṛtattvaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa nirṇītam ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3303: atha prameyatattvaṃ nirṇetuṃ patyau tāvat ityabhidaṃ prameyatattvam iti nirṇetumāha ----
GSP30abhiprvu:3305: te vimiśrā vibhinnāśca tathā citrāvabhāsinaḥ // Ipk_4.7 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3306: ihābhāsā eva tāvadarthāḥ , ---- ityuktam , te ca parāmarśaikyena
GSP30abhiprvu:3307: kadācinmiśrīkriyante yadā viśeṣarūpatā , kadācidamiśrā eva parāmṛśyante
GSP30abhiprvu:3309: asāmāyikenākalpitenedaṃbhāvena sahajaparāmarśarūpeṇāṅgulinirdeśādiprakhyena gocarīkāryāḥ prabhorapi na kevalaṃ sadyojātabālāderyāvadīśvarasyāpi , tathā tena sāmānyaviśeṣaprakāreṇa citratayāvabhāsante citratvaṃ hi tayoḥ ----
GSP30abhiprvu:3310: yanmiśratvamamiśratvaṃ ca yugapadekāhantāviśrāntaṃ bhāti , ---- iti īśvaradaśāyāṃ bhāvollāsanāntarīyakatvena saṃvitsaṃkocarūpaṃ niṣedhyānuparaktanañarthamātrarūpaṃ śūnyaṃ saṃvitprakāśenaiva prakāśamānamahantāniṣedharūpāmasāmāyikīmidantāmullāsayati evaṃ tāvadīśvararūpasya patyuritthaṃ prameyatattvaṃ , paramaśive tu bhagavati prameyakathaiva kathamuttiṣṭhati ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3312: paśuṃ prati kīdṛk prameyasya vṛttāntaḥ , ---- iti sandehamapohati ślokatrayeṇa ----
GSP30abhiprvu:3321: bhinna iti miśrāmiśratayā bhidyamāna ābhāso yeṣāmarthānāṃ te viśeṣasāmānyātmāno'rthāḥ pratyagātmanaḥ pratipuruṣamavyāmiśrasvasaṃvedanādagamasvarūpasyāsaṃkīrṇāhaṃprakāśātmanaḥ prakalpyāḥ kalpanīyāḥ , pratiprāṇisvavāsanānusāreṇa tattadvicitrasukhaduḥkhādyupayuktābhiḥ smaraṇe utprekṣaṇe saṃkalpane 'nyatrānyatra ca vikalpayoge /
GSP30abhiprvu:3322: etaduktaṃ bahvati ---- īśvarasya vikalpātmakatāmantareṇa śuddhavimarśaviṣayībhāvyā arthāḥ
GSP30abhiprvu:3325: nanvavikalpyante yāvaānevārthastāvāneva yadi vikalpyatve tatko viśeṣaḥ prameyasya patipaśurūpatāyām ? ucyate , tasyeti , paśukartṛkā sṛṣṭisteṣāmarthānāmīśvarasṛṣṭānāmuparivartinī , ata eva tāmīśvarasṛṣṭimupajīvantī asādhāraṇī pratipramātṛniyatā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3326: tadyathā idaṃ hṛdyam iti yena sṛṣṭaṃ tat tasyaiva tadā nānyasya /
GSP30abhiprvu:3327: nanu yadi paśorapi sṛṣṭiśaktirasti tarhīśvara eva ? satyam , īśvara evāsau /
GSP30abhiprvu:3328: nanvevaṃ sādhāraṇatvaṃ kasmāt sṛṣṭerna bhavati ? bhavet yadi svaśaktiṃ parijānīyāt
GSP30abhiprvu:3329: , yāvatā sā tasyāparijñātāparavaśasyaiva sato vikalpakriyā vikalpanaśaktirudeti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3330: nanu kena sā tasyotthāpyate ? āha ---- īśvarasya parāmarśarūpatayā śabdarāśilakṣaṇasya vā śaktiḥ svarūpaviśrāntilakṣaṇapāramaiśvaryoparodhaprayojanabrāhmyādidevatācakramayī taistaiḥ kakārādivarṇavaicitryairvicitrā , tayā yāsau vikalpakriyā tasya paśorekatra nirūḍhyabhāvāt cañcalā , tena mitramidaṃ śatrurayam
GSP30abhiprvu:3336: nanveyaṃ yadi pāśavī sṛṣṭiḥ saṃsārarūpā tarhi pārameśvarī sṛṣṭiḥ paśoḥ kiṃ kuryāt ? iti nirṇīyate
GSP30abhiprvu:3339: aiśvaraḥ sargo dvidhā , sādhāraṇaśca ghaṭādirasādhāraṇaśca anyathā nirdiṣṭo dvicandrādiḥ ; tasya ca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ spaṣṭāvabhāsanaṃ nāma /
GSP30abhiprvu:3340: so'yaṃ sargo yadā vikalpahānakrameṇa tasminnirvikalpakaparigṛhīta eva spaṣṭā'bhertha ekāgratvamavalambhya ahamidam ityaiśvaryaparāmarśapadaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3341: bhavati tadā antarlakṣyabairdṛṣṭinimeṣonmeṣaparihāradiśā krameṇa abhyāsatāratamyena paśoḥ paśutvaṃ pratihantīśvaratvaṃ darśayati /
GSP30abhiprvu:3342: kiṃ ca yo'yaṃ vikalpasargaḥ pāśava uktaḥ so'pi yadi anyathā iti
GSP30abhiprvu:3343: pūrviktarūpavaiparītyena parijñātayeśaśaktyā parijñātatādātmyasya bhavati tadā so'pi sādhāraṇa evāpyāyanābhicaraṇaśāntyādivikalpa iva
GSP30abhiprvu:3345: evaṃ vikalpanirhrāsena nirvikalparūpasātmībhāve viśvātmakasākṣātkāralakṣaṇaḥ svapratyaya eva mokṣo darśitaḥ , adhunā
GSP30abhiprvu:3349: nahi saḥ pratyagātyā nāma paśuḥ kaścidanyo yo'ham , api tu parigṛhītagrāhyagrāhakaprakāśaikaghanaḥ paro yaḥ sa evāhaṃ sa cāhameva ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3350: na tvanyaḥ kaścit ; ato vikalpasṛṣṭirapi mama svātantryalakṣaṇo vibhavaḥ ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3351: ---- ityevaṃ vimarśe dṛḍhībhūte satyaparikṣīṇavikalpo'pi jīvanneva muktaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3355: nanvevaṃ baddhamuktayoḥ prameyaṃ prati ko bhedaḥ ? , ucyate ----
GSP30abhiprvu:3358: śrīmatsadāśiveśvarapadādārabhya krimiparyantapramātṛvargādhiṣṭhātṛ yadahamitirūpaṃ tadevātmatayābhiniviśate muktaḥ , tataśca viśvasyāpi prameyaṃ mamāpi ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3359: mama prameyaṃ viśvasyāpi , prameyaṃ cedaṃ mamaivāṅgabhūtaṃ
GSP30abhiprvu:3360: prameyāntaramapi tathā , ---- ityanena krameṇa prameyaṃ prasparataśca pramātṛvargāccāvyāvṛttam , ---- ityekarasābhedaviśrāntitattvamasya sarvaṃ parāmarśapadamupaiti /
GSP30abhiprvu:3363: nanu sadāśivedśvarabhuvi jīvanmuktipade baddharūpapaśupramātṛviṣaye ca prameyavṛttāntaḥ parīkṣitaḥ , paramaśive tu kathamasau ? ityāśaṅkyāha ----
GSP30abhiprvu:3366: na khalu bhagavati śrīparamaśive prameyakayā kācidasti ,
GSP30abhiprvu:3368: tataśca sāvasthā saṃvitsvabhāvena svātmaviśrāntyānandena akṛtrimanaisargikaparāmarśātmakasvātmacamatkāralakṣaṇemaikadhanā avicchinnatadrūpā paramākṣareṇa vigrahavatī bhagavato viśvamayasyānavacchinnānuttaradhāmno nityaśuddhasya galitaprameyakathā sarvottīrṇā vyapadiśyate //14//
GSP30abhiprvu:3372: evamiti , īśvararūpamātmānaṃ tasya ca svāvyatirikte svātantryamātrarūpe jñānakriye jānan evaṃbhūto'yamātmā na tu kāṇādādidarśitaḥ , itthaṃ ca jñānakriye na tu tasya vyatirikte kecana iti
GSP30abhiprvu:3375: atatparastu sati dehe jīvanmuktastatpāte parameśvara eveti //15//
GSP30abhiprvu:3376: asyārthasya svapratyayasiddhasyāpi guruparamparopadeśa upodvalako vaktavyaḥ , śāstradṛṣṭirhi darśitāgamādhikāreṇa /
GSP30abhiprvu:3377: evaṃ gurutaḥ śāstrataḥ svataḥ etad dṛḍhīkṛtaṃ bhavati , ityabhiprāyeṇa gurupāramparyaṃ darśayati iti prakaṭito mayā sughaṭa eṣa mārgo navo mahāgurubhirucyatesma śivadṛṣṭiśāstre yathā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3378: tadatra nidadhatpadaṃ bhuvanakartṛtāmātmano vibhāvya śivatāmayīmaniśamāviśansiddhyati // Ipk_4.16
GSP30abhiprvu:3379: asmatparameṣṭhibhaṭṭārakaśrīsomānandapādaiḥ śivadṛṣṭiśāstre 'yamabhinavaḥ sarvarahasyaśāstrāntargataḥ sannigūḍhatvādaprasiddho bāhyāntaracaryāprāṇāyāmādikleśaprayāsakalāvirahāt sughaṭastāvaduktaḥ , sa evātra prakaṭatāṃ paravādakalaṅkaśaṅkāpasāraṇena nītaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3380: yata evaṃ śāstragurusvapratyayasiddho'yamarthaḥ , taditi tasmādatra prameyapade
GSP30abhiprvu:3381: parāmarśaṃ viśramayan viśvakartṛtvalakṣaṇamaiśvaryamātmano vibhāvya dārḍhyena yadā parāmṛśati tarhi tatparāmarśamātrādeva tāvajjīvanmukto bhagavāñchiva eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:3384: karaṇena nāsti kṛtyaṃ kvāpi bhāvanayāpi vā //
GSP30abhiprvu:3389: śarīraprāṇabuddhiśūnyebhyo'nyatamaṃ dvayaṃ sarvaṃ vā tatraiva nimajjayati , anavarataṃ tattāṃ tāṃ vibhūtiṃ mahāvibhūtiparyantāṃ labhate //16//
GSP30abhiprvu:3390: nanu yadyātmākhyaṃ vastu tadeva tarhi tasya pratyabhijñānāpratyabhijñānayoraviśeṣaḥ , na hi
GSP30abhiprvu:3393: tatrādyā satyaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ nāpekṣate , dvitīyā tu tadapekṣate eva /
GSP30abhiprvu:3394: iha ca ahaṃ maheśvaraḥ ityevaṃbhūtacamatkārasārā parāparasiddhilakṣaṇā jīvanmuktivibhūtiyogamayyarthakriyā
GSP30abhiprvu:3396: nanu pramātṛviśrāntisārārthakriyā pratyabhijñānena vinā na dṛṣṭā , sati tatra dṛṣṭā , iti kvaitadupalabdhamityāśaṅkyāha ----
GSP30abhiprvu:3398: kānto lokasamāna evamaparijñāto na rantuṃ yathā /
GSP30abhiprvu:3399: lokasyaiṣa tathānavekṣitaguṇaḥ svātmāpi viśveśvaro naivālaṃ nijavaibhavāya tadiyaṃ tatpratyabhijñoditā yadā nāyakaguṇasaṃśravaṇapravṛddhānurāgā kāminī taddarśanameva paramupādeyamākāṅkṣantī divāniśamavaśahṛdayā devatopayācitāni dūtīsaṃpreṣaṇāni madalekhadvārakātmāvasthānivedanāni kurvāṇā virahakṣāmībhavadgātralatikā tiṣṭhati , tadā tadupayācitavaśāt aśaṅkitameva savidhavartini priyatame'valokite taistairutkarṣaviśeṣaiḥ parāmarśapadavīmagacchadbhirjanasādhāraṇatāmāpādite saṃpannamapi
GSP30abhiprvu:3400: priyatamāvalokanaṃ na hṛdayaṃ pūrṇīkaroti ; tathā svātmani viśveśvare
GSP30abhiprvu:3401: satataṃ nirbhāsamāne'pi tannirbhāsanaṃ na hṛḍayasya pūrṇatāmādhatte ;
GSP30abhiprvu:3402: yataḥ sopyātmā viśvajñatvakartṛtvādyapratihatasvaśaktilakṣaṇapāramaiśvaryotkarṣayogena na parāmṛṣṭaḥ ---- iti bhāsamānaghaṭāditulyavṛttānto jātaḥ /
GSP30abhiprvu:3403: yadā tu dūtīvacanādvā tallakṣaṇābhijñānādvopāyāntarādvā tānutkarṣān hṛdayaṅgamīkaraṇenāmṛśati , tadā tatkṣaṇamadbhutaphullanyāyenaiva tāvat
GSP30abhiprvu:3405: labhate ; tadvadātmani guruvacanājjñānakriyālakṣaṇaśaktyabhijñānādervā yadā pāramaiśvaryotkarṣahṛdayaṅgamībhāvo jāyate , tadā tatlakṣaṇameva pūrṇatātmikā jīvanmuktiḥ ; samāveśābhyāsarase tu vibhūtilābhaḥ ---- iti tasya pratyabhijñaiva parāparasiddhipradāyinī bhavati //17//
GSP30abhiprvu:3406: sarvopakārakaṃ mahāphalamidaṃ śāstraṃ prasiddhānvayayogena nāmadheyaprasiddhyā ca tadutkarṣasmaraṇadvārajanitasaṃbhāvanāpratyayalakṣaṇapravartakasaṃvedanayā janaṃ praavrtayituṃ piturnāmnā copasaṃhāraṃ darśayati janasyāyatnasiddhyarthamudayākarasūnunā īśvarapratyabhijñeyamutpalenopapāditā // Ipk_4.18 //
GSP30abhiprvu:3407: yasya kasyacijjantoriti nātra jātyādyapekṣā kācit ---- iti sarvopakāritvamuktam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3408: ayatnena siddhiḥ parāpararūpā yathā syāt ---- iti mahāphalattvam /
GSP30abhiprvu:3410: śāstramakārṣīt ---- iti tatprasiddyā janaḥ pravartate ---- iti pravartanādvāreṇa so'nugṛhīto bhavati ---- ityubhayanāmanirdeśaḥ /
